Title: One Piece
Summary: Follows the adventures of Monkey D. Luffy and his pirate crew in order to find the greatest treasure ever left by the legendary Pirate, Gold Roger. The famous mystery treasure named "One Piece".

Title: Teenage Mutant Ninja Turtles: Mutant Mayhem
Summary: The film follows the Turtle brothers as they work to earn the love of New York City while facing down an army of mutants.

Title: The Super Mario Bros. Movie
Summary: A plumber named Mario travels through an underground labyrinth with his brother, Luigi, trying to save a captured princess.

Title: Attack on Titan
Summary: After his hometown is destroyed and his mother is killed, young Eren Jaeger vows to cleanse the earth of the giant humanoid Titans that have brought humanity to the brink of extinction.

Title: Jujutsu Kaisen
Summary: A boy swallows a cursed talisman - the finger of a demon - and becomes cursed himself. He enters a shaman's school to be able to locate the demon's other body parts and thus exorcise himself.

Title: Bleach: Thousand-Year Blood War

Stars: Johnny Yong Bosch,Masakazu Morita,Stephanie Sheh,Richard Epcar

Title: Demon Slayer: Kimetsu no Yaiba
Summary: A family is attacked by demons and only two members survive - Tanjiro and his sister Nezuko, who is turning into a demon slowly. Tanjiro sets out to become a demon slayer to avenge his family and cure his sister.

Title: Puss in Boots: The Last Wish
Summary: When Puss in Boots discovers that his passion for adventure has taken its toll and he has burned through eight of his nine lives, he launches an epic journey to restore them by finding the mythical Last Wish.

Title: Bleach
Summary: High school student Ichigo Kurosaki, who has the ability to see ghosts, gains soul reaper powers from Rukia Kuchiki and sets out to save the world from "Hollows".
Stars: Johnny Yong Bosch,Michelle Ruff,Stephanie Sheh,Jamieson Price

Title: Miraculous: Tales of Ladybug & Cat Noir
Summary: Marinette and Adrien, two normal teens, transform into the superheroes Ladybug and Cat Noir when a mysterious evil threatens to destroy Paris.

Title: Naruto: Shippuden
Summary: Naruto Uzumaki, is a loud, hyperactive, adolescent ninja who constantly searches for approval and recognition, as well as to become Hokage, who is acknowledged as the leader and strongest of all ninja in the village.

Title: Coraline
Summary: An adventurous 11-year-old girl finds another world that is a strangely idealized version of her frustrating home, but it has sinister secrets.

Title: Baki Hanma
Summary: To gain the skills he needs to surpass his powerful father, Baki enters Arizona State Prison to take on the notorious inmate known as Mr. Unchained.

Title: The Boy and the Heron
Summary: Through encounters with his friends and uncle, follows a teenage boy's psychological development. He enters a magical world with a talking grey heron after finding an abandoned tower in his new town.

Title: Naruto
Summary: Naruto Uzumaki, a mischievous adolescent ninja, struggles as he searches for recognition and dreams of becoming the Hokage, the village's leader and strongest ninja.

Title: Mushoku Tensei: Jobless Reincarnation
Summary: A 34-year-old Japanese NEET is run over by a speeding truck and dies. Before he knows it, he is reborn as Rudeus Greyrat, and begins a new life full of adventure.
Stars: Yumi Uchiyama,Tomokazu Sugita,Amber Lee Connors,Ai Kakuma

Title: Vinland Saga
Summary: Thorfinn pursues a journey with his father's killer in order to take revenge and end his life in a duel as an honorable warrior and pay his father an homage.

Title: Sing 2
Summary: Buster Moon and his friends must persuade reclusive rock star Clay Calloway to join them for the opening of a new show.

Title: Zom 100: Bucket List of the Dead
Summary: A worker in A foreign finance company who always plays it safe on risk-reward, and has an internal list of "100 things you must do to not become a zombie".

Title: Spirited Away
Summary: During her family's move to the suburbs, a sullen 10-year-old girl wanders into a world ruled by gods, witches and spirits, a world where humans are changed into beasts.

Title: Hunter x Hunter
Summary: Gon Freecss aspires to become a Hunter, an exceptional being capable of greatness. With his friends and his potential, he seeks out his father, who left him when he was younger.

Title: Ruby Gillman, Teenage Kraken
Summary: A shy adolescent learns that she comes from a fabled royal family of legendary sea krakens and that her destiny lies in the depths of the waters, which is bigger than she could have ever imagined.

Title: My Hero Academia
Summary: A superhero-admiring boy without any powers enrolls in a prestigious hero academy and learns what it really means to be a hero.

Title: Death Note
Summary: An intelligent high school student goes on a secret crusade to eliminate criminals from the world after discovering a notebook capable of killing anyone whose name is written into it.

Title: Howl's Moving Castle
Summary: When an unconfident young woman is cursed with an old body by a spiteful witch, her only chance of breaking the spell lies with a self-indulgent yet insecure young wizard and his companions in his legged, walking castle.

Title: Toy Story
Summary: A cowboy doll is profoundly threatened and jealous when a new spaceman action figure supplants him as top toy in a boy's bedroom.

Title: The Lord of the Rings: The War of the Rohirrim
Summary: The untold story behind Helm's Deep, hundreds of years before the fateful war, telling the life and bloodsoaked times of its founder, Helm Hammerhand, the King of Rohan.

Title: My Happy Marriage
Summary: An unhappy young woman from an abusive family is married off to a fearsome and chilly army commander. But the two learn more about each other, love may have a chance.
Stars: Reina Ueda,Kaito Ishikawa,Houko Kuwashima,Damien C. Haas

Title: Chainsaw Man
Summary: Following a betrayal, a young man left for dead is reborn as a powerful devil-human hybrid after merging with his pet devil and is soon enlisted into an organization dedicated to hunting devils.
Stars: Kikunosuke Toya,Ryan Colt Levy,Tomori Kusunoki,Shogo Sakata

Title: Sing
Summary: In a city of humanoid animals, a hustling theater impresario's attempt to save his theater with a singing competition becomes grander than he anticipates even as its finalists find that their lives will never be the same.

Title: The Incredibles
Summary: While trying to lead a quiet suburban life, a family of undercover superheroes are forced into action to save the world.

Title: Inside Out
Summary: After young Riley is uprooted from her Midwest life and moved to San Francisco, her emotions - Joy, Fear, Anger, Disgust, and Sadness - conflict on how best to navigate a new city, house, and school.

Title: Baki
Summary: The protagonist, Baki Hanma, trains with an intense focus to become strong enough to surpass his father, Yujiro Hanma, the strongest fighter in the world.

Title: Dragon Ball Z
Summary: With the help of the powerful Dragonballs, a team of fighters led by the saiyan warrior Goku defend the planet earth from extraterrestrial enemies.

Title: Coco
Summary: Aspiring musician Miguel, confronted with his family's ancestral ban on music, enters the Land of the Dead to find his great-great-grandfather, a legendary singer.

Title: Black Clover

Title: Finding Nemo

Title: Fullmetal Alchemist: Brotherhood
Summary: Two brothers search for a Philosopher's Stone after an attempt to revive their deceased mother goes awry and leaves them in damaged physical forms.

Title: JoJo's Bizarre Adventure
Summary: The story of the Joestar family, who are possessed with intense psychic strength, and the adventures each member encounters throughout their lives.

Title: Your Name.
Summary: Two teenagers share a profound, magical connection upon discovering they are swapping bodies. Things manage to become even more complicated when the boy and girl decide to meet in person.

Title: Tangled
Summary: The magically long-haired Rapunzel has spent her entire life in a tower, but now that a runaway thief has stumbled upon her, she is about to discover the world for the first time, and who she really is.

Title: Up

Title: Resident Evil: Death Island
Summary: A t-virus outbreak in San Francisco leads to Alcatraz Island, where a new evil has taken residence.

Title: Hercules
Summary: The son of Zeus and Hera is stripped of his immortality as an infant and must become a true hero in order to reclaim it.

Title: One Punch Man
Summary: The story of Saitama, a hero that does it just for fun & can defeat his enemies with a single punch.

Title: The First Slam Dunk
Summary: Follows 17-year-old Ryota Miyagi, who struggles to accomplish his late elder brother's dream of becoming a basketball star.

Title: Boruto: Naruto Next Generations
Summary: Son of Naruto Uzumaki, Boruto, follows his father's footsteps along with his friends to become great ninja. Throughout all their adventures, Boruto is determined to make his mark in the ninja world and live outside of his father's shadow.

Title: WALL·E
Summary: In the distant future, a small waste-collecting robot inadvertently embarks on a space journey that will ultimately decide the fate of mankind.

Title: A Bug's Life
Summary: A misfit ant, looking for "warriors" to save his colony from greedy grasshoppers, recruits a group of bugs that turn out to be an inept circus troupe.

Title: The Little Mermaid
Summary: A mermaid princess makes a Faustian bargain in an attempt to become human and win a prince's love.

Title: Berserk
Summary: Guts, a wandering mercenary, joins the Band of the Hawk after being defeated in a duel by Griffith, the group's leader and founder. Together, they dominate every battle, but something menacing lurks in the shadows.
Stars: Marc Diraison,Nobutoshi Canna,Carrie Keranen,Kevin T. Collins

Title: The Bad Guys
Summary: To avoid prison, a gang of notorious animal criminals pretends to seek being rehabilitated, only for their leader to realize that he genuinely wants to change his ways.

Title: Beauty and the Beast
Summary: A prince cursed to spend his days as a hideous monster sets out to regain his humanity by earning a young woman's love.

Title: Scott Pilgrim Takes Off

Title: Monster
Summary: Dr. Kenzo Tenma, an elite neurosurgeon, finds his life in utter turmoil after following his conscience to operate on a small boy named Johan.

Title: Grave of the Fireflies
Summary: A young boy and his little sister struggle to survive in Japan during World War II.

Title: Aladdin
Summary: A kind-hearted street urchin and a power-hungry Grand Vizier vie for a magic lamp that has the power to make their deepest wishes come true.

Title: The Princess and the Frog
Summary: A waitress, desperate to fulfill her dreams as a restaurant owner, is set on a journey to turn a frog prince back into a human being, but she has to face the same problem after she kisses him.

Title: Mulan
Summary: To save her father from death in the army, a young maiden secretly goes in his place and becomes one of China's greatest heroines in the process.

Title: Pokémon
Summary: Ash Ketchum, his yellow pet Pikachu, and his human friends explore a world of powerful creatures.

Title: Soul
Summary: After landing the gig of a lifetime, a New York jazz pianist suddenly finds himself trapped in a strange land between Earth and the afterlife.

Title: Cowboy Bebop
Summary: The futuristic misadventures and tragedies of an easygoing bounty hunter and his partners.

Title: Toy Story 3
Summary: The toys are mistakenly delivered to a day-care center instead of the attic right before Andy leaves for college, and it's up to Woody to convince the other toys that they weren't abandoned and to return home.

Title: Princess Mononoke
Summary: On a journey to find the cure for a Tatarigami's curse, Ashitaka finds himself in the middle of a war between the forest gods and Tatara, a mining colony. In this quest he also meets San, the Mononoke Hime.

Title: Perfect Blue
Summary: A pop singer gives up her career to become an actress, but she slowly goes insane when she starts being stalked by an obsessed fan and what seems to be a ghost of her past.

Title: Tarzan
Summary: A man raised by gorillas must decide where he really belongs when he discovers he is a human.

Title: Big Hero 6
Summary: A special bond develops between plus-sized inflatable robot Baymax and prodigy Hiro Hamada, who together team up with a group of friends to form a band of high-tech heroes.

Title: Suzume
Summary: A modern action adventure road story where a 17-year-old girl named Suzume helps a mysterious young man close doors from the other side that are releasing disasters all over in Japan.

Title: Incredibles 2
Summary: The Incredibles family takes on a new mission which involves a change in family roles: Bob Parr (Mr. Incredible) must manage the house while his wife Helen (Elastigirl) goes out to save the world.

Title: Wreck-It Ralph
Summary: A video game villain wants to be a hero and sets out to fulfill his dream, but his quest brings havoc to the whole arcade where he lives.

Title: Brave
Summary: Determined to make her own path in life, Princess Merida defies a custom that brings chaos to her kingdom. Granted one wish, Merida must rely on her bravery and her archery skills to undo a beastly curse.

Title: Neon Genesis Evangelion
Summary: A teenage boy finds himself recruited as a member of an elite team of pilots by his father.

Title: One Piece Film: Red
Summary: For the first time ever, Uta - the most beloved singer in the world - will reveal herself to the world at a live concert. The voice that the whole world has been waiting for is about to resound.

Title: Lilo & Stitch
Summary: A young and parentless girl adopts a 'dog' from the local pound, completely unaware that it's supposedly a dangerous scientific experiment that's taken refuge on Earth and is now hiding from its creator and those who see it as a menace.

Title: Spy x Family
Summary: A spy on an undercover mission gets married and adopts a child as part of his cover. His wife and daughter have secrets of their own, and all three must strive to keep together.

Title: The Secret Life of Pets
Summary: The quiet life of a terrier named Max is upended when his owner takes in Duke, a stray whom Max instantly dislikes.

Title: Cars 3
Summary: Lightning McQueen sets out to prove to a new generation of racers that he's still the best race car in the world.

Title: Atlantis: The Lost Empire
Summary: A young linguist named Milo Thatch joins an intrepid group of explorers to find the mysterious lost continent of Atlantis.

Title: Dragon Ball Super
Summary: Six months after the defeat of Majin Buu, The mighty Saiyan Son Goku continues his quest on becoming stronger.

Title: Cars 2
Summary: Star race car Lightning McQueen and his pal Mater head overseas to compete in the World Grand Prix race. But the road to the championship becomes rocky as Mater gets caught up in an intriguing adventure of his own: international espionage.

Title: Gintama
Summary: In an era where aliens have invaded and taken over feudal Tokyo, an unemployed samurai finds work however he can.

Title: Heavenly Delusion

Title: Tokyo Revengers

Title: My Neighbor Totoro

Title: The Emperor's New Groove

Title: Pocahontas

Title: Frozen II
Summary: Anna, Elsa, Kristoff, Olaf and Sven leave Arendelle to travel to an ancient, autumn-bound forest of an enchanted land. They set out to find the origin of Elsa's powers in order to save their kingdom.

Title: Toy Story 2
Summary: When Woody is stolen by a toy collector, Buzz and his friends set out on a rescue mission to save Woody before he becomes a museum toy property with his roundup gang Jessie, Prospector, and Bullseye.

Title: Akira
Summary: A secret military project endangers Neo-Tokyo when it turns a biker gang member into a rampaging psychic psychopath who can only be stopped by a teenager, his gang of biker friends and a group of psychics.

Title: Hell's Paradise: Jigokuraku

Title: 【Oshi No Ko】
Summary: A doctor and his recently-deceased patient are reborn as twins to a famous Japanese musical idol and navigate the highs and lows of the Japanese entertainment industry as they grow up together through their lives.

Title: Haikyu!!
Summary: Determined to be like the volleyball championship's star player nicknamed "the small giant", Shoyo joins his school's volleyball club.

Title: Isle of Dogs
Summary: Set in Japan, Isle of Dogs follows a boy's odyssey in search of his lost dog.

Title: Lightyear
Summary: While spending years attempting to return home, marooned Space Ranger Buzz Lightyear encounters an army of ruthless robots commanded by Zurg who are attempting to steal his fuel source.

Title: Monsters University
Summary: A look at the relationship between Mike Wazowski (Billy Crystal) and James P. "Sully" Sullivan (John Goodman) during their days at Monsters University, when they weren't necessarily the best of friends.

Title: Sonic the Hedgehog 3
Summary: Plot under wraps

Title: Baki the Grappler
Summary: Baki Hanma competes in an underground fighting tournament organized by Tokugawa. Masters of various fighting styles come from all over the world in order to determine who is the strongest fighter on Earth.

Title: Onward
Summary: In a magical world full of technological advances, elven brothers Ian and Barley Lightfoot set out on an adventure to resurrect their late father for a day.

Title: Ralph Breaks the Internet
Summary: Six years after the events of "Wreck-It Ralph," Ralph and Vanellope, now friends, discover a wi-fi router in their arcade, leading them into a new adventure.

Title: Code Geass
Summary: After being given a mysterious power to control others, an outcast prince becomes the masked leader of the rebellion against an all-powerful empire.

Title: Dragon Ball
Summary: Son Gokû, a fighter with a monkey tail, goes on a quest with an assortment of odd characters in search of the Dragon Balls, a set of crystals that can give its bearer anything they desire.

Title: Paprika
Summary: When a machine that allows therapists to enter their patients' dreams is stolen, all hell breaks loose. Only a young female therapist, Paprika, can stop it.

Title: How to Train Your Dragon: The Hidden World
Summary: When Hiccup discovers Toothless isn't the only Night Fury, he must seek "The Hidden World", a secret Dragon Utopia before a hired tyrant named Grimmel finds it first.

Title: Mob Psycho 100
Summary: A psychic middle school boy tries to live a normal life and keep his growing powers under control, even though he constantly gets into trouble.

Title: Star Wars: Visions
Summary: Star Wars anthology series that will see some of the world's best anime creators bring their talent to this beloved universe.

Title: The Hunchback of Notre Dame
Summary: A deformed bell-ringer must assert his independence from a vicious government minister in order to help his friend, a gypsy dancer.

Title: Jujutsu Kaisen 0
Summary: Yuta Okkotsu, a high schooler who gains control of an extremely powerful Cursed Spirit and gets enrolled in the Tokyo Prefectural Jujutsu High School by Jujutsu Sorcerers to help him control his power and keep an eye on him.

Title: Despicable Me 2
Summary: When Gru, the world's most super-bad turned super-dad has been recruited by a team of officials to stop lethal muscle and a host of Gru's own, He has to fight back with new gadgetry, cars, and more minion madness.

Title: Ghost in the Shell
Summary: A cyborg policewoman and her partner hunt a mysterious and powerful hacker called the Puppet Master.

Title: Strange World
Summary: The legendary Clades are a family of explorers whose differences threaten to topple their latest and most crucial mission.

Title: Ponyo
Summary: A five-year-old boy develops a relationship with Ponyo, a young goldfish princess who longs to become a human after falling in love with him.

Title: Kiki's Delivery Service
Summary: A young witch, on her mandatory year of independent life, finds fitting into a new community difficult while she supports herself by running an air courier service.

Title: Re: Zero, Starting Life in Another World

Title: Bolt

Title: The Seven Deadly Sins
Summary: The story of the Seven Deadly Sins, a group of warriors who were wrongly accused of a crime they didn't commit and went on a quest to vindicate themselves.

Title: Steins;Gate
Summary: After discovering time travel, a university student and his colleagues must use their knowledge of it to stop an evil organization and their diabolical plans.

Title: A Silent Voice: The Movie
Summary: A young man is ostracized by his classmates after he bullies a deaf girl to the point where she moves away. Years later, he sets off on a path for redemption.

Title: The Wind Rises
Summary: A look at the life of Jiro Horikoshi, the man who designed Japanese fighter planes during World War II.

Title: Dr. Stone
Summary: Awakened into a world where humanity has been petrified, scientific genius Senku and his brawny friend Taiju use their skills to rebuild civilization.

Title: Tokyo Ghoul
Summary: A Tokyo college student is attacked by a ghoul, a superpowered human who feeds on human flesh. He survives, but has become part ghoul and becomes a fugitive on the run.

Title: Sword Art Online
Summary: In the year 2022, thousands of people get trapped in a new virtual MMORPG and the lone wolf player, Kirito, works to escape.

Title: Fairy Tail
Summary: Lucy, an aspiring Celestial Wizard, becomes a friend and ally to powerful wizards Natsu, Gray, and Erza, who are part of the (in)famous wizard guild, Fairy Tail.
Stars: Cherami Leigh,Todd Haberkorn,Tia Lynn Ballard,Tetsuya Kakihara

Title: The Good Dinosaur
Summary: In a world where dinosaurs and humans live side-by-side, an Apatosaurus named Arlo makes an unlikely human friend.

Title: Meet the Robinsons
Summary: Lewis is a brilliant inventor who meets mysterious stranger named Wilbur Robinson, whisking Lewis away in a time machine and together they team up to track down Bowler Hat Guy in a showdown that ends with an unexpected twist of fate.

Title: The Eminence in Shadow
Summary: Cid Kagenou creates an elaborate plot to fight the Cult of Diabolos and builds his organization, the Shadow Garden.

Title: Made in Abyss
Summary: A girl and her robot companion search for her mother, who's lost within a vast chasm.

Title: Rent-a-Girlfriend
Summary: After being dumped by his girlfriend, a college student enlists a dating service to "rent" a girlfriend who, unbeknownst to him, happens to be both a fellow student and his neighbor.

Title: High School DxD
Summary: After being killed on his first date, idiotic and perverted Issei Hyodo is resurrected as a demon by Rias Gremory only to be recruited into her club of high-class devils.

Title: Detective Conan
Summary: The cases of a detective whose physical age was chemically reversed to that of a prepubescent boy but must hide his true mental development.

Title: Mech Cadets
Summary: An underdog teen joins a group of young Cadets who've been chosen to bond with Robo Mechs from space and defend Earth against alien invaders.
Stars: Brandon Soo Hoo,Aparna Brielle,Victoria Grace,Josh Sundquist

Title: Record of Ragnarok
Summary: Every 1000 years, the Gods' Council assemble to decide the fate of humanity. After 7 million years of human history, the gods come to the decision that humans are irredeemable and must be extinct.

Title: Castle in the Sky
Summary: A young boy and a girl with a magic crystal must race against pirates and foreign agents in a search for a legendary floating castle.

Title: Chicken Little
Summary: After ruining his reputation with the town, a courageous chicken must come to the rescue of his fellow citizens when aliens start an invasion.

Title: The Promised Neverland
Summary: When three gifted kids at an isolated idyllic orphanage discover the secret and sinister purpose they were raised for, they look for a way to escape from their evil caretaker and lead the other children in a risky escape plan.

Title: Nausicaä of the Valley of the Wind
Summary: Warrior and pacifist Princess Nausicaä desperately struggles to prevent two warring nations from destroying themselves and their dying planet.

Title: Dragon Ball
Summary: Dragon Ball tells the tale of a young warrior by the name of Son Goku, a young peculiar boy with a tail who embarks on a quest to become stronger and learns of the Dragon Balls, when, once all 7 are gathered, grant any wish of choice.

Title: Kaguya-sama: Love is War
Summary: The proudly privileged top two students of an elite school each makes it their mission to be the first to extract a confession of love from the other.

Title: Horimiya
Summary: Two very different people - an academically successful schoolgirl and a quiet loser schoolboy - meet and develop a friendship.

Title: Erased
Summary: 29-year-old Satoru Fujinuma is sent back in time 18 years to prevent the events leading to his mother's death, which began with a series of kidnappings while he was in 5th grade.

Title: Brother Bear
Summary: When a young Inuit hunter needlessly kills a bear, he is magically changed into a bear himself as punishment with a talkative cub being his only guide to changing back.

Title: Parasyte: The Maxim
Summary: 17-year-old Shinichi Izumi is partially infected by a Parasyte, monsters that butcher and consume humans. He must learn to co-exist with the creature if he is to survive both the life of a Parasyte and a human as part monster, part person.

Title: Dinosaur
Summary: An orphaned dinosaur raised by lemurs joins an arduous trek to a sanctuary after a meteorite shower destroys his family home.

Title: Blue Lock
Summary: High school soccer players from across Japan gather for a controversial project designed to create the best and most egoistic striker in the world.

Title: Fruits Basket
Summary: After Tohru is taken in by the Soma family, she learns that twelve family members transform involuntarily into animals of the Chinese zodiac and helps them deal with the emotional pain caused by the transformations.

Title: Demon Slayer the Movie: Mugen Train
Summary: After his family was brutally murdered and his sister turned into a demon, Tanjiro Kamado's journey as a demon slayer began. Tanjiro and his comrades embark on a new mission aboard the Mugen Train, on track to despair.

Title: That Time I Got Reincarnated as a Slime

Title: Weathering with You
Summary: Set during a period of exceptionally rainy weather, high-school boy Hodaka Morishima runs away from his troubled rural home to Tokyo and befriends an orphan girl who can manipulate the weather.

Title: Bungo Stray Dogs
Summary: Nakajima Atsushi was kicked out of his orphanage, and now he has no place to go and no food. While he is standing by a river, on the brink of starvation, he rescues a man whimsically attempting suicide. That man is Dazai Osamu, and he and his partner Kunikida are members of a very special detective agency. They have supernatural powers and deal with cases that are too dangerous for the police or the military. They're tracking down a tiger that has appeared in the area recently, around the time Atsushi came to the area. The tiger seems to have a connection to Atsushi, and by the time the case is solved, it is clear that Atsushi's future will involve much more of Dazai and the rest of the detectives.

Title: Berserk
Summary: Guts, "The Black Swordsman", is pursued by demons who are attracted to him, due to a demonic brand on his neck. His goal is to free himself, and his lover Casca, of this inescapable curse. His other life's goal is gain vengeance on his former best friend Griffith, who doomed him and his former Band of Mercenaries, to obtain demonic powers of his own. Gut's giant "Dragon Slayer" sword, the Elf Puck and a growing band of misfit companion aid him in his quest for vengeance.
Stars: Max Mittelman,Sarah Anne Williams,Erik Scott Kimerer,Hiroaki Iwanaga

Title: The Cat Returns
Summary: After helping a cat, a seventeen-year-old girl finds herself involuntarily engaged to a cat Prince in a magical world where her only hope of freedom lies with a dapper cat statuette come to life.

Title: Akame ga Kill!
Summary: A countryside boy named Tatsumi sets out on a journey to The Capital to make a name for himself and met a seemingly dangerous group of Assassins known as Night Raid. Their journey begins.

Title: Your Lie in April
Summary: A piano prodigy who lost his ability to play after suffering a traumatic event in his childhood is forced back into the spotlight by an eccentric girl with a secret of her own.

Title: Classroom of the Elite
Summary: When Kiyotaka enters government-sponsored elite high school, he finds out just how merit-based this education system is.

Title: Devilman: Crybaby
Summary: With demons reawakened and humanity in turmoil, a sensitive demon-boy is led into a brutal, degenerate war against evil by his mysterious friend, Ryo.

Title: Violet Evergarden
Summary: In the aftermath of a great war, Violet Evergarden, a young female ex-soldier, gets a job at a writers' agency and goes on assignments to create letters that can connect people.

Title: Neon Genesis Evangelion: The End of Evangelion
Summary: Concurrent theatrical ending of the TV series

Title: My Dress-Up Darling
Summary: Traumatized by a childhood incident with a friend who took exception to his love of traditional dolls, doll-artisan hopeful Wakana Gojou passes his days as a loner, finding solace in a room at his high school.

Title: The Rescuers Down Under
Summary: R.A.S. agents Miss Bianca and Bernard race to Australia to save a little boy and a rare golden eagle from a murderous poacher.

Title: Dragon Ball Z Kai
Summary: An enhanced and HD remaster of Dragon Ball Z.

Title: Mashle: Magic and Muscles
Summary: Into a world of magicians is born Mash, a young boy who lacks magic but is the strongest person around. His existence and destiny will change his world.

Title: Inside Out 2
Summary: Follow Riley, in her teenage years encountering new emotions.

Title: Psycho-Pass
Summary: Believing in humanity and order, policewoman Akane Tsunemori obeys the ruling, computerized, precognitive Sibyl System. But when she faces a criminal mastermind who can elude this perfect system, she questions both Sibyl and herself.

Title: Highschool of the Dead
Summary: High school students are overwhelmed with the start of the zombie apocalypse.

Title: Fullmetal Alchemist
Summary: When a failed alchemical ritual leaves brothers Edward and Alphonse Elric with severely damaged bodies, they begin searching for the one thing that can save them: the fabled philosopher's stone.

Title: Fire Force
Summary: A superhuman firefighter force is formed to deal with supernatural fire incidents.

Title: Gargoyles: The Goliath Chronicles
Summary: A clan of heroic night creatures pledge to protect modern New York City as they did in Scotland one thousand years earlier.

The Republic of San Magnolia is at war with its neighboring country, the Empire of Giad. Both sides use unmanned drones to conduct a "war without casualties". The story follows Lena as she commands a squad of drones called the 86.

Title: Porco Rosso
Summary: In 1930s Italy, a veteran World War I pilot is cursed to look like an anthropomorphic pig.

Title: Black Lagoon
Summary: A Japanese businessman, captured by modern-day pirates, is written off and left for dead by his company. Tired of the corporate life, he opts to stick with the mercenaries that kidnapped him, becoming part of their gang.

Title: The Secret World of Arrietty
Summary: The Clock family are four-inch-tall people who live anonymously in another family's residence, borrowing simple items to make their home. Life changes for the Clocks when their teenage daughter Arrietty is discovered.

Title: Sonic Prime
Summary: Sonic in a high-octane adventure where the fate of a strange new multiverse rests in his gloved hands.
Stars: Deven Christian Mack,Ashleigh Ball,Vincent Tong,Kazumi Evans

Title: Demon Slayer: Kimetsu No Yaiba - To the Swordsmith Village
Summary: All the Upper Rank Demons assemble at the Infinity Castle after Upper Six Demons' defeat.

Title: Samurai Champloo
Summary: Fuu, a waitress who works in a teahouse, rescues two master swordsmen, Mugen and Jin, from their execution to help her find the "samurai who smells of sunflowers."

Title: Assassination Classroom
Summary: A powerful creature claims that within a year, Earth will be destroyed by him, but he offers mankind a chance by becoming a homeroom teacher where he teaches his students about how to kill him. An assassination classroom begins.

Title: Dragon Ball Super: Super Hero
Summary: The Red Ribbon Army from Goku's past has returned with two new androids to challenge him and his friends.

Title: Serial Experiments Lain
Summary: Strange things start happening when a withdrawn girl named Lain becomes obsessed with an interconnected virtual realm known as "The Wired".

Title: Goblin Slayer
Summary: In a fantasy world, a lone hero makes his living by exterminating all goblins he encounters. But one day he meets a friend, and his life begins to become more intense.

Title: Belle
Summary: Suzu is a shy high school student living in a rural village. For years, she has only been a shadow of herself. But when she enters "U", a massive virtual world, she escapes into her online persona as Belle, a globally-beloved singer.

Title: Overlord
Summary: An office worker in a dystopian world logs onto a video game for the last time only to find out that he, along with his entire guild, has been transported to another reality.

Title: Titan A.E.
Summary: A young man learns that he has to find a hidden Earth ship before an enemy alien species does in order to secure the survival of humanity.

Title: Elfen Lied
Summary: Two university students come across a seemingly harmless girl named Lucy, unaware that she's actually a mutant serial killer with a split personality.

Title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
Summary: Yugi Moto solves an Ancient Egyptian Puzzle and brings forth a dark and powerful alter ego. Whenever he and his friends are threatened by evil in Duel Monster Card Game, this alter ego breaks out to save them.

Title: The Misfit of Demon King Academy
Summary: A demon mage reincarnates into the body of his descendant hoping to find an era where he can have some peace and quiet. He ends up going to a school run by his significantly weaker descendants.

Title: Dragon Ball Super: Broly
Summary: Goku and Vegeta encounter Broly, a Saiyan warrior unlike any fighter they've faced before.

Title: Whisper of the Heart
Summary: A love story between a girl who loves reading books, and a boy who has previously checked out all of the library books she chooses.

Title: The Last Unicorn
Summary: A beautiful unicorn sets out to learn if she truly is the last of her kind in this sparkling animated musical.

Title: Winnie the Pooh
Summary: While searching for honey, Pooh and his friends embark on an adventure to find Eeyore's missing tail and rescue Christopher Robin from an unknown monster called The Backson.

Title: Sailor Moon
Summary: A group of schoolgirls discover they are incarnations of super-powered alien princesses, and use their abilities to defend the earth.

Title: Is It Wrong to Try to Pick Up Girls in a Dungeon?
Summary: In the city of Orario, where adventurers hunt monsters in a place called Dungeon, Bell Cranel's life was saved by a swordswoman, who is then become the source of Bell's determination to get stronger.

Title: Inuyasha
Summary: A teenage girl periodically travels back in time to feudal Japan to help a young half-demon recover the shards of a jewel of great power.
Stars: Kappei Yamaguchi,Richard Ian Cox,Sarah Hauser,Darren Pleavin

Title: Rurouni Kenshin
Summary: The adventures of a young wandering swordsman who stumbles upon a struggling martial arts school in Meiji era Japan.

Title: Fighting Spirit
Summary: Ippo, a teenage boy with a pure heart and unrelenting determination, discovers a passion for boxing after veteran fighter Takamura saves him from bullies.

Title: Konosuba: God's Blessing on This Wonderful World!
Summary: It was a happy day for Kazuma - right up to the moment he died. A goddess intervenes and offers him a second chance in a magical land.

Title: The Transformers
Summary: Two opposing factions of transforming alien robots engage in a battle that has the fate of Earth in the balance.

Title: Redo of Healer
Summary: Keyaru is a healing magician who is sexually abused repeatedly by others. Using his healing magic, he goes back four years into the past to get revenge on the ones who abused him.

Title: Vampire Hunter D: Bloodlust
Summary: A legendary dhampir competes with a motley family of bounty hunters to return a young woman, who has been seemingly abducted by a vampire, to her family.

Title: Rurouni Kenshin
Summary: During the violent era known as the Bakumatsu, there was an Ishin assassin known only as the Hitokiri Battousai, whose skill and brutality became near legendary in the age of Restoration he helped to build. However, as the time of fighting drew to a close, he vanished without a trace, only to resurface eleven years later as a wandering swordsman, Himura Kenshin. Now staying at a kenjutsu dojo maintained by a fiery-tempered woman named Kamiya Kaoru, and surrounded by newfound friends like the streetfighter Sagara Sanosuke, ex-samurai's son Myoujin Yahiko, and the shrewd doctor Takani Megumi, he seeks to carry out his vow to protect the weak without killing in order to atone for the lives he's taken. It's not long, though, before this vow is put to the test, and the shadows of his past return to haunt him and everyone he holds dear.

Title: One Piece: The Movie
Summary: There once was a pirate known as the Great Gold Pirate Woonan, who obtained almost 1/3 of the world's gold. Over the course of a few years, the pirate's existence faded, and a legend grew that he disappeared with his gold to a remote island, an island pirates continue to search for. Aboard the Going Merry, Luffy and his crew, starved and reckless, are robbed of their treasure. In an attempt to get it back, they wreck the getaway ship, guided by a young boy named Tabio, who's a captured part of El Drago's pirate crew. El Drago's love for gold has driven him to look for Woonan's island, and thanks to Woonan's treasure map, he finds it. During this time, Luffy's crew have been split up, and despite their own circumstances, they must find a way to stop El Drago from obtaining Woonan's gold.

Title: The Hobbit
Summary: A homebody hobbit in Middle Earth gets talked into joining a quest with a group of dwarves to recover their treasure from a dragon.

Title: Bastard!! Heavy Metal, Dark Fantasy
Summary: When evil forces threaten to resurrect Anthrasax, the God of Destruction, the Kingdom of Meta-llicana calls on a volatile dark wizard for help.

Title: Dragon Ball Z
Summary: The adventures of Earth's martial arts defender, Son Goku, continue with a new family and the revelation of his alien origins. Now Goku and his allies must defend the planet from an onslaught of new extraterrestrial enemies.

Title: Rascal Does Not Dream of Bunny Girl Senpai
Summary: The seemingly normal life of Sakuta Azusagawa, a high school student changes drastically when he meets a wild bunny girl that seems to be invisible to others.

Title: The Rising of the Shield Hero
Summary: A gamer is magically summoned into a parallel universe, where he is chosen as one of four heroes destined to save the world from its prophesied doom.

Title: Dororo
Summary: A father in pursuit of power gives parts of his new-born son to a host of demons. Years later, the son battles those demons to regain what is rightfully his.

Title: Black Clover: Sword of the Wizard King
Summary: In a world where magic is everything, Asta, a boy who was born with no magic, aims to become the "Wizard King" to overcome adversity, prove his power, and keep his oath with his friends.

Title: Hellsing Ultimate
Summary: The vampire Alucard, his master Sir Integra Fairbrook Wingates Hellsing, and his newly sired ward Seras Victoria, try to protect England from a war-crazed SS-Major who seeks to start an eternal war with his vampire army.

Title: Yu Yu Hakusho: Ghost Files
Summary: After a teenage delinquent is killed while saving a child's life from an approaching car, the rulers of the underworld send him back to become an "Underworld Detective" investigating demons apparitions in the human world.

Title: Super Dragon Ball Heroes
Summary: The Z-Fighters set out to rescue Trunks from a prison planet.

Title: Food Wars
Summary: Soma Yukihira enrolls in an elite culinary school to become a full-time chef and surpass his father's culinary skills.

Title: The Tale of The Princess Kaguya
Summary: Found inside a shining stalk of bamboo by an old bamboo cutter and his wife, a tiny girl grows rapidly into an exquisite young lady. The mysterious young princess enthralls all who encounter her, but ultimately she must confront her fate, the punishment for her crime.

Title: Kengan Ashura
Summary: A timid old man is summoned by his chairman to become the manager of Tokita Ohma, a highly skilled gladiator who only cares about fighting and winning in the Kengan matches.

Title: The Transformers: The Movie
Summary: The Autobots must stop a colossal planet consuming robot who goes after the Autobot Matrix of Leadership. At the same time, they must defend themselves against an all-out attack from the Decepticons.

Title: Mulan II
Summary: While preparing for their wedding, Shang and Mulan are suddenly sent off on a secret mission. Mushu starts to meddle, and a surprise attack by Mongolians doesn't help either.

Title: Darling in the Franxx
Summary: In a future world where humanity has been driven to endangerment by giant beasts, a strike force is assembled to destroy the monsters and save the world.

Title: When Marnie Was There
Summary: Due to 12-year-old Anna's asthma, she's sent to stay with relatives of her guardian in the Japanese countryside. She likes to be alone, sketching. She befriends Marnie. Who is the mysterious, blonde Marnie?

Title: Ooku: The Inner Chambers
Summary: In an alternate history where the male population is nearly decimated, eligible men serve as concubines to the woman shogun inside the walls of the Ooku.

Title: Barefoot Gen
Summary: A powerful statement against war, Barefoot Gen is a disturbing story about the effect of the atomic bomb on a boy's life and the lives of the Japanese people.

Title: The Devil Is a Part-Timer!
Summary: Hilarity and fun ensues when Satan ends up in modern day Japan without any magic to return, and starts working part time in a fast food joint.
Stars: Josh Grelle,Felecia Angelle,Tia Lynn Ballard,Anthony Bowling

Title: Slam Dunk
Summary: About Sakuragi Hanamichi, a freshman of Shohoku High School who joins the basketball team because of the girl he has a crush on, Haruko. Although he is newbie in this sport, he is no ordinary basketball player.

Title: Prison School
Summary: Hachimitsu Academy, once an all-girls school, has become co-ed, and teen Kiyoshi is one of five boys to enroll. When he is caught peeping, Kiyoshi is sent to the schools prison, where his punishment is carried out.

Title: Redline
Summary: A story about the most popular racing event in the galaxy, the Redline, and the various racers who compete in it.

Title: The Garden of Words
Summary: A 15-year-old boy and 27-year-old woman find an unlikely friendship one rainy day in the Shinjuku Gyoen National Garden.

Title: Nier: Automata Ver1.1a
Summary: Animated adaptation of

Title: Tales from Earthsea
Summary: In a mythical land, a man and a young boy investigate a series of unusual occurrences.

Title: Pokémon: The First Movie - Mewtwo Strikes Back
Summary: Scientists genetically create a new Pokémon, Mewtwo, but the results are horrific and disastrous.

Title: Astro Boy
Summary: When an android replica of a boy is rejected by his aggrieved creator, he goes off to find his own identity in an adventure that would make him the greatest hero of his time.

Title: Abominable
Summary: Three teenagers must help a Yeti return to his family while avoiding a wealthy man and a zoologist who want him for their own needs.

Title: Beastars
Summary: In a world of anthropomorphic animals, a reclusive wolf's complicated relationship with a kindly rabbit is tested by a classmate's murder, a charismatic deer's influence, and his own burgeoning predatory instincts.
Stars: Chikahiro Kobayashi,Jonah Scott,Lara Jill Miller,Griffin Puatu

Title: Pokémon Horizons
Summary: Liko, whose partner Pokémon is Sprigatito, and Roy will encounter many characters during their journey, including a group called the Rising Volt Tacklers.

Title: Ninja Scroll
Summary: A vagabond swordsman is aided by a kunoichi and a spy in battling a demonic clan of killers - led by a ghost from his past - who are bent on overthrowing the Tokugawa Shogunate.

Title: Fate/Zero
Summary: Seven chosen mages and their summoned heroic spirits fight against each other to try and win the Holy Grail: a magical device that can grant any wish.

Title: 5 Centimeters per Second
Summary: Told in three interconnected segments, Takaki tells the story of his life as cruel winters, cold technology, and finally, adult obligations and responsibility converge to test the delicate petals of love.

Title: Ranking of Kings
Summary: The people of the kingdom look down on the young Prince Bojji, who can neither hear nor speak. They call him "The Useless Prince" while jeering at his supposed foolishness.

Title: Kingdom
Summary: In ancient China, a young boy dreams of becoming the greatest general of the Qin Kingdom.

Title: From Up on Poppy Hill
Summary: A group of Yokohama teens look to save their school's clubhouse from the wrecking ball in preparations for the 1964 Tokyo Olympics.

Title: Gurren Lagann
Summary: Two friends, Simon and Kamina, become the symbols of rebellion against the powerful Spiral King, who forced mankind into subterranean villages.

Title: Memories
Summary: An animated science fiction anthology from the visionary anime director, Katsuhiro Otomo.

Title: Evangelion: 3.0+1.01 Thrice Upon a Time
Summary: The fourth and final installment of the Rebuild of Evangelion. Misato and her anti-Nerv group Wille arrive in Paris, a city now red from core-ization. Crew from the flagship Wunder land on a containment tower.

Title: Vampire Hunter D
Summary: When Doris Lang is chosen as the next bride for the vampire Count Magnus Lee, she will hire a mysterious vampire hunter known only as D in an attempt to escape her ill-gotten fate.

Title: Gantz: O
Summary: After being brutally murdered in a subway station, a teen boy awakens to find himself resurrected by a strange computer named Gantz, and forced to fight a large force of invading aliens in Osaka.

Title: Komi Can't Communicate
Summary: An elite and aloof schoolgirl is in fact severely withdrawn and anxious about communicating with others. An ordinary schoolboy befriends her and helps her to open up and talk with people.

Title: Digimon: Digital Monsters
Summary: A group of young teens is unexpectedly sent to the mysterious Digital World and paired up with their own powerful, morphing monster called the Digimon. Together the entire group set out on an adventure to fight evil and save the world.
Stars: Steve Blum,Mona Marshall,Tifanie Christun,Derek Stephen Prince

Title: I Want to Eat Your Pancreas
Summary: A high school student discovers one of his classmates, Sakura Yamauchi, is suffering from a terminal illness. This secret brings the two together, as she lives out her final moments.

Title: DuckTales
Summary: The globe-trotting treasure-hunting money-making adventures of billionaire Scrooge McDuck and his nephews.

Title: Aladdin 2: The Return of Jafar
Summary: Jafar comes for revenge on Aladdin, using a foolish thief and Iago's treachery to find a way back into power.

Title: My Teen Romantic Comedy SNAFU
Summary: About an antisocial high school student named Hikigaya Hachiman with a distorted view on life and no friends or girlfriend. His life change when he was forced to enter the "Volunteer Service Club" by his teacher.

Title: Summer Time Rendering
Summary: Upon hearing of Ushio's death, Shinpei returns to his hometown of Wakayama City on Hitogashima and reunites with his childhood friend's family. The funeral goes smoothly, but under the surface something strange is brewing on the island. What mysteries await him on this secluded summer island?

Title: Treasure Planet
Summary: In this science fiction rendering of the classic novel "Treasure Island", Jim Hawkins (Joseph Gordon-Levitt) is a rebellious teen seen by the world as an aimless slacker. After he receives a map from a dying pirate, he embarks on an odyssey across the universe to find the legendary Treasure Planet.

Title: Masamune-kun's Revenge
Summary: As a child, Masamune Makabe once suffered greatly at the hands of a wealthy and beautiful girl named Aki Adagaki, who nicknamed him "Piggy" due to his chubby appearance. Seeking revenge against his tormentor, Masamune works hard to improve himself and returns as an incredibly handsome, albeit narcissistic, high school student. When he encounters Aki once again, he is prepared to exact vengeance. With the aid of the rich girl's maid, Yoshino Koiwai, Masamune slowly begins to build his relationship with Aki, intending to break her heart when the time is right. However, as his friendship with Aki begins to grow, Masamune starts to question the objectives of his devious plans, and if bringing them to fruition is what his heart truly desires.

Title: Junji Ito Maniac: Japanese Tales of the Macabre
Summary: From the mind of horror manga maestro Junji Ito comes a spine-tingling selection of some of his most bizarre, disturbing and terrifying tales.
Stars: Bill Millsap,Dorah Fine,Mike McFarland,Amber Lee Connors

Title: Kakegurui
Summary: A gambling prodigy comes to an elite school run by games and turns the order upside down.

Title: Earwig and the Witch
Summary: An orphan girl, Earwig, is adopted by a witch and comes home to a spooky house filled with mystery and magic.

Title: Hop
Summary: E.B., the Easter Bunny's teenage son, heads to Hollywood, determined to become a drummer in a rock 'n' roll band. In LA, he's taken in by Fred after the out-of-work slacker hits E.B. with his car.

Title: Bocchi the Rock!
Summary: Hitori "Bocchi-chan" Goto is a lonely high school girl whose heart lies in her guitar; she meets Nijika Ijichi and joins "Kessoku Band."

Title: Blade Runner: Black Lotus
Summary: Animated series that takes place 17 years before 'Blade Runner 2049'.
Stars: Arisa Shida,Jessica Henwick,Will Yun Lee,Shinshû Fuji

Title: Vermeil in Gold: A Desperate Magician Barges Into the Magical World Alongside the Strongest Calamity
Summary: Alto Goldfield, a student at a magical academy inscribes a magic circle, ends up summoning a powerful demon named Vermeil, makes her his familiar.

Title: Legend of the Galactic Heroes
Summary: Various people, especially two rising commanders, cope with a massive continual space conflict between two interstellar nations.

Title: Berserk: The Golden Age Arc - Memorial Edition
Summary: A lone sellsword named Guts gets recruited into a mercenary band and attempts to help the Band's leader, Griffith, on his rise to power.

Title: Banana Fish
Summary: The story captures the war between a mafia boss named Dino and a young gang leader searching for redemption.

Title: The Animatrix
Summary: A collection of nine short films featuring stories related to
Stars: James Arnold Taylor,Julia Fletcher,Dwight Schultz,Kevin Michael Richardson

Title: Afro Samurai
Summary: A Black samurai goes on a mission to avenge the wrongful death of his father in a futuristic feudal Japan.
Stars: Samuel L. Jackson,Phil LaMarr,Yuri Lowenthal,Greg Eagles

Title: Trigun
Summary: Vash the Stampede is the most infamous outlaw on the planet Gunsmoke and with a 60 billion double dollar price on his head the most sought after!
Stars: Masaya Onosaka,Hiromi Tsuru,Satsuki Yukino,Johnny Yong Bosch

Title: Cowboy Bebop: The Movie
Summary: A terrorist explosion releases a deadly virus on the masses, and it's up to the bounty-hunting Bebop crew to catch the cold-blooded culprit.

Title: FLCL
Summary: Mysterious things start happening when 12-year-old Naota meets a strange woman on a Vespa wielding a big guitar.

Title: The Future Diary
Summary: A young man competes with people around the world for a chance to become the succesor of God, with a diary that is able to tell the future.

Title: Home on the Range
Summary: To save their farm, the resident animals go bounty hunting for a notorious outlaw.

Title: KILL la KILL
Summary: A young girl arrives at a school of superhumans to find out the truth behind her father's murder.

Title: Hunter x Hunter
Summary: The history of Gon Freecs, a boy who left home alone to become a Hunter. In the hard test, Gon meets Leorio, Kurapika and Killua.

Title: Ergo Proxy
Summary: In a post-apocalyptic future humans live in peace with androids in a domed city. However, a strange series of murders has intruded into bored inspector Re-l Mayer's life.

Title: Undead Murder Farce
Summary: In a world inhabited by vampires, golems, werewolves and other creatures, Aya Rindo, along with Tsugaru Shunichi and Shizuku Hasei, travels as supernatural detective, solving mysteries while she looks for her lost body.

Title: Only Yesterday
Summary: A twenty-seven-year-old office worker travels to the countryside while reminiscing about her childhood in Tokyo.

Title: Welcome to Marwen
Summary: A victim of a brutal attack finds a unique and beautiful therapeutic outlet to help him through his recovery process.

Title: My Love Story with Yamada-kun at Lv999
Summary: After her boyfriend breaks up with her for another girl, Akane Kinoshita decides she is going to make him regret his decision. Unexpectedly, however, she meets a socially awkward gamer who might just solve all of her problems.

Title: The Red Turtle
Summary: A man is shipwrecked on a deserted island and encounters a red turtle, which changes his life.

Title: Paranoia Agent
Summary: Seemingly unconnected citizens of Tokyo are targeted for bludgeoning by a boy with a golden baseball bat. As detectives try to link the victims, they discover that following the assaults, the victims' lives have improved in some way.

Title: Kuroko's Basketball
Summary: Kagami meets Kuroko, the 6th member of the Miracle Generation, and they make a pact to defeat the other members of the team. A battle of light (Kagami) and shadow (Kuroko) begins.

Title: Ultraman
Summary: Shinjiro Hayata learns that his father passed on the "Ultraman Factor" to him and fights against evil.

Title: Rin: Daughters of Mnemosyne
Summary: Rin Asogi runs a private investigation agency in Tokyo's Shinjuku district, performing odd jobs. Despite attempts at a normal life, she finds herself constantly hindered by the strange cases that come her way.

Title: Golden Boy
Summary: A University drop-out rides Japan on his bicycle, taking part-time jobs and trying not to take women.

Title: Nana
Summary: Two ostensibly opposite women, both named Nana, become roommates in Tokyo and grow inseparable. However, their relationship is jeopardized as the harsh realities of adult life take shape.

Title: Midori
Summary: The story based off of the controversial manga by Suehiro Maruo takes place where a little orphaned girl joins a freak-show circus troupe whose members rape and abuse her. She then finds a glimmer of hope in the enigmatic magician who joins the group.

Title: Tomodachi Game
Summary: Yuuichi Katagiri knows the hardships of not having enough funds. He works hard to save up in order to go on the high school trip. However, after the class' money is all collected; it's stolen. Suspicion falls on two of Yuuichi's friends.

Title: Demon Slayer: Kimetsu no Yaiba - Tsuzumi Mansion Arc
Summary: Tanjiro ventures to the south-southeast where he encounters a cowardly young man named Zenitsu Agatsuma. He is a fellow survivor from Final Selection and his sparrow asks Tanjiro to help keep him in line.

Title: To Your Eternity
Summary: A lonely boy wandering the Arctic regions of North America meets a wolf, and the two become fast friends, depending on each other to survive the harsh environment. But the boy has a history, and the wolf is more than meets the eye as well.

Title: Death Parade
Summary: After death, humans go to either heaven or hell. But for some, at the instant of their death, they arrive at the Quindecim, a bar attended by the mysterious white-haired Decim.

Title: The Disastrous Life of Saiki K.
Summary: Saiki Kusuo is a powerful psychic who hates attracting attention, yet he is surrounded by colorful characters who always find a way to remove him from his everyday life.

Title: One Piece: Stampede
Summary: Pirates from around the world gather at the Pirates Expo to join the hunt for Gol D. Roger's lost treasure.

Title: The Return of the King
Summary: Two Hobbits struggle to destroy the Ring in Mount Doom while their friends desperately fight evil Lord Sauron's forces in a final battle.

Title: Early Man
Summary: Set at the dawn of time, when prehistoric creatures and woolly mammoths roamed the earth, Early Man tells the story of Dug, along with sidekick Hognob as they unite his tribe against a mighty enemy Lord Nooth and his Bronze Age City to save their home.

Title: Belladonna of Sadness
Summary: After being raped by an evil feudal lord and subsequently getting banished from her village, a peasant girl makes a pact with the Devil to gain magical powers and take her revenge.

Title: Initial D: First Stage
Summary: The story of a young delivery boy who becomes a drift-racing legend.

Title: Moriarty the Patriot
Summary: William James Moriarty lives as a regular noble while also being a consultant for the common folk to solve their problems. However, deep inside him lies a desire to destroy the current structure that dominates British society.
Stars: Sôma Saitô,Aaron Dismuke,Theo Devaney,Ryan Colt Levy

Title: Pom Poko
Summary: A community of magical shape-shifting raccoon dogs struggle to prevent their forest home from being destroyed by urban development.

Title: How NOT to Summon a Demon Lord
Summary: An elite player is summoned by two maidens to save a fantasy game.

Title: Synduality: Noir
Summary: The year is 2242. Kanata wants to be a Drifter and meets Noir, who is a dud Magus with no memories. However, because Noir excels in battle against the Enders, Kanata partners with her and discovers exactly what it takes to be a Drifter.

Title: Why the Hell are You Here, Teacher!?
Summary: A comedy about female teachers who can't help developing romantic interests in their male students.

Title: Sugar Apple Fairy Tale
Summary: Anne Halford is a candy crafter determined to follow in her mother's footsteps and become a Silver Sugar Master, a title bestowed only by royalty. In order to travel to the capital and realize her dream, she purchases Challe, a handsome but foul-mouthed fairy, as her bodyguard. Anne wishes to befriend her new companion, but in this kingdom where fairies are treated as property, Challe wants nothing to do with humans.

Title: Horimiya: The Missing Pieces
Summary: It followed the relationship between Hori and Miyamura, two high school kids slowly forming a bond and falling in love - but only so much manga can be adapted and put into a thirteen-episode series. "Horimiya: The Missing Pieces" is here to fix that: It goes back to the beginning of the original series and fills in the pieces of the original manga that were left out in the first adaptation. From silly moments to quiet ones, this is a chance to reconnect with your favorite characters and see what happened between the scenes of the original.
Stars: Marisa Duran,Mauricio Ortiz-Segura,Johnny Yong Bosch,Zeno Robinson

Title: Call of the Night
Summary: Kou Yamori is an average middle school student who struggles with grasping the complex concept of love. Because he sees little sense in surrendering to the norm, he soon stops going to school. Plagued with insomnia due to his idleness, Kou begins roaming the lonesome streets at night. One night, Kou encounters a bizarre girl named Nazuna Nanakusa who believes that people stay awake during the night because they are dissatisfied with how they spent their day and cannot rest until they release their inhibitions. Nazuna offers to help Kou with his sleep issues and invites him over to her place, where she convinces him to share a futon with her. Feeling uncomfortable, Kou only pretends to doze off-which is when Nazuna suddenly bites his neck and reveals herself to be a vampire. While Kou thinks the bite will turn him into a vampire, the specifics of transforming are not that simple. In order to change, he must be bitten by someone he truly loves. Ready to let go of his dreary mortal life, Kou decides on a new goal: he will fall in love with Nazuna and become a vampire.

Title: Wicked City
Summary: While protecting a signatory to a peace treaty between their peoples, a male human and a female demon discover that their mutual attraction may be the key to unifying their worlds.

Title: Interspecies Reviewers
Summary: From elves to succubi to fairies and more, Our heroes: Stunk, a human, Zel, an elf and a hermaphrodite angel named Crimvael are here to rate the red-light delights of all manner of monster girls.

Title: Inspector Gadget
Summary: A bumbling bionic police inspector stumbles about on his cases, while his niece and dog secretly do the real investigative work.

Title: A Whisker Away
Summary: Miyo Sasaki is in love with her classmate Kento Hinode and tries repeatedly to get Kento's attention by transforming into a cat, but at some point, the boundary between herself and the cat becomes ambiguous.

Title: Aladdin and the King of Thieves
Summary: The King of Thieves disrupts Aladdin and Jasmine's long-anticipated wedding, looking for an oracle that will lead him to an even bigger treasure. His true identity causes trouble for Aladdin.

Title: Black Butler
Summary: Ciel Phantomhive takes care of the many unsettling events in Victorian England. Aided by Sebastian Michaelis, his loyal butler with seemingly inhuman abilities. But is there more to this black-clad butler than meets the eye?
Stars: J. Michael Tatum,Michael C. Pizzuto,Brina Palencia,Daisuke Ono

Title: Animaniacs
Summary: The zany adventures of a trio of 1930s animated characters in the modern world.

Title: Trigun Stampede
Summary: Follow gunman Vash the Stampede as he struggles to maintain his pacifist ways while avoiding the immense bounty on his head.
Stars: Yoshitsugu Matsuoka,Johnny Yong Bosch,Sakura Ando,Sarah Roach

Title: Sailor Moon
Summary: The magical action-adventures of a teenage girl who learns of her destiny as the legendary warrior Sailor Moon and must band together with the other Sailor Scouts to defend the Earth and Galaxy.

Title: Yarichin Bitch Club
Summary: Takashi Toono transfers to Morimori Academy, an all-boys boarding school. Due to the school's club policy, he joins "Photography Club". Members of the club offer sexual services to pent-up boys for no reason other than a love of sex.

Title: Mushi-Shi
Summary: Ginko is an expert travelling around to investigate a primeval life-form, the "Mushi," and helping people with Mushi-related supernatural problems.

Title: Reborn as a Vending Machine, I Now Wander the Dungeon
Summary: A vending machine fanatic meets his demise when he is, quite ironically, crushed by a vending machine. He finds himself reincarnated as a vending machine in another world.

Title: Another
Summary: A young man named, Koichi Sakakibara, transfers to a new school where he finds himself drawn into a mystery involving a mysterious girl and a series of gruesome deaths.

Title: Hercules
Summary: This spin-off of Disney's Hercules (1997) follows Hercules' many labors during the years he spent training how to be a hero under the tutelage of satyr Philoctetes. Olympian Gods and Goddesses, as well as Hades and Pegasus, often visit him.

Title: Angel's Egg
Summary: A mysterious young girl wanders a desolate, otherworldly landscape, carrying a large egg.

Title: Wolf Children
Summary: After her werewolf lover unexpectedly dies in an accident while hunting for food for their children, a young woman must find ways to raise the werewolf son and daughter that she had with him while keeping their trait hidden from society.

Title: Terror in Resonance
Summary: Tokyo has been decimated by a terrorist attack, the only clue to the culprit's identity is a bizarre internet video. Two mysterious children form Sphinx, a clandestine entity determined to pull the trigger on this world.

Title: The Girl Who Leapt Through Time
Summary: A high-school girl named Makoto acquires the power to travel back in time, and decides to use it for her own personal benefits. Little does she know that she is affecting the lives of others just as much as she is her own.

Title: Little Nemo: Adventures in Slumberland
Summary: Each night, young Nemo goes to Slumberland and has adventures and befriends the king of Slumberland, Morpheus. But one night Nemo discovers Nightmare Land, and the evil nightmare king, throwing Slumberland and Nemo himself into danger.

Title: Jin-Roh: The Wolf Brigade
Summary: A traumatized member of an elite para-military police force falls for the sister of a female terrorist courier who died in front of him on duty.

Title: More Than a Married Couple, But Not Lovers.
Summary: High school student Jiro Yakuin paired with Akari Watanabe, a gal who finds Jiro repulsive at first, but they agree to attain enough points so that they can switch partners to the people they really like.
Stars: Ben Balmaceda,Lindsay Sheppard,Mike Haimoto,Macy Anne Johnson

Title: Soul Eater
Summary: Set in the Shinigami technical school, the series revolves around a partnership between a weapon meisters and a human weapons. Trying to reach a ranking of "Death Scythe" they must collect the souls of 99 evil humans and 1 witch.

Title: Final Fantasy: The Spirits Within
Summary: A scientist makes a last stand on Earth with the help of a ragtag team of soldiers against an invasion of alien phantoms.

Title: Golden Kamuy
Summary: In the early 20th century in Hokkaido, Japan, a treasure hunt between various parties takes place for a hidden stash of gold.

Title: Psycho-Pass: Providence
Summary: While attending a meeting as a Chief Inspector of the Public Security Bureau, Akane Tsunemori received a report that an incident had occurred on a foreign vessel, and this was the beginning of a big and unexpected case.

Title: Ghost in the Shell: Stand Alone Complex
Summary: The futuristic adventures of a female cyborg counter intelligence agent and her support team.
Stars: Shirô Saitô,Atsuko Tanaka,Osamu Saka,Mary Elizabeth McGlynn

Title: My Life as a Teenage Robot
Summary: The escapades of a super-powered robot who happens to resemble a teenage girl that tries to balance high school and teen problems while trying to save the world from danger.

Title: Berserk: The Golden Age Arc I - The Egg of the King
Summary: A lone sellsword named Guts gets recruited into a mercenary band and attempts to help the Band's leader, Griffith, on his rise to power.

Title: Dark Gathering
Summary: Keitarô Gentôga takes a part-time job tutoring the child prodigy, Yayoi Hôzuki. Little does he know she's a gifted medium hell-bent on finding the spirit behind her mother's vanishing and she's gravely determined to drag Keitarô into it.

Title: TONIKAWA: Over the Moon for You
Summary: A Young Prodigy accepts a Sudden Proposal from a Mysterious Woman who he falls in love with after she saves him from a Near-Death Experience.

Title: Fate/stay night [Unlimited Blade Works]
Summary: A group of seven mages gets chosen to become masters of seven classes of heroic spirits, in order to fight and win the Holy Grail.

Title: Millennium Actress
Summary: A TV interviewer and his cameraman meet a former actress and travel through her memories and career.

Title: To the Forest of Firefly Lights
Summary: Hotaru is rescued by a spirit when she gets lost in a forest as a child. The two become friends, despite the spirit revealing that he will disappear if he is ever touched by a human.

Title: Ouran High School Host Club
Summary: You'll fall for the Ouran Host Club: Tamaki's truly romantic. Kaoru and Hikaru display brotherly love, Kyoya's brainy, Honey's innocent, and Mori's manly. Oh, and don't forget Haruhi. He knows what girls want, because he's a girl too.

Title: One Piece Film: Gold
Summary: The Straw Hat Pirates come to Gran Tesoro, the richest ship in the world.

Title: Hellsing
Summary: A British taskforce, lead by the daughter of the vampire hunter Prof. Van Helsing, battles the supernatural with the aid of two vampires.

Title: Saint Seiya: Knights of the Zodiac
Summary: A group a young warriors known as 'Saints', each in possession of a 'cloth' guarded by a different constellation, must protect the reincarnation of the goddess Athena as she attempts to keep the Earth from being destroyed by evil forces.

Title: One Piece Film Z
Summary: A former Marine stands in the way of the Straw Hat Pirates.

Title: Bee & Puppycat: Lazy in Space
Summary: The second season of beloved web series Bee and PuppyCat after a nearly five year break. The season picks back up the cheerful 22-year old Bee and intergalactic space warrior for a set of adventures.
Stars: Allyn Rachel,Ashly Burch,Alexander James Rodriguez,Terri Hawkes

Title: The Testament of Sister New Devil
Summary: First-year high school student, Toujo Basara, was suddenly have two beautiful step-sisters adopted by his father. But Mio and Maria's true forms are actually the newbie Demon Lord and a succubus!?
Stars: Kaori Fukuhara,Ayaka Asai,Sarah Emi Bridcutt,Yu Asakawa

Title: Tomo-chan Is a Girl!
Summary: Tomo is a tomboy who has been in love with her childhood friend Junichiro, and strives to make him see her as a romantic candidate.

Title: Toradora!
Summary: Toradora tells the tale of Ryuji (dragon) and Taiga (tiger) helping each other confess to their crushes.

Title: Gamera -Rebirth-
Summary: In the summer of 1989, four kids in Tokyo witness the emergence of the turtle kaiju Gamera, who bravely stands up against giant human-eating monsters.

Title: Violet Evergarden: The Movie
Summary: After the aftermath of a war, a young girl who was used as a 'tool' for war learned to live. With the scars of burns, she goes back to her past to feel the true feelings of the Major's, "I love you."

Title: Noragami
Summary: A minor god seeking to gain widespread worship teams up with a human girl he saved to gain fame, recognition and at least one shrine dedicated to him.

Title: Resident Evil: Vendetta
Summary: Chris Redfield enlists the help of Leon S. Kennedy and Rebecca Chambers to stop a death merchant, with a vengeance, from spreading a deadly virus in New York.

Title: Drifting Home
Summary: Follows two childhood friends who drift into a mysterious sea with an entire housing complex.

Title: The Dangers in My Heart
Summary: Ichikawa Kyoutarou, a boy barely clinging to the bottom rung of his school's social ladder, secretly believes he's the tortured lead in some psychological thriller. He spends his days dreaming up ways to disrupt his classmates' peaceful lives and pining after Yamada Anna, the class idol. But Kyoutarou's not nearly the troubled teen he pretends to be...and it turns out Anna's a bit odd herself.

Title: Puella Magi Madoka Magica
Summary: A creature named Kyubey offers Madoka and Sayaka a wish if they agree to become 'magical girls' and fight abstract beings called 'witches'. However, a magical girl named Homura is, for uncertain reasons, determined to stop this agreement.

Title: House of Mouse
Summary: Collections of short cartoons hosted by Mickey and his Disney pals at his club, The House of Mouse.

Title: Reign of the Seven Spellblades
Summary: Follows Oliver Horn as he enters a prestigious magic school named Kimberly. He discovers that not everything is as it seems, with the emergence of labyrinths, monsters, and other threats that endanger the students.

Title: Dragon Ball GT
Summary: After Goku is made a kid again by the Black Star Dragon Balls, he goes on a journey to get back to his old self.

Title: Animal Crossing Christmas Festival: The Movie!
Summary: A young boy named Evan moves in to a Village populated with anthropomorphic animals and encounters friends along the way to make his big adventure.

Title: Rudolph the Red-Nosed Reindeer
Summary: A young reindeer Rudolph lives at the North Pole. His father is one of Santa's reindeer and it is expected that Rudolph will eventually be one too. However, he has a feature which is a setback and causes him to be ostracized: his red nose.

Title: Resident Evil: Infinite Darkness
Summary: Federal agent Leon S. Kennedy teams up with TerraSave staff member Claire Redfield to investigate a zombie outbreak. Based on the popular video game series of the same name by Capcom.

Title: Evangelion: 1.0 You Are (Not) Alone
Summary: The fate of the world is threatened by seemingly monstrous entities known as Angels. NERV is an organisation set up to counter this threat and it is up to young pilots to protect Earth but exactly what are the real motives behind NERV?

Title: Trapped in a Dating Sim: The World of Otome Games is Tough for Mobs
Summary: A young man is transported into a video game world dominated by females.

Title: World's End Harem
Summary: A man wakes from suspended animation to find himself in a world where only a million men survived an epidemic. He is selected for breeding as part of a repopulation program.

Title: The Great Cleric
Summary: Earth's God of Destiny lost to Galdardia's Chief God for a bet and chose ten souls to hand over. Galdardia's Chief God handed those ten souls new vessels. Among those souls was Luciel, a salaryman, who fought against his destiny of death.

Title: Tower of God
Summary: Reach the top, and everything will be yours. At the top of the tower exists everything in this world, and all of it can be yours.
Stars: Johnny Yong Bosch,Matthew David Rudd,Cherami Leigh,Scott Whyte

Title: Shaun the Sheep Movie
Summary: When Shaun decides to take the day off and have some fun, he gets a little more action than he bargained for. A mix up with the Farmer, a caravan and a very steep hill lead them all to the Big City and it's up to Shaun and the flock to return everyone safely to the green grass of home.

Title: Pooh's Heffalump Movie
Summary: When Roo sets off on his own into the Hundred Acre Wood, he discovers a friendly and playful Heffalump named Lumpy.

Title: Tokyo Godfathers
Summary: On Christmas Eve, three homeless people living on the streets of Tokyo discover a newborn baby among the trash and set out to find its parents.

Title: Harem in the Labyrinth of Another World
Summary: A high school student is transported to a fantasy world with distinct cheating advantages. He sets out on a quest to gain a harem of beautiful girls.

Title: Dorohedoro
Summary: In a sad town a clan of sorcerers use its people to experiment with the dark arts.

Title: The Ancient Magus' Bride
Summary: Hatori Chise, 15 years old. Lost, without hope and without family - she sells herself to a non-human mage known as Elias Ainsworth. Hesitant, she starts a new life with him as his new apprentice.

Title: Arifureta: From Commonplace to World's Strongest
Summary: Seventeen-year-old Hajime Nagumo is your average, everyday otaku. However, his simple life of pulling all-nighters and sleeping in school is suddenly turned upside down when he, along with the rest of his class, is summoned to a fantasy world. They're treated like heroes and tasked with the duty of saving the human race from utter extinction. But what should have been any otaku's wet dream quickly turns into Hajime's nightmare. While the rest of his class are blessed with godlike powers, Hajime's job, Synergist, only has a single transmutation skill. Ridiculed and bullied by his classmates for being weak, he soon finds himself in despair. Will he be able to survive in this dangerous world of monsters and demons with only a glorified blacksmith's level of strength?
Stars: Tia Lynn Ballard,Matt Shipman,Toshinari Fukamachi,Minami Takahashi

Title: Berserk: The Golden Age Arc III - The Advent
Summary: A year has passed since Guts parted ways with Griffith. The Band of the Hawk is plotting a rescue mission to save Griffith who is confined to prison.

Title: Great Teacher Onizuka
Summary: About Eikichi Onizuka, a 22-year-old ex-gangster member and a virgin. He has one ambition that no one ever expected from him. His solely life purpose is to become the greatest high school teacher ever.

Title: Deadman Wonderland
Summary: After being falsely convicted for the murder of his entire class, a young man must learn to survive in a mysterious prison with a perverted take on incarceration while also looking to clear his name.

Title: G.I. Joe
Summary: An elite special missions force fights against the terrorist forces of Cobra.

Title: Seraph of the End
Summary: In 2012, the world allegedly comes to an end at the hands of a human-made virus, ravaging the global populace and leaving only children untouched. It is at this time that vampires emerge from the recesses of the earth.

Title: Platinum End
Summary: A young man is recruited by an angel into a battle to become the next God.

Title: Ghost Stories
Summary: A group of school kids and a possessed cat fight ghosts in their neighborhood.

Title: Aladdin
Summary: Aladdin, the clever hero of Agrabah, continues his adventures with the help of his fiancee Princess Jasmine, his pet monkey Abu, Magic Carpet, Iago the greedy parrot, and of course his best friend the semi-cosmic Genie.

Title: Sonic X
Summary: A slight malfunction causes Chaos Control, and sends Sonic the Hedgehog to Earth. While there, Sonic meets Chris Thorndyke, who aids at collecting the Chaos Emeralds, so Sonic and friends can go home.

Title: Tomb Raider
Summary: Follows heroine Lara Croft as she explores new territory.

Title: Ride Your Wave
Summary: A surfer and firefighter meet and fall in love.

Title: Blood-C
Summary: Saya is a seemingly normal girl living with her father in a shrine. During the day she goes to school and spends time with her friends at a local cafe. But when night falls Saya is called upon to protect her village from strange monsters.

Title: Maid Sama!
Summary: Ayuzawa Misaki serves as the student council president at Seika High. However, unbeknownst to her classmates, she works part-time as an employee at a Maid Cafe. Usui Takumi, a boy from her school, discovers this secret.

Title: Bakemonogatari
Summary: Third-year high school student Koyomi Araragi is human again. Cured of his vampirism, he seeks to help other supernaturals with their problems. Koyomi becomes involved in their lives, revealing secrets in people he once knew.

Title: Chip 'n Dale: Rescue Rangers
Summary: Disney's fun-loving chipmunks are re-imagined as the leaders of a team of pint-sized crime-fighters.

Title: Junk Head
Summary: In a distant future, humanity has lost its ability to reproduce. An expedition is sent to an underground city where artificial humanoids are still fertile.

Title: Fate/stay night
