Summary: The evil Mycene Empire unleashes its army against humans in a world wide strike. Koji Kabuto must risk his life in a desperate journey to find Mazinkaiser so he can defend the Earth against this ruthless new enemy.

Title: Tattoon Master
Summary: A anthropologist runs into a tribe and after the tribe leader sees a photo of the anthropologist's son, Hibio, the tribe leader wants to become the wife to him.

Title: Comedy
Summary: A young girl, desperate to save her village, sets out in search of a legendary swordsman who accepts only rare books of a particular genre as payment.

Title: Hyper Combat Unit Dangaioh
Summary: Four teens modified to become ESPers must fight for their lives aboard a powerful robot: the Dangaioh.

Title: Metal Gear Solid: Digital Graphic Novel
RErideD - Derrida, who leaps through time
Summary: When Derrida wakes up from a 10-year cold sleep, he'll fight to survive a devastated world to keep a promise to his friend.

Title: Heisei harenchi gakuen
Summary: A modern-day version of Go Nagai's manga Harenchi Gakuen (Shameless School).

Title: Girl Beats Boys
Summary: Hinako Nakayama is a high school girl, that by the request of her twin brother Hikaro to switch places with him in his school, she enters an all-boys school which is filled with delinquents.

Title: Mock & Sweet
Summary: Mock and his sister, Sweet, are curious about the fuss on the earth and eventually decide to come out of the ground. They save the poor, the innocent and the brave whenever and wherever these people need help.

Title: SaiKano: Another Love Song
Summary: Every weapon must have a prototype. For the ultimate weapon, career soldier Lt. Mizuki is that prototype. As she comes to the limit of her powers as a weapon, she must watch the unfolding of Chise's growth into the final weapon.

Title: Super Dimensional Cavalry: Southern Cross
Summary: In the far future, a human colony planet fights a desperate war against a formidable alien invasion force with its own tensions.

Title: Gegege no Kitarou: Kitarou no Yuurei Densha
Summary: Story about Kitaro and a ghost train.

Title: Nanatsu no Taizai: Eiyuu-tachi wa hashagu
Summary: Adaptation of bonus chapters of Nanatsu no Taizai manga that are more on the humorous side.

Title: Kampfer: Fur Die Liebe
Summary: A two-episode special. They are designated as Episodes 13 and 14, and the first episode is a direct sequel to the previous series while the second episode is about the trans-sex of Natsuru.

Title: Beast Wars II: Lio Convoy's Close Call!
Summary: The Beast Wars between the Maximals and Predacons intensifies and complicates upon the arrival of Majin Zarak, a titanic and terrifying Transformer.

Title: Meitantei Conan Magic File 4: Osaka okonomiyaki odyssey
Summary: After the events in The Lost Ship in The Sky, Hattori Heiji invites Conan to an Okonomiyaki Dinner.

Title: The Adventures of Pepero, Son of the Andes
Summary: The story follows the young boy Pepero as he searches for his father who has gone missing while seeking the mythical golden city of El Dorado.

Title: Space Pirate Captain Harlock
Summary: Renegade space pirate Captain Harlock and his crew must stop the sinister alien plant women, the Mazone, from conquering Earth.

Title: A-Channel
Summary: As Run, Nagi and Yuuko begin their sophomore year while Tooru begins her freshman year, their exciting high school life filled with drama, humor and adventure begins for the four friends during their everyday lives.

Title: Uchuusen Sagittarius
Summary: Working for a multi-purpose space agency, Toppy and Rana make friends with Giraffe, a scientist, and go through various adventures in space.

Title: Gall Force: Destruction
Summary: The sequel to Gall Force: Eternal Story (1986). Lufy, one of the heroines of the first movie, is rescued by a Solnoid ship that's on a mission to wipe out the star system that holds the key to peace between their race and the Paranoids.

Title: Fushigi Yûgi: The Mysterious Play - Reflections OAV 2
Summary: Taka(Tamahome) and Miaka has started their lives as a married couple. While waiting for their child to be born, Tamahome and Miaka are faced with a new challenge. A new girl entered the world of the four Gods determined to make Taka hers.
Stars: Bridget Hoffman,Wendee Lee,David Hayter,Derek Stephen Prince

Title: Tales of Zestiria: Dawn of the Shepherd
Summary: This is the beginning of the story of Sorey; a Sheperd who must battle Malevolence and reunite humans and Seraphim in a world torn by a war between two powerful nations.

Title: Saiyuki Reload Gunlock
Summary: Genjo Sanzo, Cho Hakkai, Sha Gojyo, and Son Goku fight their way to their goal, their path is fraught with internal strife. When they encounter a formidable pair of adversaries from the west.

Title: Gal & Dino
Summary: Wasted from the night before, Kaede wakes up to find herself at home with a dinosaur she had brought along with her. The two then start living together as an odd pair

Title: Maeterlinck's Blue Bird: Tyltyl and Mytyl's Adventurous Journey
Summary: The series is about a 12-year-old girl called Mytyl and her 13-year-old brother Tyltyl seeking happiness, represented by The Blue Bird of Happiness, aided by the good fairy Bérylune. They are accompanied on their journey by their cat and dog, Shanet and Tyrol, who are given anthropomorph forms and the ability to talk by Bérylune.

Title: Three Musketeers in Boots
Summary: Pero is back in Go Go Town, a fearful place in the Wild West that desperately awaits for a sheriff to come. In this town of no law and order, Pero and a boy named Jimmy try to help Annie, daughter of a saloon owner who has just been killed.

Title: Magical Girl Pretty Sammy
Summary: Tsunami, one of the two candidates for the throne of the magic kingdom Juraihelm, is chosen to ascend the throne. Though to be queen, she has to pick an idol who can represent her. Rumiya, the other candidate, despises Tsunami, even though she acts as a friend to her. Rumiya thinks that she is superior to Tsunami and tries to foil Tsunami's crowning. Tsunami's chooses the earthling Sasami as her magical warrior to bring peace and love to earth. Rumiya uses Sasami's introverted friend, Misao, and turns her into the wild warrior, Pixy Misa. Pixyy Misa causes mayhem on earth, while Sasami does not want to except the reality of magic.

Title: Kyousogiga
Summary: Hidden within Kyoto is the "mirror capital" where youkai and humans live together and no one ever dies. It is protected by three people - Kurama, Yase, and Myoue - as they await the return of their parents, Myoue Jonin and Koto. One day a young girl named Koto (same name, different spelling) and her little brothers A and Un wander into the city from a different dimension looking for her mother. A mecha-geek with red eyes, it's not immediately clear whether she's human or youkai. Her arrival upsets the long peace that had ruled the city.

Title: Getter Robo Ark
Summary: The story centers on the conflict against the Andromeda Country, the new enemy of humanity that seeks to destroy the source of the getter rays that has devastated its civilization. Hope rests on the titular Getter Robo Arc robot, but the appearance of another mysterious, piloted by Takuma Nagare, son of Ryoma Nagare, introduces another complication to the conflict.

Title: The Glass Mask
Summary: Kitajima Maya, a 13-year old girl with a talent for acting, was discovered by the reclusive actress Tsukikage. The story follows Maya's growing up, intense training, overcoming challenges, and evolving into the foremost actress of her generation.

Title: Doraemon: New Nobita's Great Demon-Peko and the Exploration Party of Five
Summary: Nobita finds a stray dog and brings him home, little does hi knows that the dog is actually a prince in his homeland, a world appart deep in the african 'Smokers Forest' were the dogs evolved and have their own empire, so he and his friends take on a journey to take back the young prince to his homeland but when they get there things have changed.

Title: Tokyo Pig
Summary: Discover the magical world of Spencer. He's a super-intelligent third-grader who writes fantastically impossible things in his diary...and they come to life! Spencer learns how pigs really fly when he draws millions of them - then one stays with him as his loyal and amazing pet, Sunny Pig.

Title: Aikatsu! The Movie
Summary: The story of the anime revolves around Ichigo, who was just a normal middle school student until she suddenly got involved in the world of idols. The film will center on Aikatsu!'s greatest "Super Live" concert yet, the Dai Star Miya Ichigo Matsuri. Ichigo prepares for the concert with press conferences, last-minute lessons, and more.

Title: Twin Princess of Wonder Planet
Summary: In the hollow Mysterious Planet, seven kingdoms co-exist, all of them lit by the Sun's Blessing from the Kingdom of the Sun, in the middle of the planet. The light of the core sun is necessary for the continued existence of all the kingdoms. Yet, something is causing the Sun's Blessing to weaken. If something isn't done, it will be the end of life in the Mysterious Planet. Fortunately, the twin princesses of the Sun Kingdom, Fine and Rein, have been endowed with the magic of the Prominence, and are looking for a way to fix things.

Title: My Master Has No Tail
Summary: Mameda is a shape shifting Tanuki girl who dreams of becoming human someday. One day, she turns into a black-haired beauty and heads out to Osaka, but is soon discovered. One beautiful woman relentlessly says to the depressed Mameda, "Go back to where you came from!" calls herself Rakugo-ka (Rakugo storyteller). The Taisho Rakugo fantasy that will make you smile begins here.

Title: Fukuro
Summary: Fukuro (Japanese for "bag" or "sack") is a 3-minute short film from 2001. It features Pyramid Head and a Lying Figure from Silent Hill 2, the Fukuro Lady, and many monsters from early sketches for Silent Hill 2. The film contains disturbing, surreal imagery.

Title: Waccha PriMagi!
Summary: Middle-school first-year student Hibino Matsuri loves festivals, and she dreams of one day being able to star in "PriMagi", a magic-like form of stage entertainment borne from song, dance and fashion. That day arrives when the hyper-spirited, trouble-making magician Myamu arrives from the magical realm and scouts Matsuri for PriMagi. Together, the two compete with rivals to rise to the top of PriMagi.

Title: Meloetta's Moonlight Serenade
Summary: Pikachu and his friends have gathered to listen to a song performed by Meloetta at the melody tree. Meloetta is soon interrupted by a Sandstorm attack which breaks the tree and causes the Melody Berries to scatter. Before the performance can continue the Pokémon must retrieve the lost berries.

Title: Galaxy Express 999: Can You Love Like a Mother!?
Summary: Galaxy Express 999 is the name of a train which travels through space,beginning at Megalopolis Station on one end of the galaxy and ending at Andromeda on the other. Tetsuro Hoshino is a youth who'll give anything to board the Three-Nine, including a promise to accompany a mysterious woman named Maetel all the way to Andromeda, the planet where, she tells him, he can get a free machine body to avenge the cruel death of his mother.

Title: Ninku
Summary: Once upon a time, there was a war between the Imperial army and Ninku, an elite unit of 12 zodiac warriors led by their master. Just when the Ninku were about to win the war, their master asked them to hold back and disbanded the unit. The series follows the adventures of 3 of the 12 zodiac warriors, along with the sister of one of them and a penguin, and the repercussions of that fateful day. It is a journey of friendship, loss and adventure, as they run away from the Imperial army who are trying to eliminate them.

Title: Gekijô-ban Naruto: Soyokaze-den Naruto to majin to 3-tsu no onegai dattebayo!!
Summary: During a field trip, Naruto finds a bottle in the sand, containing a genie that will grant 3 wishes. Konoha's genins will fight to obtain a wish.

Title: Shugokyara!! Doki
Summary: An elementary school girl has created a mask to hide her true self at school but one night when she wishes to be able to express her true self three guardian eggs appear.

Title: Inuyasha: Kuroi Tessaiga
Summary: Sesshomaru steals Tetsusaiga's power with Tenseiga, empowered by Kanna's memento, a fragment of the Mirror Demon.

Title: Hatena Illusion
Summary: Makoto não pode esperar para começar o seu aprendizado mágico e se reconectar com a filha do seu mentor, Hatena, na sua mansão assombrada.

Title: El Hazard: The Alternative World
Summary: Makoto and the others are mysteriously transported from El Hazard to yet another world where they face dangers, both old and new.

Title: Nobody's Boy Remi
Summary: Remi, an orphan kid gets hired out to a traveling street entertainer Vitalis when her foster parents fall on hard times.

Title: Hoop Days
Summary: A defunct high school basketball team finds a new student and things may start looking up for them.

Title: Mount Head
Summary: A sad rakugo of a stingy old man experiencing the unforeseen consequences of eating a few cherries whole, without throwing the pits away.

Title: Battle Programmer Shirase
Summary: A young computer hacker who doesn't work for money, steals from big bank corporations sucking every last cent out of them, all while battling the King of America.

Title: Kuroko no Basket: Mou Ikkai Yarimasen ka
Summary: Kuroko recalls how he met Aomine and became a first string player with the Teiko team.

Title: Gekijouban Re: cycle of the Penguindrum - Movie 1
Summary: A terminally ill girl is revived by a magical penguin spirit. In return, her brothers are sent on a quest for the mysterious Penguindrum.

Title: Chimpui
Summary: Chimpui tells the story of two cute aliens that come to Earth to find the girl who will get married with their prince of planet Mahl.

Title: The Ancient Magus' Bride: Those Awaiting a Star Part 3
Summary: Chise tells of a time right after her mother's death about a book she received.

Title: Don't Hurt Me, My Healer!
Summary: A fantasy and adventure comedy starring Karla, a dark elf cleric who invested too much in her insulting skills, and Alvin, a swordsman who has to put up with her antics.

Title: Baka and Test: Summon the Beasts OVA
Summary: An OVA set before the second season where we see Class F working on a Chinese maid cafe in preparation for their school's cultural festival.

Title: Triton of the Sea
Summary: 5000 years ago, evil demigod Poseidon and his minions attack the good mermen. A dolphin saves one of them, baby Triton. Later, as a young boy, Triton decides to avenge his family and end the reign of evil Poseidon and his monsters.

Title: Fushigi Yûgi: The Mysterious Play - Eikoden
Summary: Taka(Tamahome) and Miaka has started their lives as a married couple. While waiting for their child to be born, Tamahome and Miaka are faced with a new challenge. A new girl entered the world of the four Gods determined to make Taka hers.

Title: Tamayura: Hitotose
Summary: It's the beginning of a new school year for Fuu and friends. With a new year comes new challenges as Fuu tries to open a photography club at her school.

Title: All Purpose Cultural Cat Girl Nuku Nuku
Summary: Nuku Nuku is a cat-girl alien where her adventures focus primary on her high school and to save the world from Mishima Industries.

Title: Magical Idol Pastel Yumi
Summary: Yumi is a little girl who loves flowers. She is presented with a flower award on the festival of flowers and is given a magic-wand that materializes any drawing she makes.

Title: Baribari Densetsu
Summary: The film is about 4 high school seniors, who race on the mountain roads at night in order to refine their motorcycle skills build up their skill in an attempt to become professional motorcycle racers.

Title: Beet the Vandel Buster
Summary: The world is terrorized by demon lord Vandel and its brethren. A team of demon hunters known as Busters are world's only hope. They lose, but a young boy gets their weapons and trains to lead a new team of Busters against Vandel.
Stars: John Paul Stevenson,Todd Haberkorn,Luci Christian,Mike McFarland

Title: Star Street: The Adventures of the Star Kids
Armored Fleet Dairugger XV
Summary: An space exploration expedition is protected by an unique armored combat group that can combine into one giant robot when necessary.

Title: Actors: Songs Connection
Summary: The story follows the everyday lives of students and teachers at the Private Amaka Academy, a school established by the the large university town group Slive Central.

Title: Lupin III: Stolen Lupin
Summary: A Mafia Boss assigns Lupin to steal the "Bull's Eye" gem for him. It's said to be cursed to those who try to steal it. But Lupin doesn't believe in such things and accepts the challenge.

Title: Uta no prince-sama - maji love 2000%
Summary: STARISH are back on the Master Course at Saotome Academy and are out making work for themselves as idols. Join STARISH on their latest adventures as they fight to become the best idol group in Japan.

Title: Starship Operators
Summary: Starship Operators of the Planet Kibi are returning home after the maiden voyage of the Amaterasu, they find that their home planet has been taken over by Henrietta Alliance of Planetary Nations.

Title: Maetel Legend
Summary: The artificial sun that lights the frozen planet La Metalle is dying, threatening to extinguish what little life is left there.

Title: Babel II: Perfect Collection
Summary: Life seems simple for Koichi, a young student, until he learns that he is the reincarnation of an alien protector who crashed onto the mantle of responsibility as"defender of the Earth", Koichi/Babel teams up with trio of super-powered alien companions to battle the the dark forces of an evil cult leader. The war to save humanity takes Babel from the deserts of southern Asia to the upper east side of Manhattan and ultimately to a final showdown with "the master" in a hidden base nestled in the Swiss Alps. The action is fast-paced and deadly. The fate of the world rests in the ability of this courageous youth to tame his latent psychic power and use it to defeat the enemies of mankind.

Title: Snack World
Summary: Welcome to SNACK WORLD! This is a nutty universe filled with dreams and adventures. Here, you can find everything from dragons to smart devices to Chup, the hyperactive hero of this story.

Title: IDOLM@STER: Xenoglossia
Summary: The girls of the Idolmaster series are re-imagined as the pilots of giant robots defending the Earth.

Title: Dead Dead Demon's Dededede Destruction Zenpen
Techno Police 21C
Summary: It's the 21st century, and the police are now using robots with human handlers. Police officers Ken, Eleanor and Gora and their robot partners Blader, Scanny and Vigobus must stop a mercenary group who stole a powerful automated tank.

Title: Pokémon Mystery Dungeon: Explorers of Time & Darkness
Monokurômu fakutâ
Summary: The story revolves around the high school student Akira Nikaido, a typical slacker living a normal life. That is, until he meets the mysterious Shirogane, a man who suddenly appears and tells him that they have a destiny together.

Title: Broken Down Film
Summary: A cowboy is hampered by the imperfections in the film print showcasing his story.

Title: Princess Nine
Summary: The story of a baseball team formed at an all-girls high school competing to enter and win the national championship.

Title: Haruka: Beyond the Stream of Time - A Tale of the Eight Guardians
Summary: Akane and her friends are dragged by a demon to the Heian era, where she becomes the Priestess of the Dragon God. There, she must stop demons from taking over the land with the eight guardians sworn to protect her.

Title: Ayakashi
Summary: Ayakashi is a metecious form of life, giving unusual forces to the carrier in an exchange on all his life-breath. Yu Kusaka is a student, losing will to live post mortem friend of childhood.

Title: Chidori RSC
Summary: Kokura Hikari is girl who loves rifle shooting. She entered Chidori High School because it had a shooting club, but finds that the club had been disbanded. She had only one day to find enough members to reform the club.

Title: Hana no mahoutsukai Mary Bell
Summary: Mary Bell, a magical girl who looks around five years old, comes to the Human World from a magical world called the "Flower Magic World." Using her Flower Magic she helps and encourages ...

Title: Dotto! Koni-chan
Summary: The bizarre, funny and inexplicable adventures of a really lucky guy named Koni and his really crazy friends.

Title: BanG Dream! Morfonication
Summary: A two-episode animation featuring the members of Morfonica.

Title: Gekijouban Tenisu no oujisama: Eikokushiki teikyujou kessen!
Poor Sisters Story
Summary: A junior high school student named Kyô and an elementary school student Asu, who live alone. Their mother passed away years ago. They live happily together to conquer each difficulties and receive help from the kind people around them.

Title: Jeanie with the Light Brown Hair
Judo Boy
Summary: After the death of his father, a young man named Kurenai Sanshiro seeks revenge for an unknown one-eyed man who killed his father, master of Kurenai style judo. Sanshiro's companions are a little orphan boy named Kenbo and his dog Boke.

Title: Sola
Summary: High school boy falls for a mysterious girl he meets on the street. Turns out she's a powerful and almost immortal creature damned to walk the Earth alone forever. She is being hunted, so the boy invites her to hide at his place.

Title: Zo Zo Zombie
Summary: Zo Zo Zombie is our undead hero who, with his best human friend Isamu, is just trying to do some good in this world but somehow always ends up in pieces. Literally.

Title: Daddy Long Legs
Summary: In this animated version of the Jean Webster classic, living in an orphanage, Judy Abbot earns a scholarship to study at a prestigious American university thanks to a mysterious admirer.

Title: Jungle King Taa-chan
Summary: A parody of the legend of Tarzan.

Title: New Getter Robo
Summary: Creatures called the Oni have attacked the planet earth, so a scientist creates three mecha robots. The strongest of these robots is called Getter Robo, which three men pilot it, a martial artist, criminal leader and a monk.

Title: Little Lulu to chicchai nakama
Summary: Little Lulu, Tubby, and the rest of their friends have adventures and mishaps in their suburban town.

Title: Legend of the Mystical Ninja
Summary: Makuamuge, an evil overlord wants to take over the real world and video game world so ninja Goemon and his friends must stop him.

Title: Saiyuki
Summary: An evil demon, Gyumao, causing all demons to go crazy. Now, Genjo Sanzo, a trash-taking Buddist monk, is given a mission in India. Now, he is teamed up with three demons, Son Goku, Sha Gojyo, , and Cho Hakkai.

Title: Mobile Suit Gundam SEED C.E. 73: Stargazer
Summary: Following the Break the World incident, the story revolves around Sven, pilot of the GAT-X105E Strike Noir, and Selene, a researcher of the "Stargazer Project".

Title: Pikachu's PikaBoo
Summary: Pikachu and friends play peek-a-boo.

Title: World Witches Take Off!
Stars: Amber Lee Connors,Stephanie Sheh,Luci Christian,Rachel Robinson

Title: Kochira Katsushika-ku Kamearikouen-mae Hashutsujo The Final: Ryotsu Kankichi Saigo no Hi
Summary: Princess Sabrina comes to Japan for a visit, but gets kidnapped. Luckily, Japan's favourite policeman Ryotsu Kankichi is around to help her out and give her a fun time.

Title: Ano Natsu de Matteru Special
Summary: To combat the approaching boredom of summer, friends decide to make a film together documenting their memories together.

Title: Show by Rock!! Mashumairesh!!
Summary: Howan, an aspiring musician from the far North, travels to the colorful and musical Midi City where she finds her calling along and her best friends!.
Stars: Macy Anne Johnson,Giovannie Cruz,Emi Lo,Lindsay Sheppard

Title: Ace Attorney Investigations 2
Summary: The famous prosecutor, Miles Edgeworth, solves five different murder cases, all related to a past incident, while also learning about his father's past as a defense attorney.

Title: Mezon Ikkoku: Kanketsu-hen
Summary: Godai's roommate is throwing a party for Godai and Kyoko's wedding. But Godai heard that Kyoko is waiting for a letter. He gets jealous and is worried that Kyoko will fall in love with someone else.

Title: Code Geass: Hangyaku no Lelouch R2 Special Edition Zero Requiem
I'll/CKBC
Summary: Two rivals that are sent to separate schools are pitted against each other on the basketball court, when one of them transfer's into the other's school.

Title: Planzet
Summary: In the future, an alien life form invades Earth and smashes through the world's major cities in one wave. The earth unites to fight back.

Title: Dragon Ball Z: Summer Vacation Special
Summary: This is a TV special that takes place directly after Dragon Ball Z movie 7. In it, Goku and Gohan discuss Dragon Ball movies 1-3 and Dragon Ball Z movies 1-7.

Title: Mobile Suit Gundam MS IGLOO: Apocalypse 0079
Summary: Continuing the story of Engineering Lieutenant Oliver May aboard the Jotunheim, when he is tasked to test and evaluate mobile suits, mobile pods, and mobile armors during the One Year War.

Title: Mamotte! Lollipop
Summary: A normal, average teen girl accidently swallows something called a "crystal pearl," which many sorcerers are after! As she is in danger, 2 boys come down and vow to protect her. She is no longer an ordinary girl!
Stars: J. Michael Tatum,Brittney Karbowski,Leah Clark,Kate Oxley

Title: Handsome Girl
Summary: This is the story of young fifteen-year-old actress and model Mio Hagiwara, her school and friends, and over all, her relationship with Ichiya Kumagai, a cool young director of her age with which Mio falls in love with.

Title: Space Battleship Tiramisu
Summary: In preparation for his vital wartime missions, ace pilot Subaru Ichinose launches an all-out food-based assault on his own face.

Title: Amazing Lives of the Fast Food Grifters
Summary: A fictional documentary about changing Japanese eating habits and the colorful thieves that swindle the restaurants which serve them.

Title: Karasu tengu Kabuto: Ôgon no me no kemono
Summary: The Samurai Kabuto has to do battle to rescue Princess Ran and her bodyguard before she falls prey to Tamamushi, an evil sorcerer and Karakuri Jinnai, a Gadget Master, and Rasetsubo, a mecha with unique abilities.

Title: Shin Jeeg
Summary: The story of Kotetsushin Jeeg takes place fifty years after the original and features a new cast of characters - primarily the new main character Kenji Kusanagi, a high school student and ...

Title: A Thirty-Year Old's Health and Physical Education
Summary: A 30 years old man and a 30 years old woman are so desperate that Gods of sexual love appears in front of them in order to help them to get graduated from their virginity.
