Summary: Short film from 1928 about a samurai fighting demons.

Title: The Ultimate Esper R
Summary: The plot featured R and the Camera Club going on a stamp tour throughout Japan, with the threat of their club being closed down unless they can collect all the stamps by 6:00 PM.

Title: Domain of Murder
Summary: On the trail of a missing husband, private investigator Goro crosses paths with a deranged killer.

Title: Eternal Quon 3: The Complicity of Dreams
Summary: A Strange Journey through the mind leads Quon to ancient Japan. A new Attractor is discovered, and while this dream state becomes more dangerous, so does the situation for their new would be ally.

Title: One Punch Man: OVA 2 #02 Ossan-tachi to Tsuri
Summary: Atomic Samurai and Bang go out fishing to a lake, and Giant Salamander attacks.

Title: Twin Hawks
Summary: The story of two competing motorcycle racers, who both bear the title of Hawk, as they strive to become the best racer in the world.

Title: Aria the OVA: Arietta
Summary: Someday Aria Company will be under Akari's care. But Akari isn't sure she'll ever be confident enough to handle such a big responsibility.

Title: Atakku no. 1: Namida no fushichô
Summary: The fourth and final recap film of Attack No.1. Now set in high school, the team competes at inter-high, but tragedy strikes.

Title: Tamayura: Sore wa anohi no koto..., nanode
Buta
Summary: Kitsune, the son of a rich merchant, is kidnapped by pirates after examining an old family treasure map, and it is up to Buta, a samurai for hire, to save him.

Title: Kiddy Grade: Truth Dawn
Summary: A recap of episodes 19-24 of the Kiddy Grade TV series.

Title: Kodomo no jikan 2 gakki: Nakayoshi no ippo
House of Flames
Summary: A solitary maiden recounts the story of Unai-Otome, a pure maid who lived 500 years ago and had two suitors, a poet and a warrior.

Title: Five Numbers!
Summary: Five people and a cat discover themselves in a prison, with the power cut, no guards - and no exit. Where are they? And what are they doing there? And what is the significance of the numbers on their uniforms?

Title: Gegege no Kitarô: Saikyô yôkai gundan! Nihon jôriku!!
Urusei Yatsura: Raging Sherbet
Summary: Lum & her girlfriends are invited to Neptune by Oyuki. There she shows them her new business venture at a ranch of flying sherbets, birds capable of producing sherbet cones from their beaks. Ran convinces Oyuki to let her borrow one, her goal is to make some quick cash selling sherbets on Earth. Unfortunately, the combination of being overworked and a hot summer day has made the sherbet extremely cranky, even from its refrigerated cage. It breaks from its cage and escapes, but not before attacking Ran and Lum, and trashing Benten's brand-new bike by shooting sherbet cones at it. Now it's up to Ran to retrieve the sherbet before Benten blasts it out of the sky, and more importantly, before Oyuki finds out.

Title: Yuuki Yuuna wa yuusha de aru: Washio Sumi no shou dai-1-shou 'Tomodachi'
Summary: The story takes place on the Japanese island Shikoku in the fictional city of Sanshu, based on the real-life city of Kan'onji in Kagawa Prefecture,[in the 300th year of the Era of the Gods Yuna, Mimori, Fu, and Itsuki are all members of the Sanshu Middle School Hero Club Sanshu Chugaku Yusha-bu), dedicating themselves to helping those that request help. One day in their regular daily lives, the Hero Club members are suddenly caught in an explosion of light and transported to a strange forest, where they encounter mysterious monsters known as Vertex which seek to destroy the Shinju ("Divine Tree"), the guardian deity which protects and blesses humanity. Using a special phone application granted by Taisha, an organization dedicated to the Shinju, Yuna and her friends must transform into "heroes" with magical powers to protect their world from imminent destruction.

Title: Y's II: Castle in the Heavens
Summary: Adol Christin is taken to the flying land of Ys after defeating Fact and uniting the six books of Ys. He is taken and cared for by Lilia, a red haired girl from Rance Village. Adol learns quickly that the people on this land believe there is nothing beyond the barriers of their land, and that the monsters are the Gods who created the land. Adol challenges their beliefs and through strong opposition, proves himself right, but soon after he has to save the people from the truth...and face the darker side of himself.

Title: Gun Girls
Summary: Qiang Niang mainly tells of the protagonist Carrie, who has lost her combat memories, searching for herself and the story of her final "Awakening". In the years between 2025 to 2030, a world war involving the entire world has resulted in the demise of half the world's population, and humanity has already lost control of the direction the war shall go in. In order to seize ultimate victory, war has gradually been turned into a battle without people, similar to a game. War has already become about Satellite lasers, Bomb drones, Intelligent AI, a battlefield between unmanned gun turrets and tanks - Then, there are also a group of young maidens who uses outdated firearms to engage in battle -- the Gun Girls.

Title: Touhou 1 Rei'iden: Highly Responsive to Prayers
Summary: Reimu Hakurei (the protagonist) enters through the gateway into another world, intent on locating and punishing the one responsible for destroying her shrine. Players direct a yin yang orb with amulets to break away blocks and the level is over once all of them are gone. If the player runs out of time on a level, bullets will rain down until the player completes the level or dies. Bosses are defeated by hitting the orb into them until their life is fully depleted.

Title: Wish Upon the Pleiades
Summary: Subaru is a young girl who discovers that her best friend Aoi is part of magical group trying to recover alien engine fragments so that a little being from the Pleiades star system can return to his home. Subaru considers joining them as she was selected by the Pleiadian, president of this after school club, as the possible new member.

Title: Shiawase-sô no Okojo-san
Summary: A white ermine escapes from an exotic pet store, and is found unconscious by a college student, who takes him home to his apartment complex. Now named "Kojopî", he struggles to adapt to his new life in the building; where he encounters the oft-eccentric human tenants, and their pets.

Title: Da Capo II
Summary: The undying Sakura Trees return. The story once again takes place on Hatsunejima, but is set 53 years after the events of D.C. and D.C.S.S.. Although some characters will probably look a bit familiar to the initiated eye, the cast is a new one. The new main protagonist is Yoshiyuki Sakurai, who lives next door to the Asakura sisters Yume and Otome, who are the granddaughters of Junichi and Nemu from the first season.

Title: Aki's Melody
Summary: Aki Miyagawa moved to Tokyo to pursue her dream to be a taiko drummer, but had a hard time balancing her strict training regimen with her part-time job. Now, after 15 years, she's returning to coach others for a taiko festival. (Source: ANN) Project by J.C.Staff announced to be part of Anime Mirai 2015.

Title: Love Like Aliens
Summary: In a future not too far from now, Humanity has advanced to a point where the line between Homo sapiens and Androids have blurred completely. This has occurred so that the species could survive. Technology has allowed humans to travel into deep space to colonize other planets and galaxies deep in the universe because Earth has become uninhabitable. One of the many unfortunate results of this robotic Darwinism is that human behavior and consciousness has also changed over the years. Much of what makes one human -- love, family, intimacy etc., have all become things of the past. Almost legend.

Title: Saikyou Robot Daiouja
Summary: Eden 1 rules over about 50 planets throughout the galaxy. With the aid of his two faithful retainers Duke Sukedo and Baron Kakusu, Prince Mito decides to undertake a royal inspection tour of the planets undercover. However, the empire is a dangerous place and is plagued with vice feudal lords and corrupt space merchants, as well as other evil people. Using the royal family's weapon, the combining robot Daiohja, Prince Mito punishes any kind of villains that are within Eden 1's empire.

Title: The Cosmopolitan Prayers
Summary: Koto unknowingly seals away the Sun Goddess Amaterasu, and now she is in a different world and can't return. Meeting priestesses who combat the evil in this strange place she learns that Black Towers throughout the land keep Amatersu sealed away and are guarded by evil monsters. Koto must now find a way to help defeat these monsters and return the world to the way it was.

Title: Weiß Kreuz: OVA
Summary: The Weiss Kreuz OVAs technically come after the TV series. Kaori and Akira, sister and brother whose parents were murdered by the American military then said to have died in an accident, are trying to do themselves what Weiss is meant to do. Kaori, a teenage girl who attends the same school as Omi, hacks into the American database while her brother, Akira, goes in to kill the man responsible. Since he is trying to do this Weiss gets a mission to destroy him. Omi, being friends with Kaori, and Ken, thinking that Akira and Kaori are in the right, both refuse the mission. Aya and Yoji, however, accept. This leads to conflict within Weiss.

Title: Glitzy Dolls Go Dating
Summary: Sassie and Chillie become regulars at the Speed Dating Cafe.

Title: Guardian Ninja Mamoru!
Summary: Nerdy boy Mamoru is secretly a highly competent Ninja on a mission to protect his clumsy neighbor Yuuna.

Title: Zenonzard: The Animation
Summary: The year 20XX. Humans called Concodes and ultra-high-performance AI called Codeman team up as buddies to compete in the card battle game Zenozard. People are going wild with excitement at the world championships, The Zenon.

Title: Inu to Neko Docchi mo Katteru to Mainichi Tanoshii
Summary: A fun comedy about a young woman named Matsumoto and her day-to-day life with her adorably gullible dog and sweetly malicious cat.

Title: Tekkaman Blade: Burning Clock
Summary: Flashbacks are shown on Shinya's life before he dies including evens on his rivalry with Takaya.

Title: Tottoko Hamtarou wa Ham Ham Paradise! Kazu Katachi Chie
Summary: Hamtaro and the Ham-Hams learn about numbers (kazu), shapes (katachi) and knowledge (chie), by solving some problems with these elements in order to get to a castle where a celebration takes place.

Title: Karo & Piyobupt: A House
Summary: One day in winter, two birds were flying to the snow field. They found a fine big tree and decided to build their house on it. Carrying logs, cutting them, putting together, finally a lovely house was completed.

Title: Atakku no. 1: Namida no kaiten reshîbu
Summary: The second Attack No.1 recap film. This covers episode 7-14 of the original TV series.

Title: Little Nemo Pilot
Summary: Little Nemo: Adventures in Slumberland was released in American theaters in 1992. However, at one point earlier in its development many people from Studio Ghibli had been involved with the project. In 1984 they produced this test pilot.

Title: Starship Girl Yamamoto Yohko
Summary: After a spaceship accident, a female pilot is sent from 2999 to 1999 with amnesia. Having no memory accept occasional flashback, she believes she's just a normal girl and goes to attend high school.
Stars: Minami Takayama,Hunter Mackenzie Austin,Steven Bendik,Sienna Benioff

Title: All That Gundam
Summary: A short Gundam music video with various Gundams flying across the screen.

Title: Hime-sama Goyojin
Summary: A young schoolgirl's life turns chaotic when she gets a magical crown stuck to her forehead.

Title: Miss Monochrome
Summary: An android, Miss Monochrome, goes on a quest to become Japan's newest pop idol.

Title: The Dance of the Chagamas
Summary: The first full cel-animated short. A group of tanukis investigate a temple and cause mischief.

Title: Juippiki no neko
Summary: A gang of eleven cats have stolen a fish and are banned out of the town.

Title: The Chocolate Panic Picture Show
Summary: Follow Manbo, Chinbo and Chonbo as they are flung into a strange, psychedelic world of madness they don't understand. See them cause chaos through their zany, unpredictable antics in this comical take on cultural imperialism. (Source: MAL)

Title: VOY@GER
Summary: Voy@ger is conceptual movie produced in commemoration of the 16th anniversary of the iDOLM@STER franchise. It features an image song of the same name, gathering 15 different idols from 5 different sub-franchises.

Title: Twin Signal
Summary: A robot is attacked by his creators other former models, however now he is re-programed and is sent on a mission, to steal the latest robot technology and destroy anything that gets in his way.
Stars: David Thund,Kevin T. Collins,Lisa Ortiz,Michelle Newman

Title: Free Kick Toward Tomorrow
Summary: The lives and soccer games of the young members of Godai Team.

Title: Locke the Superman OVA 2
Summary: Five people try to get they're memories back by saving the human race.

Title: Huckleberry no Bouken
Summary: The adventures of an orphan boy Huckleberry and an escaped slave together on a raft along the Mississippi.

Title: The Midnight Parasites
Summary: A desolate landscape contains a series of surreal creatures, some humanoid while others completely alien. Their lives intermingle, with interactions ranging from docile and symbiotic to excruciatingly violent.

Title: Meine Liebe
Summary: In Kuchen, an island off the edge of Europe, there exists an elite boarding school: The Rosenstolz Academy. Meine Liebe explores the lives of five students who are Strahl (or scholars who aid in protecting the kingdom) candidates.

Title: Sergeant Keroro the Super Movie 3: Keroro vs. Keroro Great Sky Duel De Arimasu!
God Mars: Untold Legend of Seventeen
Summary: Marg was deprived his little brother, Mars, by Zure, and lost his parents. Therefore, he was living alone on the planet, Gishin. He became a member of guerrilla to riot against the dictator Zure, and he fell in love with Ruru, the daughter of the leader, Ura. However, the organization was destroyed. He was trapped by Zure, and he was brainwashed to become a soldier. Then, his long cherished wish that he would meet his brother again was realized - as a duel with him.

Title: The Curse of Good-girl Syndrome
Summary: Many communities, be it family, schools, or workplaces, demand that you meet their expectations in return for the places they offer for you. You learn, in the very early stage of your life, to play a role of a good girl/boy to secure the places you need for survival. You keep playing the role so long a period of time at so many places that your required persona takes over your true personality. You may not even remember that you once had a different personality before, but your anger, if any, toward those who appear to be living as they like is the evidence that it is the way you wanted to be and that your original personality is still alive down deep.

Title: Moshi koukou yakyuu no joshi manêjâ ga Dorakkâ no 'Manejimento' wo yondara
Summary: Minami joins her High School baseball team as a team manager after finding out that her best friend Yuuki is in the hospital and can't be a team manager any more. In order to try to fill in for Yuuki and to help out the team the best she can, she goes out to find a book on how to manage a baseball team. Unfortunately, she accidentally buys Peter Drucker's book called "Management: Tasks, Responsibilities, Practices" which is actually about how to properly manage a business. Because she couldn't return the book, she decides to read it anyway and to try to apply the business management concepts to the baseball team so that way they can go on and win the Nationals.

Title: Veni Vidi Nescio: I Came, I Saw, I Don't Know
Summary: Shot in a Japanese theme park that replicates a Dutch town, Veni Vidi Nescio explores ideas of displacement and dislocation through conversations between two Amsterdammers as they discuss home, work and responsibility. On screen we meet two Japanese girls and their sound recordist as we are taken through the replica Holland and the islands of Nagasaki via experimental narrative and animation. Vidi Vidi Nescio (I Came, I Saw, I Don't Know) was inspired by the writing of Jan Hendrik Frederik Gronloh (aka Nescio) whose characters used Amsterdam as a way to inform them of their reality but ultimately it conveyed how transient they were in a city that will outlive them.

Title: Sakura Kakumei ~Hana Saku Otome-tachi~
Summary: The game is set in the year Taisho 100 (2011 CE) in the imperial capital Tokyo. Japan suffered devastating damage in the Great Imperial Capital Disaster 16 years ago. The country recovered with Mirai, a new type of energy based in spiritual power. But with the operation of the New Imperial Tower, cherry blossoms don't bloom, and the number of demons called Koki increases. They attack people in every region of Japan. The official government force Great Imperial Combat Revue B.L.A.C.K. rises up to protect people from the Koki. The girls simultaneously protect citizens and gain popularity with their supreme live performances.

Title: Sugar Lump
Summary: This is a story of an adolescent boy living in a burning house with his parents. He can't drink black coffee yet he refuses his mother's offer of sugar lump. Rejecting his mother's kindness and ignoring his father's concern, he struggles with his own internal conflicts and continues to perform the minor rebellions of youth. Trying to attract the attention of a girl, the boy crashes a stolen motorcycle. In the aftermath of the accident he finds in his pocket a bill stolen from his mother's purse, now changed into a sugar lump. Rather than mend the relationship with his family, he takes the sugar lump to his friends, but they reject him, throwing the sugar lump away.

Title: Samurai: Hunt for the Sword
Summary: Shinjuro Tateoka, the young son of a master swordsman, suddenly finds himself in charge of his father's dojo (school) when his father leaves him a note saying he's left on a journey but doesn't know when he'll be back. When the Tokugawa shogunate asks him for help against Mikage, a rogue samurai who stole a powerful sword from the shogunate, Shinjuro has to fight for his dojo, his honor, and his life.

Title: Little Maruko
Summary: Maruko Sakura is a young elementary school student growing up with her parents, grandparents, and elder sister in this animated series based on the producer's childhood in the '60s. As Maruko grows up and learns the ways of the world, she and her friends get themselves into an assortment of predicaments, but with Maruko's ingenuity (and the help of her grandfather) they usually find her way through.
Stars: Eman Hail,Abdul Karim Al-Qawasmi,Diana Rahme,Ayman Idrees

Title: Tamayura: Graduation Photo Part 1 - Kizashi
Summary: In the Spring, Fu, Kaoru, Norie, and Maon get promoted to third-year high school students, while Kanae has graduated. Two kouhai join the photography club. Even though they bring in new friends, their lively daily life remains unchanged. Yet, the four third-year students are slowly thinking about their own future dreams and paths as they face graduation in about a year.

Title: 6 Angels
Summary: Deep in the deserts of southwestern United States lies "Neo Purgatory." Formerly a nuclear waste disposal site, the facility has been turned into a prison for hardened criminals; that is, until the prisoners weaponize the nuclear waste and riot, turning Neo Purgatory into an international disaster. Maki Aoba, Doris Nicholas, Marilyn Moreau, and Naomi Jones make up the "Guard of Rose," an all-female special police task force. Along with stowaway Katherine Hook and multi-purpose robot Link, the Guard of Rose is on patrol investigating rumors of an "angel" near Neo Purgatory when their helicopter is shot down. As the crisis within the prison rapidly devolves, the Guard of Rose members might be the only ones who can stop the prisoners before they unleash nuclear armageddon.

Title: Utawarerumono: Tusukuru-koujo no karei naru hibi
Summary: Tells the story of Kuon's childhood days.

Title: Magic Knight Rayarth
Summary: The original pilot of Magic Knight Rayearth.

Title: Gekijouban Harukanaru toki no naka de: Maihitoyo
Kamen Rider Zero-One Short Anime: Everyone's Daily Life
Kunitachi Mate
Summary: Based on characters of a famous cafe Poppo Café, about two girls and their cat open a mate Café in their small town.

Title: Mr. Kiss Kiss Bang Bang
Summary: Suspended for inappropriate office behavior, secret agent 007 (voiced by 9-year-old Dylan Schmidt) must redeem himself by stopping criminal mastermind Dr. Nicholas Wasabi, who is turning the world's coolest guys into monsters.

Title: Taiyô wa tomodachi Ganbare! Soraemon gô
Galaxy Express 999: Can You Live Like a Warrior!?
Hitomi no seiza Minky Momo song special
Momotaro the Undefeated
Summary: An old couple finds a child in a fruit.

Title: Bakuen Campus Guardress
Summary: Within a high school is hidden the gate to the netherworld. Its students and teachers must fight demons who want the gate opened.

Title: Dogura Magura
Summary: CG animated reimagination of

Title: The Magic of Chocolate
Summary: A shop sells magical chocolates that can grant the eater's wishes. But sometimes the wish costs too much, or isn't always right.

Title: Pastel Memories
Summary: In a future Akihabara where otaku culture has declined. Players play as a shopkeeper of an otaku shop. Together with the heroines who are in fact otaku girls, the shopkeeper start helping people claim their lost otaku memories back.

Title: Re-Kan!
Summary: High school girl Hibiki Amami has a sixth sense for spirits which kept her lonely as a child. Will it be different now that she's transferred to a new school?

Title: Dr. Slump: The Secret of Nanaba Castle
Starzinger III
Summary: Princess Aurora and her three android bodyguards finally reach the great planet, but are ambushed by terrifying alien monsters.

Title: I'm Home! Chibi Godzilla
Summary: Chibi Godzilla lives with a woman named Satomi.

Title: The File of Young Kindaichi 2: Murderous Deep Blue
Summary: Kindaichi, Miyuki and Fumi are invited to the resort of the Deep Blue Island by Akane, the daughter of the president of the Aizawa Group. A group of criminals infiltrate the hotel to kill the members of the Aizawa Group.

Title: The Oscar Nominated Short Films 2014: Animation
Summary: Collective screening of the Academy Award nominated short films from the Animation category for 2014.

Title: Fairy King
Summary: Sickly high-school student Jack journeys to Hokkaido in search of a magical cure and falls in with Cú Chulainn, the king of the fairies. Nymphidia, the land of the fairies is under attack from the evil Queen Mab, and Jack must save it.

Title: Iriya no sora, UFO no natsu: Daisanshu sekkin sôgû
Dr. Slump Arale-chan! With Love from the Penguin's Village
Summary: Unable to entertain their princess Puruah, the kingdom of Yapaya requests professor Senbei to create a comedic robot capable of making her laugh for the first time in her life.

Title: Gekijouban Aikatsu sutâzu!
Summary: The film revolves around the students of the Yotsusei Gakuen traveling to a southern island in search for the "Legendary Dress."

Title: Hâbâ raito monogatari: Fasshon Rara yori
Summary: Miho wants to be a fashion designer and wants to make a dress for her little sister, Shuri, to help her win the Dancing Queen contest. Their aunt ruins the dress, the Fairies of Fanland hear her prayer and transform her into a top designer

Title: Tensai Bakavon: Yomigaeru Furandâsu no inu
Fastening Days
Summary: Yoji and Kei become two kid superheroes that use YKK zippers to help people, solve problems and 'fasten' their family relationship.

Title: Chappie, the Witch
Summary: Chappy comes down to earth from the land of magic with her magic family.

Title: Soreike! Anpanman: Mîja to mahou no ranpu
Wake Up, Girls! Zoku gekijouban: Seishun no kage
Summary: Wake Up Girls Seishun no kage: Green Leaves Entertainment is a tiny production company on the verge of going out of business in Sendai, the biggest city in Japan's northeastern Tohoku region. The agency once managed the careers of magicians, photo idols, fortune-tellers, and other entertainers, but its last remaining client finally quit. In danger of having zero talent (literally), the president Tange hatches an idea of producing an idol group. On the brash president's orders, the dissatisfied manager Matsuda heads out to scout raw talent. Matsuda makes a fateful encounter with a certain girl.

Title: Nine: Original-ban
Summary: Just before entering Seishuu High School, track star Katsuya Niimi and judo champion Susumu Karasawa see a girl crying as the school loses a baseball game. The boys decide to join the team and improve it in order to make her smile. The girl turns out to be Yuri Nakao, daughter of the baseball coach, and they learn the baseball team will be shut down if it doesn't start winning. The series follows the three, as well as pitcher Eiji Kurahashi, as Niimi and Karasawa learn about baseball and what it means to be one of nine players on a team, as they work together through high school make it to Koushien.

Title: .hack//GIFT
Summary: Helba has prepared a special hot springs for some much needed rest and relaxation. Tsukasa, Mimiru, BlackRose, Kite and other friends from The World decide they are due for some soaking in the hot springs themselves. There is a catch, however: not only will Helba not reveal its exact location, but she insists that role-playing is forbidden. So who will find it first? And who keeps killing the other characters? Note: This is a parody of the .hack series with appearance of the characters from .hack//SIGN, .hack//Udeden and the games. It is also referred to as "episode 29" of .hack//SIGN. This OVA was originally a giveaway in Japan for those who bought all four .hack-games and will probably be included in the US-release of .hack//Quarantine.

Title: Mikan Enikki
Summary: Mikan Enikki features an cat whose name is 'Mikan', in Japanese means tangerine and color orange. He can talk the human language, read, write and do several tasks like a human. The story focused in the mischief of Mikan, Tom and his other cat friends.

Title: Mai otome zwei
Summary: Picking up one year after the events of Mai-Otome, Arika is now officially Windbloom's Otome. In Ares an asteroid is detected in the sky on a collision course with Earl. After a successful intervention from the Otome a Black robed figure appears and sets in motion a new battle for our heroine. This series follows Arika's search for Mashiro as well as the attempts of the otome to find the truth behind this new enemy and the more powerful slaves it commands.

Title: Mobile Suit Gundam SEED Destiny: TV Movie II - Their Respective Swords
Summary: The Minerva docks at the ZAFT base and they are met by Chairman Durandal. He tells Athrun, Shinn and other crew members, causing Shinn to think about the past and he met a beautiful girl who falls into the ocean. Diving in to rescue her, he must then wait for them to be rescued. The Alliance Forces gather, with also the Orb Allies who launch an attack on ZAFT. The Minerva prepare for a battle, but unknowingly to them, another group is going to try to end all the fighting.

Title: Extreme Hearts
Summary: Hiyori Hayama is an aspiring singer who moved to Tokyo to make her debut. She has always loved singing and hopes to stand on stage like her favorite artist. Unfortunately, the entertainment industry is not all fun and games, as she fails her auditions one after another and struggles to sell her songs. Finding herself still standing at the start line, Hiyori pursues her only opportunity to take the next step forward - partaking in Extreme Hearts. The popular event is a Hyper Sports tournament where participants compete in various sports using ability-enhancing gear for a chance to make their big break. Despite being athletic, however, Hiyori's lack of familiarity with Hyper Sports poses a problem for her. Fortunately, she befriends girls experienced in different sports, and they join the tournament alongside Hiyori, hoping to see her rise to the top.

Title: Kimba the White Lion: Symphonic Poem
Summary: After a spoken introduction describing the various musical instruments used, the film tells the story of Kimba the White Lion, from his birth, to his escape from a ship intended to take him far from home. The story is told entirely without dialogue, and showcases a symphonic tome poem composed by Isao Tomita, based in incidental music he composed for the original television series "Jangaru taitei" (1965).

Title: Kami nomi zo Shiru Sekai: Tenri Hen - Saikai
Summary: It is summer break and Katsuragi Keima intends to spend all his time on video games. An old acquaintance, the timid girl Ayukawa Tenri, returns to the neighbourhood - and apparently carries a lost soul inside of her. It is up to Keima and Elysia de Lute Ima to unravel the secrets of her heart.

Title: Môretsu atarô
Summary: Ataro is a 10-year-old Tokyo boy, who inherits the family store after his father's early death in an accident. The store is threatened by Kokoro Boss and his gang. Ataro has to face the threat with the help of his father's ghost X-goro, his own best friend Dekoppachi, the anthropomorphic alley cat Nyarome, and retired crime boss Butamatsu.

Title: Akai Hayate
Summary: When the Shinogara finest warrior murders their leader, who's also his father, his ninja enemies land a fatal blow. With only minutes left, Hayate transfers his soul into his sister's body...but how long can two souls occupy the same body?

Title: Onegai mai merodi: Kuru kuru shaffuru!
Bonobono: Kumomo no ki no koto
Summary: Scarface and Papas Fritas travel across vast lands to uncover the truth about themselves and their past lives.

Title: Megumi
Summary: A look at the final days in Japan of 13-year-old Megumi Yokota who was kidnapped by the North Korean government in 1977.

Title: Urusei Yatsura: Ryoko's September Tea Party
Yutori-chan
Summary: Yutori-chan works as a part-timer at Popuu, a toy company. It's her first job and her co-worker, Tsumekomi, must teach her the idiosyncrasies of an office.

Title: Mahha gâru
Summary: A young racer girl named Lip goes around the world looking for races.

Title: Detective Conan Bonus File: Fantasista Flower
Marginal #4 Kiss Kara Tsukuru Big Bang
JK meshi!
Summary: A series of anime shorts that feature three high school girls that enjoy cooking B-class dishes.

Title: Tennis no Ouji-sama OVA Another Story II ~Ano Toki no Bokura
Broken Blade: Edge of the Line of Death
Super Secret
Summary: Two neighboring childhood friends. An airheaded girl and the boy who takes care of her like a mother. And of course, his family has a tiny, insignificant supernatural secret.

Title: BanG Dream! 5th Anniversary Animation: CiRCLE Thanks Party!
Summary: A two-episode animation commemorating the 5th anniversary of BanG Dream Girls Band Party.

Title: Offenders of the Universe & Star Trap
Summary: In the first part, a sexy but innocent space warrior girl fights perverse and lustful evil creatures trying to take over the Universe by abusing others and in the second part, one of two women morphs herself into a guy to seduce the other.

Title: Dragon Ball Z: Burst Limit
Summary: Play as all the characters of Dragon Ball Z through all the sagas and episodes of the show.

Title: My Wife Is a Magical Girl: Bewitched Agnes
Summary: Ureshiko Asaba is a twenty-something housewife that few people know is also the magical girl named "Agnes Bell".

Title: Nezumi no densha: Nanatsu ko-nezumi shirîzu 1
Ichigo mashimaro: Orijinaru bideo animêshon - Itsumo.
Hengen Taima Yakou Karura Mau! Sendai Kokeshi Enka
Summary: Shoko and Maiko Ougi are apparently two ordinary schoolgirls in pursuit of graduating and having fun. In reality, the two sisters are powerful exorcists from the Karura temple. Shii-chan can "see" the spirits, and Mai-chan can banish them.

Title: One Punch Man - Wanpanman: The Shadow That Snuck Up Too Close
Summary: Genos trying to find out the secret to Saitama's power by stalking him.

Title: To Shoot Without Shooting
Summary: Ji Chang wants to be the best archer in the world. He seeks out a master who is able, at a distance, to shoot a single leaf off a tree. Over several years, the apprentice studies with the master. Finally, after mastering the techniques, as well as his own ambition, he sets off for the mountains, home of a legendary master of archery...

Title: Non Non Biyori Repeat: Hotaru ga Tanoshinda
Summary: Life in rural Asahigaoka moves at its own pace. Devoid of the pleasures and worries of a bustling metropolis, this small village might seem painfully dull at first glance. However, despite living this far from her hometown of Tokyo, Hotaru Ichijou manages to find a group of friends whom she can spend quality time with. No matter whether it's winter, spring, summer, or fall, they make full use of everything the nature around them has to offer.

Title: Wish Upon the Pleiades
Summary: Subaru is a junior high student that loves the stars. One day, after school, she meets aliens from Pleiades in outer space. The Pleiadesians said they summoned a helper from Earth to collect engine parts so that they could repair the interstellar immigrant ship that broke down in the Earth's orbit. However, for some reason they summoned one but ended up with five helpers. The five girls assigned to be "wizards" all are lacking something, and even when they try to combine their powers, they're always mismatched and failing. On top of it, a mysterious boy appears. In order to help a hapless alien, with the power of infinite possibilities due to immaturity as their weapon, Subaru and the other four fly around to gather parts while nurturing their friendship.

Title: Norman the Snowman
Summary: The boy has longed to visit the northern country and experience the beautiful mysteries of nature that his childhood friend Norman the Snowman has told him about. On the first day of snow in the northern country, the boy sneaks out of his house and boards a northbound train with Norman to see the mysteries of nature with his own eyes.

Title: Mewtwo - Kakusei e no prologue
Summary: Mewtwo is being chased by Dunc, a Pokémon Hunter. Unable to trust humans, Mewtwo flees into the wilderness while Dunc tricks Virgil, the Unova League champion and a Pokémon Rescue Team operator, into helping him locate the legendary Pokémon.

Title: Yamakoshi mura no Mari to sanbiki no koinu
Summary: Mari's three puppies were just born, when the earthquake in Yamakoshimura started. Now their home is in ruins, and their owner, an old man is trapped under the debris. Mari somehow manages to break her chain, and encourages the old man, until help arrives. In the end, someone saves the old man, but he can't take in the dogs, so they remain in the now abandoned village. Can Mari and the puppies live on like this?

Title: Shin Kabukichou Story Hana no Asukagumi
Summary: In the year 199X, on the dark, shady streets of New Kabuki Town, the free-for-all between gangs of young delinquents and a corrupt police force is further complicated by the appearance of a mysterious girl named Asuka. Based on the popular girl's manga Hana no Asukagumi. (The Glorious Asuka Gang!) by Takaguchi Satosumi.

Title: AWOL: Absent Without Leave
Summary: Cyress is a peaceful place. People are going about their lives. Two lovers embrace, a family throws a birthday party for their child, a group of people party at a local restaurant. But suddenly, their surroundings explode into smoke and flame. A group of terrorists has snuck through the planetary defenses and has begun an assault. Defenseless, there is little the people of Cyress can do. As the military scrambles to discover what happened, the terrorists manage to hijack seven PDP missiles, which are capable of destroying an entire planet. These terrorists, who call themselves "Solomon" can now hold entire planets hostage. They must not be stopped.

Title: Fastest Finger First
Summary: Shiki Koshiyama enter his new high school, and there he introduced to the world of competitive quiz bowl. after his experience his first competition he decided to listen to his persistence classmate Mari and join the Quiz Study Group of his school.

Title: Momotaro's Sky Adventure
Summary: Momotaro has been requested to fight off the Wild Eagle enemy which has suddenly appeared. He takes to the skies in his airplane, accompanied by a dog, a monkey , and a pheasant, and heads for an island some 10,000 kilometers away. One of the island people promises to prepare the two refuels that the plane requires during its flight to the island. The first refuel will be found on a giant tortoise shell, and the second is a refuel station especially positioned on the back of a whale which will come to surface. Momotaro's plane is attacked by the Wild Eagle out of the blue as it approaches the island, but after an exciting dogfight in the air, he successfully fights off the enemy.

Title: Million Doll
Summary: Million Doll revolves around Suuko, an idol-loving hikikomori (shut-in) who has one ability: To make any idol popular through the power of blogging. She puts her sights on the Fukuoka idol Itorio and tries to make her sell more, but she is impeded by the charismatic idol Ryuu-san and the underground idol Mariko.

Title: Ambassador Magma
Summary: The alien invader Goa plots to conquer the Earth. He first warns the Murakami family (father Atsushi, mother Tomoko, and son Mamoru) of their invasion, and demonstrates his powers by transporting them to a prehistoric jungle and destroying a Giant Dinosaur before their very eyes. But they will not agree to surrender to Goa, so hope comes in the form of Magma, an armored, golden giant with long hair and antennae. He and his human-sized wife Mol, both created by the wizard Earth are sent to defend the world against Goa.

Title: Danguard Ace 3
Summary: The saga concludes as Doppler's evil robots fight the transforming Danguard Ace over control of the new planet, Promete.

Title: Majokko club yoningumi a-kuukan karano alien X
Summary: Yuu, Persia, Mai and Yumi are together in a science fiction-like adventure. An awful monster assault young and beautiful girls, leaving them transformed into ugly hags.

Title: Hello Kitty Ringo no Mori to Parallel Town
Senko 8: Timeskip
Stars: Yojuani Guillaume,So Lono,Junko Lu King,Zack Ben Adj

Title: Soukou Kyojin Z-Knight
Summary: A promotional video tape with a short Z-Knight anime and other clips sold with a Z-Knight double pack including colour variations of two Z-Knights.

Title: Shin Hakkenden
Summary: In the future, eight people with eight unique jewels must save the earth from destruction.

Title: King of Prism: Shiny Seven Stars 2
Yuuki Yuuna wa yuusha de aru: Washio Sumi no shou dai-2-shou 'Tamashii'
Pan De Peace!
Summary: Highschool friends get together to eat, talk and get excited for different kinds of bread.

Title: Dojoji Temple
Summary: A man who is on a pilgrimage spends the night with a woman. After they share a moment of passion, he runs away and she chases him.

Title: My Dear Marie
Summary: A college student is shy and awkward with humans, but a genius in robotics. Utterly failing to communicate his feelings to his dream girl Marie, he creates an android almost exactly like her, close enough to pass for her twin.
Stars: Mitsuo Iwata,Charles C. Campbell,Yûko Miyamura,Nobutoshi Canna

Title: Love Live! School Idol Project Recap
Summary: Narrated recap of

Title: Shin Chan
Summary: English language version based on the Japanese series

Title: Eiga Hanakappa: Hanasake! Pakkân Chou no kuni no daibouken
Urusei Yatsura: I Howl at the Moon
Iriya no sora, UFO no natsu: Rabu retâ
Spring Song
Summary: The story is about the sakura flowers.

Title: Gebaude-Baude
Summary: A cute little robot that likes to throw her hips around is regarded as a princess by a large spider-ish caretaker robot. She awakens each day to a short adventure which culminates quickly into a dreamlike resolution.

Title: Galaxy Investigation 2100: Border Planet
Summary: After a deadly space virus infects a girl he likes Subaru travels the galaxy and visits various planets in the hope of finding the source and more importantly the cure.

Title: Pokémon: Pikachu's Winter Vacation 2
Summary: The sequel to Pikachu's Winter Vacation, has two more fun stories featuring Pikachu and his friends.

Title: Man in the Tunnel Alley
Summary: A mysterious man, wearing a mask with eyes on it, is unable to go anywhere because he is plugged into an electrical outlet. He sits in an alleyway while various people visit him, curious about who he is and why he is there.

Title: Minky Momo: The Fairy Princess of Dreamland
Summary: Minky Momo, a princess from a magical world is sent to Earth to help people recover their lost hopes and dreams. Using her magic, and with the help of her magical dog, monkey and bird, Minky - known on Earth as "Gigi" - encounters amazing adventures.

Title: You're Under Arrest: No Mercy!
Summary: Fresh from being transferred to the LAPD, Miyuki and Natsumi must investigate some unusual car theft incidents in their area. And when Miyuki's yellow 1973 Ford Mustang Mach 1 is "gone in 60 seconds" (literally), the situation gets more complicated when the thief turns out to be a former Japanese detective.

Title: Mail Order Maiden 28
Summary: Ever wonder how the cretins of this world typically get the nice girls? Aiwa certainly falls into that catagory: he spends his days endlessly obsessing over a girl named Kozue whom he can never have and runs every chance encounter with her through his mind. Oh yes, he's got it bad... To put his mind a little more at ease, Aiwa ordered a little something special to brighten up those long nights, but it so long to arrive that he totally forgot about it! Now, true to form, the company has messed up his order and sent him, well something...different. But just how different he's about to find out! When Aiwa opens his box from the company, he finds out that technology is a little better than he bargained for, and Aiwa is in for the surprise of his life. Inside is Satomi who is just about exactly what every man is looking for: loyal, pure-hearted, cheerful ... and utterly insatiable. It doesn't take long for Aiwa to learn just how perfect his new little friend is, and how his life is no longer entirely his own. But even as perfect as she is, Aiwa's still dreaming of Kozue. Of course, he's not above a little (or even a lot!) of practice until the day he can finally score with the girl of his dreams... Now, all he's got to do is to find the off button before Kozue comes over again....

Title: Baldr Force EXE
Summary: Tohru Soma was a member of a hacker group called "Steppen Wolf". They deiced to do just one more attack on FLAK, a big military organization but was discovered and then arrested. Tohru doesn't want to serve a long prison sentence so he decides to join FLAK, so he can find out who killed his friend. He and his new team members must save the world from Fei Dao, an extremist group who wants to destroy the cyber world.

Title: Paboo & Mojies
Summary: Paboo is a young yet curious panda boy who lives in a magical land called Mojies Town. One day, he found a magical book up the Moji Tree and decides to get it. After he got the book, a magical fairy named Pappy popped out and told him about the book he found: The Mojires Book and also about the Magic Words that would help him and his friends in any situation. Now, Paboo and his friends all explore and solve problems in a quirky, imaginative, and sometimes zany world and discover each Magic Word with the help from Pappy.

Title: Bavel's Book
Summary: The imaginative possibilities of animation and reading are intertwined in this spirited Koji Yamamura short. Two kids find a dusty book on a park bench and soon become immersed in a "Robinson Crusoe"-like adventure. They're in for a jolt, however, when their desert island starts swimming. Yamamura's painted frames swell with movement and color as the boys zoom through the literary imagination.

Title: The Legend of Glaive
Summary: Shion, a young man of the Dying Earth, must travel throughout the eras in search of an ancient artifact. With the powers attributed to the blood of the mysterious warrior race, the Nerubs, he must persevere with his comrades to save the lives of his family and friends. This is his journey. His journey for hope. The journey to obtain "The Glaive."

Title: Jellyfish Restaurant
Summary: In the story, the protagonist Youtarou Misaki finds himself lying on the beach one day. He is picked up by Arashi, who manages a restaurant called Kurage no Shokudou. When asked who he is, the protagonist tells a lie that he lost his memory-but he remembers everything, including the fact that his twin brother died.

Title: Broken Blade: The Time of Awakening
Summary: In the continent of Cruzon, an impending war between the Kingdom of Krisna and the nation of Athens is brimming. The people of this land are able to use quartz for whatever purpose they desire. Yet one person, Rygart Arrow, is not. He is an "un-sorcerer," a person unable to use quartz. But this characteristic will enable him to pilot an ancient Golem, one strong enough to put up a fight against the invading army of Athens.

Title: Gadurin
Summary: Due to spacecraft failure earthlings Ryu with computer robot "MOS" landed on self-navigated planet Gdleen. There Ryu meets a cute Euradonian fairy Fana. At that time, the planet was in the midst of a dispute over a Gavana temple. Self proclaimed God Gavana captured Fana for a sacrifice. Would they be able to escape? And what the identity of Gavana?.

Title: Rennyo and His Mother
Summary: Rennyo was the key figure responsible for the restoration of Shin Buddhism in Japan, in particular the Honganji lineage that had a slump in its fortunes during the Middle Ages. According to the legend, his motivation was a pivotal childhood incident at the age of six when his mother summoned him and told him about his destiny to revive the fortunes of the Honganji school to which he was the next in line. She then mysteriously disappeared from the temple. Taking her words to heart, from a background of great poverty and hardship, at the age of 16 he set out to spread the word across the land.

Title: Wagahai wa inu de aru: Don matsugoro no monogatari
Summary: Mr. Matsuzawa is a novelist who lives in Chiba Prefecture. Only his daughter Kazuko knows that the family dog, Don Matsugorou, can talk.

Title: Ginga no Uo Ursa Minor Blue
Summary: This adventurous story of a boy named Uri and an old man takes place in the cosmic Milky Way where the starfish live. This is the tale of their fantasy journey in search of the mysterious monster fish.

Title: Bremen 4: Angels in Hell
Summary: An extraterrestrial tasks four animals to form a musical group and stop war from spiraling out of control.

Title: Nishi no yoki majo: Astraea testament
Goku sayonara zetsubô sensei
Summary: The new adventures of the negative-minded teacher Nozomu Itoshiki and his class of nice but nutty students.

Title: Hime Chen! Otogi Chikku Idol Lilpri
The Wonderful Galaxy of Oz
Summary: In the year 2060, eight year old Dorothy Gale and here genetically enhanced dog, Talk-Talk, are mysteriously swept off the planet New Kansas and Talk-Talk find themselves in a strange, new Galaxy, far from home.

Title: Memory
Summary: Explores the pros, cons and the nature of memory.

Title: Early Reins
Summary: Sheriff Candidate and Margaret get on a train to Sunshine Hill she gets caught in a robbery and tries to stop it. But they have the help of five young women to help them.

Title: Violinist of Hameln
Summary: In Hameln no Violin Hiki, You play the role of Hamel, An adventurer whose weapon is.. a violin, Hamel arrives at a small town attacked by monsters, Now he must go on a quest to find and destroy the evil power behind the attacks.

Title: Wool 100%
Summary: A pair of elderly junk collectors find their lives turned upside down when their latest procurement brings them into contact with an obsessive young knitter in the hallucinogenic feature debut of prominent short filmmaker Mai Tominaga.

Title: Tokimeki Memorial: The First Finder
Summary: As a freshman at a prestigious high school explores the new school with a video camera, he interviews the female heroes of the story. Based on and released with Tokimeki Memorial 4.

Title: A Grandma's Goldfish
Summary: The story follows an old lady that is very fond of her gold fish and the dream she has revolving it. She recalls an event in her younger years as a child and the reason behind her love for gold fishes.

Title: Nyanbo!
Summary: The "Nyanbo" are creatures with square bodies with ears and tails that came to Earth from outer space.

Title: Koihime musô: Gun'yû, seito kaichô no za o neratte aiarasou no koto - Ato, porori mo aruyo!
Meiji Tokyo Renka: Hana Kagami no Fantasia
Phungus & Mowld
Summary: The adventures of Phungus a yellow alien from a xenophobic planet, Mowld a human always on some shady "mission", and ALIS, their hacked imperial robot in a spaceship with a Framistan Drive considered extremely unstable and unreliable.

Title: Ranma ½ Nettou uta gassen volume 1
Sankichi the Monkey: The Storm Troopers
Summary: Short movie from 1934 about a war between monkeys and bears.

Title: Sora to umi no aida
Summary: Set in Onomichi City, six girls dream of becoming Space Fishermen. They aim to capture god-eating monsters that leave fish vulnerable, as well as enemies which they encounter.

Title: Garakuta no Machi
Summary: The story of a young boy who attempts to allude a junk eating robot that follows him wherever he goes.

Title: Tatchi 3: Kimi ga tôrisugita ato ni
Angel Tales
Summary: A down on his luck guy is told by a fortune teller that his luck will change. Soon after three girls appear claiming to be his guardian angels.

Title: I Wanna Be Your Friend
Summary: "When making friends it is most important to cooperate". A short stop-motion animated comedy from director Iku Ogawa and Tokyo University of the Arts.

Title: Otome Game no Hametsu Flag shika Nai Akuyaku Reijou ni Tensei shiteshimatta... OVA
.hack//Liminality Vol. 3: In the Case of Kyoko Tohno
Summary: In the third volume of the .hack//Liminality series, Junichiro Tokuoka travels to Tokyo, Japan to talk with a girl named Kyoko Tohno about the mysteries of "The World", an online computer game that put some people in a comatose state. At the same time, Kyoko has received a strange cell phone e-mail from Helba. They continue to discuss and are trying to get clues about everything related to "The World". They later meet a mysterious man named Sato Ichiro and speak with him to get answers. Will Tokuoka and the three girls Mai, Yuki, and Kyoko that he cooperates with be able to find the mysteries and clues of "The World" and save the comatose victims?

Title: Hyperdimension Neptunia the Animation: Neptune's Summer Vacation
Uta no purinsusama: Maji Love rejendo sutâ
Labyrinth Labyrinthos
Summary: A little girl and her cat fall into a world of strange people.

Title: Hataraki Man
Summary: Story about young journalist girl who failed in work-life balance.

Title: Kyomu Senshi Miroku
Summary: A psychic ninja fantasy suggesting that the assassins did't die out during the Sengoku era but burrowed under Japan, where they fought a new war against the alien occupants of a crashed spaceship.

Title: Nyorôn Churuya san
Summary: In this series of original net animations, Churuya-san faces constant bullying from the SOS Brigade, the jealousy of Asakura, and a disheartening shortage of smoked cheese. Nyoron!

Title: Ta-chan's Underwater Adventure
Summary: The king of the seas answers a call for help and sends the fish to a ship.

Title: Grrl Power
Summary: Three girls who will take any job try to convince a boy to go back to school.

Title: Iriya no sora, UFO no natsu: Jûhachiji yonjûnanafun sanjûnibyô
Sentimental Journey
Summary: Sentimental Journey is a collection of twelve short stories about twelve different girls. Though unrelated, there is one common theme that binds the episodes together: each girl's bittersweet experience of first love.

Title: Chocolate Underground
Summary: When chocolate is banned, two friends start a bootlegging operation.

Title: Kigyou Senshi Yamazaki: Long Distance Call
Di Gi Charat: A Trip to the Planet
Summary: Dejiko decided to take a vacation and visit her home, Planet Di Gi Charat, together with Puchiko, Gema, and (accidentally) Rabi~en~Rose. However, Piyoko and her aids would not let go this chance to capture her.

Title: Ancient Girl's Frame
Summary: When monstrous creatures from deep space terrorize earth, a chosen group of soldiers called the Ancient Girls become humanity's only hope.

Title: 21 emon: Sora ike! Harashi no purinsesu
Eiga Suîto Purikyua: Torimodose! Kokoro ga tsunagu kiseki no merodi
Sekiheki onsen dai kessen: Seito no bakuryû

Summary: The Earth Alliance fights against the Lunar Empire of Giganos with the help of an elite trio of super robots.

Title: That Girl Is 1000%
Summary: Azusa Kawahara is the soccer team manager who is going out with Ikumi, one of the team members. Lately Ikumi has been busy after school and this is making Azusa uncomfortable.

Title: The Lost 15 Boys: The Big Adventure on Pirates' Island
Gundam Build Fighters: Battlogue
Summary: This is a dynamic dream battle featuring many types of Gunpla skirmishing in all sorts of situations.

Title: One Punch Man: OVA 2 #05 Puri-puri Prisoner to datsugoku shûjin-tachi
Summary: Puri-Puri Prisoner accidentally releases the inmates of Smelly Lid Prison while fighting against a monster. Realizing that the incident may cost a certain cute employee his job, Puri-Puri Prisoner heads out to find the escaped inmates.

Title: Apfelland monogatari
Summary: In 1905 a young heiress comes to the European country of Apfelland. A young boy rescues her and the two have a great adventure.

Stars: Atsushi Abe,La Salle Ishii,Daiki Yamashita,Tomohiro Yamaguchi

Summary: Bell and Aida are scouting the zone around Towasanga, when they're attacked by Mask Squad. Mask is piloting a new unit, a pitch black Phenex.

Title: A.I.Channel
Summary: A YouTube channel featuring Kizuna AI, a Japanese virtual YouTuber and self-proclaimed artificial intelligence.

Title: CardCaptors

Title: Qqq
Summary: Three Qs and more make QQQ. QQQ spin and roll. And QQQ transform themselves, spinning. QQQ transform, spinning, rolling, swinging, turning and traveling.

Title: Scientific Adventure Team Tansar 5
Summary: In 1999, a special mystery/paranormal investigative unit consisting of five youth battle different situations to save the day.

Title: Gude Crest
Summary: Two women escape from a ship by a slave owner with help from their friend, and a young boy. Their one friend is killed and they make it their mission to return the pendent to hi siblings.

Title: Beyond Noh

Summary: A baby kangaroo's family and friends try to save him from a bad old wolf.

Fate/kaleid liner Prisma Illya: Prisma Phantasm
Diamond Daydreams
Summary: The romantic struggles of six young women from the northern island of Hokkaido, Japan, each believing that if you make a wish on the "diamond dust" snow, it will come true.
Stars: Kyle Jones,Mark Laskowski,Eden J. Barrera,John Swasey

Title: Ichigo mashimaro: Orijinaru bideo animêshon - Mainichi.
Aishirudo 21: Kurisumasu bouru e no michi - minami no shima de tokkunda! YA - HA -!
Summary: A brief OVA about the Devil Bats training on an island.

Title: Meimon! Daisan yakyû-bu
Summary: Asunaro is a new student at a school with three baseball teams; the first is renowned as being one of the best in the prefecture, but the third, Asunaro's team, is filled with the rejects and unskilled of the baseball world.

Title: Magical Somera-chan
Summary: The story follows the everyday life of Somera Nonomoto who can use the strongest kenpo, Nonomoto Mahou-ken, which is inherited from her mother with her younger sister Kukuru. (Source: Crunchyroll)

Title: Tsuyoshi shikkari shinasai: Tsuyoshi no taimu mashîn de shikkari shinasai
Hi-Speed Jecy
Summary: Jecy's parents were killed by the Bismarck family. With his incredible speed and agility, Jecy travels through space with Tiana, Falk Green and a living ship called Paolon for revenge.

Title: Seton Animal Chronicles
Summary: Documentary in which the achievement of Ernest "Black Wolf" Thompson is settled in different Episodes. Every single episode is a documentary in which one sort of Animal is described.

Title: Aidoru Faito Suuchii-Pai II - Ikanimo Daiichiwa tte Kanji?
Deluxe Ariel
Summary: Aliens are still trying to conquer Earth But Ariel, the female robot, is the only obstacle in their path.

Title: Palutena's Revolting Dinner
Summary: Palutena is fixing lunch for herself and Pit, but while Pit's away getting more food, something goes wrong when her carrots come to life and run away.

Title: The Unlucky Butterfly
Summary: A short movie from 1931 in which a butterfly is in love with a mouse who does not return her affections.

Title: Ecchi de Happy! Pin! Pin! Pin!
Iii Icecrin
Summary: There is a place named Ice Cream town where people socialize and meet with each other and its denizens being animals based on the 15 various flavors sold by Blue Seal Ice Cream.

Title: Creamy Mami Vs Minky Momo
Summary: Magical girls Creamy Mami and Minky Momo fight against each other with ther magic powers.

Title: Gekitô! Kurasshu Gia TURBO: Kaizabân no chôsen!
Ichigo 100%: Koi ga hajimaru!? Satsuei gasshuku - yureru kokoro ga higashi e nishi e
Kennosuke-sama
Summary: A comedy about a family of old-fashioned samurai living in modern-day Tokyo whose young son has to head out for an important date.

Title: Hello Kitty Ringo no Mori no Mystery
Soreike! Anpanman: Tobase! Kibou no hankachi
Firewood, Kanta & Grandpa
Summary: Outside a village in deep snow, there lived a boy named Kanta and his grandpa. One day, the grandpa gets sick. Kanta decides to go get firewood for his grandpa from the woodshed he is very scared of.

Title: Gisoku no Moses
Summary: A shy ghost girl discovers the liveliness of music and dance through a pair of living shoes.

Title: Monster Special Version Zenpen
Summary: Recap of first half of Monster.

Title: Living for the Day After Tomorrow
Summary: Young Karada makes a wish to become an adult, while older Shoko longs to relive her youth. The wish comes true, and both girls must learn how to live under the very unusual circumstances.

Title: Visionary 1&2
Summary: Two stories about a sex-crazed teenage computer hacker who conjures a seductive android from the 22nd century with his keyboard.

Title: Good Day for Gag Manga
Summary: Gyagu Manga Biyori is hyperactive, random, and nonsensical, revolving around various plots and characters throughout the series. It makes absolutely no sense.

Title: Elf Ban Kakyuusei: Anata dake o Mitsumete...
Orphen: Volume 3 - Ruins and Relics Outtakes
Summary: A series of English dub outtakes on Sorcerous Stabber Orphen DVD Volume 3: Ruins and Relics.

Title: Utopa
Summary: In a distant future, three naive children, part of a new human-animal hybrid race, climb down from their comfortable tower city to Earth's wild surface in search of the origins of a strange seed.

Title: Heavy Metal L-Gaim III: Full Metal Soldier
Anemone
Summary: Anemone is a story about a girl who strays into a world of wonder. She goes deeper into her internal world-her heart-and, in the end, retrieves an important thing that she lost.

Title: Fair, then Partly Piggy
Summary: Eight year old Noriyasu writes and draws in his diary, discovering later that everything he writes in it comes true, even if involves talking pigs and strange adventures.

Title: I''s Pure: Ichitaka's Delusion Diary
Summary: Five short fantasies from Ichitaka's dream.

Title: Puripara: Mînna no akogare Rettsugô Puripari
Summary: When the Prism's sparkle threatens to disappear from Puransu, Falulu sends out an SOS to Manaka Lala and her friends. With limited means of transport, they travel across the world to complete their difficult task.

Title: Kitten's Scribbling
