Title: Rurouni Kenshin: Meiji Kenkaku Romantan 'Special Techniques' Special
Summary: Special that goes through every technique of the Hiten Mitsurugi Ryuu and explains how it works.

Title: Overlord: Pure Pure Pleiades
Summary: Lord Ainz embarks on a series of comedic mishaps when he tries to deal with his maid subordinates the Pleiades.

Title: Great Mazinger vs. Getter Robo
Summary: Great Mazinger combines forces with Getta Robot to fight with unstoppable space monster.

Title: Strahl
Summary: Animated FMV game like Dragon's Lair about young Alex Hawkfield. He helps a dying man who turns out to be God testing him. God gives him a task to find seven fragments of a mystical stone and fulfill his potential to become a great king.

Title: Eiga Furesshu Purikyua! Omocha no kuni wa himitsu ga ippai!?
Judo Sanka
Summary: Toshinta Tomoe decides to join the high school judo club to follow the footsteps of his mother, Teruko, a former judo champion.

Title: Spicy Boy
Summary: Makio is the inventor of genius while elementary school students, create a robot named Tom with a superhuman power.

Title: Genesis
Summary: This film has the look of a tongue-in-cheek production, done on a small budget by animators who wanted to make fun of great works that cost enormous sums of money.

Title: Hotori: The Simple Wish for Joy
Summary: A story of friendship between a robot who is created to replace a human, and a human whose memories are fading away; and a promise that is very hard to keep.

Title: Nekojiru gekijô - jirujiru Original
Summary: A story of Nyaka and Nyatta based on the comics by the late Nekojiru. Contains 23 animated shorts aired TV Asahi Network's show "Bokusho Mondai Boss Chara Ou." and 4 unaired episodes.

Title: Sekai Meisaku Gekijou Kanketsu Ban: Romeo no Aoi Sora Part 1
Meitantei Conan Magic File 2011: Niigata - Tokyo Omiyage Capriccio
Summary: Having come back from their trip to Kitanosawa, the Detective Boys and Sonoko have brought souvenirs for Kobayashi and Makoto, respectively. However, it turns out that their presents were swapped, since they both looked the same. They return to Mouri's, where Heiji has come for a visit after hearing that Conan has got stuck in an avalanche. He begins to speculate how the presents were swapped, starting with the car spinning out of control, Haibara switching the presents when she was alone, or Agasa swapping them when he went back to the van during a break, or the moment Sonoko and Ayumi bumped into each other and dropped their presents onto the floor.

Title: Zettai Shonen
Summary: Oftentimes, people are most vulnerable when they are lonely and unable to get along with those around them. Isolation is felt more keenly amongst a crowd, so some will try to find solace in the strangest of places, where the unknown lurks. Such people include Ayumu Aizawa, a former city boy now living in the countryside of Tana, and Kisa Tanigawa, a young girl who has a hard time relating to others. What these two share in common is a feeling that their life has gone astray. Zettai Shounen tells a story of strange phenomena affecting two different settings, with no explanations of their origin or sudden appearance. All that is known is that these phenomena seem to center on individuals with mixed emotions toward themselves and others.

Title: Battlecry
Summary: A fictitious 1980s Japan. Soji, a soldier on furlough, returns to his country. He receives a request from Haya, who was sent from the World Bank, to help her on a mission to investigate the actual circumstances of a narcotic called "Golden Monkey" which is running rampant through Japanese society.

Title: GEAR senshi Dendô
Summary: The story takes place in the future where war machines from evil mechanical alien empire Garufa finally reaches Earth. In order to protect earth, an Earth defense organization called GEAR (Guard Earth and Advanced Reconnaissance) is formed. GEAR has an ultimate weapon in a form of war mecha, GEAR Fighter Dendoh, which is piloted by two elementary school students, namely Kusanagi Hokuto and Izumo Ginga. Can the friendship between Hokuto and Ginga unleashed the full potential power of Dendoh in order to fight Garufa?

Title: Saikyo Kamizmode!
Summary: From the beginning of all, there were battle gods called "Gourikishin" who team up with human partners they revere as "Oyakata" as they go through battle called "Kamizumo". Now in the present, an elementary student named Dai Mugen encounters one god name "Koutetsu" who fell from the sky and ask, "Please become by Oyakata and together let's kamizumo!!"

Title: Yamato Takeru: After War
Summary: Three years have passed after the decisive battle at the end of Yamato Takeru and peace has return to the land. Takeru, Oto and their friends return to the village and continue living their days in bliss until one night Shuranoo, piloted by Mikazuchi, marks a return and appears in the village to wreak havoc. Takeru is left without any choice and is forced to reactivate the sealed Susanoo from his slumber. However, this is just the beginning of a new threat, and Takeru has to overcome himself if he wants to rescue Oto from the impending danger.

Title: Happy Lesson: Advance
Summary: Chitose, a high school student, shares his house with five women he calls his mothers, who also happen to be his school teachers. One might think the continued attention of this many "females" would be a good thing, but too much attention can prove to be painful. Not only is he the subject of their smothering abuse at home, but at school as well. Even when things finally calm down at night, all the rooms in the large house are occupied by his "moms", so Chitose must sleep on the living room couch.

Title: A Day of Chameko
Summary: Musical animated Short Film about the daily life of a Japanese girl named Chameko. Since she gets up until she goes to sleep, we will follow through fun songs the different activities that occupy her time, from brushing teeth to attend class, to the films she watches in the movies, her favorite pastime.

Title: Bungaku Shoujo Memoir II -Sora-Mau Tenshi no Requiem-
Summary: Prequel to Book Girl (2010) that pictures Miu's backstory.

Title: Sekai Meisaku Gekijou Kanketsu Ban: Akage no Anne Part 2
Usagi ga kowai
Summary: A woman is a part of surreal experiment conducted by two rabbits.

Title: Houkago no Tinker Bell
Summary: Kenichi and Misako must figure out the mystery behind the disappearance of broadcast club member Ryoko.

Title: Minky Momo: The Day the Magic Disappeared
Summary: When Minky Momo (Gigi) runs into bad guys on a train, she looses her magical pendant.

Title: Donyatsu
Summary: Donut shaped cats inhabits a future desecrated earth, living their lives and having fun with their friends.

Title: And and
Summary: It is born. It dies. They repeat. The mandala of a life.

Title: Chance Pop Session
Summary: Three girls strive to become pop idols.

Title: Minky Momo: The Magician and the Eleven Boys
Summary: Magical girl Minky Momo (Gigi) must transform into a brilliant soccer coach, in order to help her friend Tommy and his losing soccer team finally win a game.

Title: Pop
Summary: A train running from different angles

Title: Majutsu-shi Ofen hagure tabi ten'nin no isan
Duel Masters: Hamukatsu and Dogiragon's Great Curry Bread Adventure 3D
Kindaichi Case Files: The Last Opera House Murders
Summary: Kindaichi, Miyuki and Kenmochi arrive at the doomed opera house in the pouring rain. There they meet another and last "Phantom of the Opera", who announces a new series of murders.

Title: That Is an UFO! The Flying Saucer
Akikan! OVA: Kan ippatsu!? Onsen panic
Summary: The Akikans and their owners visit the hot springs to relax and have fun. The girls will not have a moments peace, since one of the owners, Kakeru, is a bit of a pervert among these nubile females.

Title: Kanagatari. Kanabakari.: Kanadian Families
Summary: Follows Kana-chan and her animal friends' life on a ranch.

Title: Kaleido Star: Aratanaru Tsubasa Extra Stage - Waranai Sugoi Ohimesama
Summary: The "Fool" has named Rosetta as the new Lead Star of Kaleido Stage. It is now Sora's turn to assist Rosetta for her new performance "The Princess and the Fool" like the way Layla assisted her.

Title: Run=Dim
Summary: It's a future Japan, partially flooded due to global warming raising the sea level. It's a time when nuclear waste is dumped in space and battles are fought in space with giant robots. We follow the men and women piloting them.

Title: Zero Tester
Summary: A team of 3 extraordinary pilots working under Dr. Tachibana's supervision to defend Earth from alien invasion.

Title: Brave Command Dagwon: The Boy with Crystal Eyes
Love of Kemeko
Summary: A man is continually stalked by a small woman named Kemoko who is utterly in love with him.

Title: Violet Battlefield
Summary: A teenage boy Makoto Ishiguro, who is a half human hybrid and lost his mother along with his older brother Hosoki Ishiguro. When they arrived in Osaka, they joined AI Foundation when they had to fight in between their schools.

Title: Shoujo Fight: Nora Inu-tachi no Odekake
Summary: The story follows Ooishi Neri, a high school girl who is a talented volleyball player. She once was the captain of an elementary school team that went all the way to the national tournament. However, she spent three years as an alternate at a junior high school renowned for its volleyball program. Now she's in high school with new teammates, and gets a chance to prove herself again.

Title: Sakura Wars 2: Thou Shalt Not Die
Summary: Japan, 1920's. After having defeated the ultimate evil, the charming ladies of the Hanagumi Squad and their young commander Ichiro Ogami believe that Japan is safe forever. But their archenemy is resurrected by a mysterious hand. And even though the heroes defeat him once again, they realize that sooner or later they'll have to confront the masked demon who has brought their foe back to life, find out who or what is pulling the strings behind the scene, and revive once again the tragic past.

Title: Flipnote Warrior
Summary: Ugo, the Spirit of Flipnote, appeared out of Mome Kugou's new 3DS claiming that she could become a god-tier artist if she joined the Flipnote Warriors. Mome agreed, but she still hasn't had any good experiences yet and begins to doubt if she'll really become a good artist this way.

Title: Pikachu's Ice Adventure
Summary: While playing in the ocean near a tropical resort, Pikachu and Co. get in a scuffle with Team Rocket's Pokémon. This scuffle causes the Pokémon to wind up miles away in an Ice-covered Paradise. However, when they get there, they are separated soon find that certain Pokémon in the area require their assistance. Will they be able to reunite with their friends and help these Pokémon out?

Title: Araiso Private High School Student Council Executive Committee
Summary: Kubota Makoto and Tokitoh Minoru (characters from Kazuya Minekura's manga Wild Adaptor -- though no reference is made to the darker storyline of WA in this light-hearted anime) are the muscle of their high school's all-powerful student council. They defend the student body from disorder -- generated by both humans and demons -- while avoiding their classes.

Title: Hyperdimension Neptunia Re;Birth 3: V Generation
Summary: Hyperdimension Neptunia Re;Birth3: V Generation is a remake of the Hyperdimension Neptunia series' third installment, Hyperdimension Neptunia Victory. The story again follows Neptune who is sent to parallel dimension where she meets the counterparts of her friends in the original world.

Title: Candy Boy Side Story for Archive
Summary: Twin sisters, Yukino and Kanade Sakurai, room together in the dorms at their high school, enjoying school life with their friends and one another. One day, Sakuya Kamiyama, an underclassman, seeks out Yukino, while Kanade learns from a friend that Sakuya has admired Yukino for a very long time. This innocent revelation sets into motion a chain of events that eventually lead to Yukino expressing her feelings for her sister.

Title: Alice
Summary: This OVA revolves around a mad scientist and the woman that betrayed him. Her unfaithfulness causes the scientist to turn her into a bionic sex machine that desires to please her man completely. However, she still remains unfaithful, and it is up to the scientist's son to track her down and exact revenge.

Title: Hayate the Combat Butler OVA
Summary: To encourage Nagi to swim and enjoy summer, Maria invites various friends to their Sanzenin family's private beach. While everyone is having fun, Nagi hesitates to wear swimsuits and come out because of her small breasts, and refuses to join.

Title: Fate/kaleid liner Prisma Illya 2wei!: Mahou Shoujo in Onsen Ryokou
Summary: Illya and co. go to a hot springs inn, where Rin and Luvia are carrying out a secret mission. During the trip, Kuro discovers that the hot springs cause a greater drain on her mana than usual - what could be the cause of this?

Title: Bobî ni kubittake
Summary: A teen boy who loves motorcycles finds that pictures of him were printed in a motorcycle magazine. When he gets a letter from a girl his age, he decides to write her back.

Title: Tatakae! Osupâ
Summary: On a distant world, people with paranormal powers battle each other.

Title: Infinite Stratos Encore: Sextet of Burning Love
Select All
Summary: A sleeper wakes up then unwittingly changes the world.

Title: Shiratori Reiko de Gozaimasu!: Futari dake no Love Love Show
Za doraemonzu: Doki doki kikansha daibôsô
Sekai Meisaku Gekijou Kanketsu Ban: Konnichiwa Anne Part 2
Generation of Chaos
Summary: In the world of Neverland, humans and monsters live alongside each other. Generation of Chaos details the start of the adventures of the two heroes of Neverland, Chiffon and Roze.

Title: The Spirits of Cairn
Summary: Gathered from their resting place in the sand, the bird heads bound toward hollow cavities in the wall. A festival-nominated, multi-award winning puppet animation inspired by Asian folklore and religious motifs.

Title: Dededen
Summary: The daily life of Amoru Tokorozawa and his life travelling on the railway.

Title: Kiki to Rara no aoi tori
Shin Momotarô densetsu: Tanabata no mura wa gekisenku
Time Travel Shoujo: Mari Waka to 8-nin no Kagakusha-tachi
Summary: Mari, her best friend, and her best friend's brother use a special compass to travel through time.

Title: Meshimase Lodoss-to Senki Sorette Oishii no?
Umurangi Generation
Summary: Umurangi Generation is a first person photography game in the retro future. Set in Tauranga Aotearoa off the back of an impending crisis you are a courier for the Tauranga Express.

Title: The Oscar Nominated Short Films 2009: Animation
Summary: Collective screening of the Academy Award nominated short films from the Animation category for 2009.

Title: Two Superheroes, a Villain, and a Baby - The Movie
Summary: Stuck in coronavirus lockdown, reluctant roommates Batman, Superman, and Joker are suddenly tasked with raising Wonder Woman's baby.

Title: Kono Shihai kara no Sotsugyou: Ozaki Yutaka
Summary: A compilation of 5 stories portraying the life of Ozaki Yutaka, a famous Japanese musician in the 80s and early 90s who died young.

Title: One: Kagayaku Kisetsu e
Summary: A young man is doomed to fade away to a mystic realm and be forgotten, but as he forms relationships with various girls, the bonds he makes with them may be able to keep him remembered and present on earth.

Title: Sunagimo
Summary: A series of computer-animated images set against a background of classical music. The images explore themes of life and death, consisting of flowing water, spinning gears, rolling animal heads, dozens of hearts tumbling across the screen, and drops of blood spattering over other images.

Title: Science Fiction Journey to the West Starzinger
Summary: Princess Aurora, the only survivor of her planet destroyed by evil mutants, is resolved to put an end to the mutant menace in the galaxy along with three enhanced human cyborgs Jesse Dart, Porkos and Aramus, she travels space in the Cosmos Queen to the Dekkos System to fight the final battle against all odds of the universe.

Title: Kyousou Giga
Summary: Three kids are stuck in a strange city causing massive mayhem through the land. They are searching for an atypical rabbit in order to return home. Koto, the eldest of the three, seems to have some sort of connection to this weird place ruled by a monk, a demon, and a priest.

Title: Onigiri
Summary: Onigiri is a free-to-play MMO action RPG set in a fantasy world where you can battle enemy monsters and bosses teamed up with NPCs or other players. At the very start you get to create your character which is a pre-set male or female whose appearance is slightly customizable. Kamigui, an evil god who carved a path of destruction for centuries has been sealed away by the goddess of the Sun, Amaterasu Oomikami. However, the seals were shattered and Kamigui has returned to finish what he started. The player takes a role of Oni, a young gal or lad, depending on the player's choice, whose peaceful world was disrupted by the resurrection of Kamigui, and the task of stopping him fell on you. The game utilizes basic real-time battle system which lets you perform a melee or ranged attack or use an equipped skill. During combat and by finishing quests your character levels up which lets you increase its stats such as strength, vitality, dexterity and the likes. You can also create stronger relationships with your partners which increase their power during battle.

Title: Cheburashka Goes to the Zoo
Summary: Poor Gena works as a crocodile at the zoo. When he catches a bad cold, he asks Cheburashka to go to the zoo for him and tell them that he's taking time off. This causes a problem because Gena is very popular. Cheburashka has the answer: "I'll take his place until he's better!"

Title: Gekijô ban Tottoko Hamutaro: Ôrora no kiseki - Ribon chan kiki ippatsu!
Summary: it's getting warmer in the mountain town of Aurora Village and the snow is melting. The Ham-Hams that live there think that Bijou is their Snow White Princess who can pray for the snow to come back so they send a snow fairy hamster named Crystal to go get her. A pirate hamster on a flying ship captures her along the way so Hamtaro and the Ham-Hams have to save her and maybe even save the village.

Title: Anime Tencho
Summary: Anizawa Meito is the blazing store manager. He is a fireball who loves animation merchandise at heart. He takes over the dying wish of the former store manager, though still alive, who was attacked by the rival store and becomes a "store manager" of newly opened animation goods specialty store, Animate. The scarlet, "store manager visor" is his trademark. (Source: AniDB, MAL)

Title: Nineteen
Summary: 19-year-old Kubota is ready to find a girlfriend. The perfect chance arises when he meets Masana Fujisaka, his first love, in a club. She's just broken up with her longtime boyfriend and is surprised to run into Kubota, who sees that the perfect opportunity has just arisen.

Title: Generation of Chaos Next: Chikai no Pendant
Summary: Ellile is a knight-in-training in the Kingdom of Fredbarn in the Neverland World. He and Princess Roji are secretly in love, and plan to marry. Lifile, the head of the knights, finds out, and tells Ellile that he's not strong enough to protect Roji, let alone the Kingdom. Ellile becomes frustrated, and contemplates what to do.

Title: Tsuyokiss: Cool×Sweet
Summary: Sunao Konoe starts her first day at a new school and is surprised to find that there is no drama club. So, she decides to make one of her own. But between a childhood friend showing up, the crazy student body, and the arrogant student council president blocking her at every turn, it seems that actually creating the club is going to be more difficult than she thought.

Title: Seven Cities Story: Arctic Front
Summary: In 2086, Earth's axis tilted 90 degrees and after three years span, approximately ten billion people died. One million colonists who had moved to the moon prior to the disaster escaped what later became known as "The Great Fall". At the moon, they established the Panhuman World Government (PWG) and organized the recolonization of the world. Seven locations were chosen for cities as starting points for this massive project. To guarantee their authority over the new colonies, the PWG built a highly advanced defense system on the moon called Olympos-System. In 2136, the lunar government perished due to an unknown virus brought to the moon by a meteor, but the automated Olympos-System remained active and has a life span of about 200 years. It is 2190 and some of the Seven Cities wage wars against each other. Two talented military strategists from opposing cities rise to confront each other.

Title: Chaos;Head
Summary: A high school student named Takumi Nishijou starts to have delusions after witnessing one of a series of murders. He eventually learns of the existence of people with the power to create delusions, and of an organization called the Committee of 300 using a machine to do so for their own gain.

Title: Remember
Summary: "Leaving home, 'I' got a phone call. As 'I' answered it, the house exploded. 'I' went to work and continued as normal".

Title: Dan Petory Kyoushu no Yuutsu
Summary: A wild explanation of the solar system and how things are perceived.

Title: Genius Expo
Summary: An abstract animation in which the theme 'festival'. I have to express the feelings that exciting festival begins now.

Title: Norman the Snowman - On a Night of Shooting Stars
Fireball
Summary: In the distant future, gynoid duchess Drossel von Flügel lives in a manor with her arachnoid servant Gedächtnis.

Title: Mahoraba: Heartful Days
Summary: Shiratori Ryuushi is a young artist-in-training, about to start studying at a vocational school. Arriving at his new lodgings, Narutakisou, he finds himself the focus of attention for the collection of weirdos that inhabit the place.

Title: Luginsky
Summary: A kaleidoscopic animation about Deerman, whose reality starts to unravel when he becomes addicted to a pink bootleg liquor designed by ex-boxer "Luginsky".

Title: Anne no Nikki: Anne Frank Monogatari
Suna no Akari
Summary: The short's story centers on a boy who finds something shining in a gloomy desert. It gives him a power of light. Guided by the light, the boy is drawn into the connection between the girl he meets and a new world.

Title: Bakumatsu no Spasibo
Summary: Based on the real life events around Yevfimy Vasilyevich Putyatin, a Russian admiral noted for his diplomatic missions to Japan and China, and the signing of the Treaty of Shimoda in 1855.

Title: Railment
Summary: In a continuous scenery, his physical movement stays in the same position. The speed of the continuity and his movement have accelerated and gradually cause a distortion.

Title: Oshiri kajiri mushi
Summary: A 10-year-old insect goes to Biting School to inherit his family's Biting Shop business.

Title: Katei kyôshi no onê san the Animation: H no hensachi agechaimasu - Sekando ressun wa doki doki gin gin! Kosupure jugyô!?
Mushiking: Altered Beetles of Darkness
Summary: Adder, the Fairy of Darkness, schemes to invade a peaceful paradise that the beetles, Popo and the other Fairies of the Forest call their home.

Title: Leaking Life
Summary: Thousands of them are packed in a bag. The hand dragging the bag has never been seen from their angle. The track on sand is easily erased by waves. Touching the surface of sea, they grow a new skin.

Title: Bungaku Shôjo - Kyô no Oyatsu Hatsukoi
Summary: Toko and Konoha talk about literature in the school's book club.

Title: Replacements
Summary: Replacements depicts a Javanese family living in a fictional neighborhood in Jakarta, the capital city of Indonesia. Inspired by people and places that truly exist, they are witnesses of this congested metropolis's urban, environmental, political, and cultural transformations from about 1980 to 2020. A praise of the satisfaction of impermanent things, it tells about the dented yet peaceful transition of an old traditional village to an uprooted megapolis through three generations. This experience aims to appreciate and introspect Jakarta's recent history through the eyes of an ordinary family that most of Indonesians, from children to elder people, can identify with.

Title: A Bite of Bone
Summary: A little girl reflects on her last summer with her father at his funeral. Set on a small island in Japan where the director was born and raised, the film explores the relationship between the death of her father and the bomb storage in the mountain behind the family house.

Title: Pia Carrot Movie
Summary: High schoolers Sayaka Takai and Akihiko Kannazuki work together at a restaurant chain "Pia Carrot." Both are interested in each other, but before either could make a move Sayaka was temporarily rotated to the newly established branch at a beach resort. While waitress girls at this new location did their best to confront harassment, make new friends, and attract new customers by attending a beauty contest, Sayaka's feeling for Akihiko never stops and has become stronger and stronger.

Title: Sûpâ bikkuri man
Summary: After of the big war between angels and demons, the Earth is almost destroyed and his cities devastated. Wanted to restore the peace and the harmony, four young child decides to fight against the army of evil that rules the world for to eradicate to the Earth and give them back to hell.

Title: Venture Anime
Summary: Two polar opposite high school students end up working part-time at an international tech startup in Japan. The company they work for builds the first ever holographic AI that passes the Turing test in any language (passes as a human being) and the first ever brain-computer interface that can detect human emotion. With the small group of co-workers, the protagonists build the company whilst protecting this priceless tech from malicious entities, and keeping society from its harmful influences.

Title: Pist Star
Summary: A 2 minute animated promotion for Keirin style track cycling commissioned by the Nagoya Keirin Association, which was created by Japanese character designer Muroi Fumie and anime studio Madbox and features their creation, a lady named Pist-Star.

Title: Be-Bop High School
Summary: For the invincible and basically happy punk lads Hiroshi and Toru, what they care about every day is to get a lot of attention from girls and to win the fights against the lads from other schools. Whenever provoked, they just go out fighting and settle the situation no matter what it costs.

Title: Kureyon Shinchan: Manatsu no Yoru ni Ora Sanjo! Arashi o Yobu Den'o Bui Esu Shin'o Rokujuppun Supesharu!!
Eiga Healin' Good Precure: Yume no Machi de Kyun! Tto Go Go! Dai Henshin!!
Umi no uta
Summary: "Umi no uta" ("Sear roar") takes place in a rural Japanese fishing village, where the inhabitants perform ancient ceremonies by which they prey for the spirits of old boats set to burn.

Title: Chikyuu Monogatari: Telepath 2500
Summary: On the fifth world of the Tolphan system in the year 2500, a supercomputer chooses marriage partners to find the best matches.

Title: Seaweed
Summary: Brondo, Joe, Bob, Ali, Poly, Mint, and Sals leaves in Vietnam Lake, then goes to Poly's Garden for find Bwastd, and Anggresom, and go to Red Sand Dunes, asked Fugu for help.

Title: Graduation
Summary: Five friends decide to go on one last adventure before they graduate, and enter the adult world.

Title: Tennis no Ouji-sama: Another Story - Kako to Mirai no Message
Hello Kitty Ringo no Mori no Fantasy
Yu Yu Hakusho: In Next Week's Episode Part 1
Summary: The next episode previews of Yu Yu Hakusho are compiled into this video.

Title: Strange Tales of Modern Mysterious Events
Summary: An omnibus of six strange horror stories from the works of Yu Saruta. Toshiyuki Kimura, genius of the horror art world, brings the stories to life.

Title: Daft Punk: Something About Us - Animation Version
Santa Company
Summary: A young girl joins the Santa Company, a company that delivers presents to children around the world.

Title: Keifuku-san
Summary: The adventures of a young girl in a railway conductor uniform and a floating manta ray as they explore an otherworldly space.

Title: Yaseruyagi
Summary: A story about granny, her granddaughter and a goat.

Title: L'Oeil du Cyclone
Summary: A rebel fighter is captured and a show trial is set to happen. A young, promising lawyer is the only person willing to take the case. In the process, the whole web of trafficking and his story come to light.

Title: Kishin dôji Zenki gaiden: Anki kitan
Muybridge's Strings
Summary: A surreal tribute to Muybridge, one of the early pioneers of the motion picture.

Title: Salamander Basic Saga: Paola in Meditation
Summary: Three tales based on the Gradius video game series by Konami.

Title: Dougram: Documentary of the Fang of the Sun
Summary: In the planet Deloyer, a colony of the Earth federation, Colonel Von Stein stages a coup d'etat on behalf of the Federation chairman Donan Cashim.

Title: Armored Police Metal Jack
Summary: in the year 2015, murder and crime have gotten very high in Tokyo and the police can't handle it all and three men are wounded while protecting a small boy, so they are brought back to life reincarnated as cyborgs.

Title: Smash Hit!
Summary: Mitsuki Ikuta a TV producer and 25 year old virgin has a dream of working on serious crime dramas but is appointed to work on the Cosprayers show.

Title: Animentary: The Decision
Summary: Compilation of different war events during the Second World War on the Japanese Pacific front.

Title: Mabo as Tokichiro Kinoshita
Summary: A boy works hard to please his lord and gain advancement.

Title: The Apple Incident
Summary: Huge apples start to rain from the sky. When people ate them apple starts to grow on their head.

Title: Waaah
Summary: I synchronized the irritation of baby cries and the frustration I have ever experienced. Everyone was born while crying, and grew crying. I grew up to be an adult, but I strongly want to be a baby again.

Title: Honey Honey's Wonderful Adventures
Summary: Glamorous Paris, entrancing Venice, romantic Rome and irresistible Vienna - These alluring cities of enchantment invite you to witness the story of a young girl who unexpectedly becomes entangled in daring adventures and rollicking romance. Vienna, 1907. Princess Flora, the one and only idol of the entire nation, is celebrating her birthday. Flora is young, beautiful, single and the object of all the men's desire.
Stars: Márcia Gomes,Nelson Machado,Mário Jorge Montini,Carlos Seidl

Title: Sankokuji
Summary: In the Fifth Year of the Keicho era, the Tokugawa clan sought to solidify their control of Japan. Hidetada Tokugawa has come to the doorsteps of Ueda Castle with the intentions of having the Sanada clan open its doors to him. But the Sanada and their retainers have other plans...

Title: Tenka Hyakken: Meiji-kan e Yokoso
Summary: Mitsurugi are maidens who are physical incarnations of ancient swords. They have pledged to live peaceful lives after the era of warfare, but are now returning to battle to fight a new foe that has arisen during an alternate version of the Meiji Era, three hundred years after the Battle of Sekigahara.

Title: Akane maniakkusu: Gôda Jôji nyûbu seyo
Summary: Jouji Gouda is a new transfer student at Hakuryo High. He fell in love at first sight and boldly proposed to Akane Suzumiya, representative of his class, on his first day at the new school. Although Akane finds him very annoying, hot-blooded and simple-minded Jouji never gives up and would do anything to express his love towards Akane.

Title: Tokyo 7th Sisters: Bokura wa Aozora ni Naru
Summary: In the year 2032, the legendary idol unit "7th Sisters" suddenly retired from the industry and disappeared. That was the end of the idol industry - until two years later, when a young glory-seeking employee is appointed to be the leader of Tokyo's next generation idol studio, "777 (Three Seven)," commonly referred to as Nanastar. However, the city continues to believe that idols are a thing of the past, and Nanastar is no exception. Their slump continues, but one day a mysterious and beautiful female manager approaches you and says, "If the idols of the past are gone, we'll just have to make new idols. True "sisters" linked by powerful bonds!" The story of the idols of the future, the Nanastar Sisters, will now unfold.

Title: Code Geass: Hangyaku no Lelouch Picture Drama
Summary: At Ashford Academy, the girls get into juicy talks in the bath, and later plan a gender role reversal festival, which has everyone but Lelouch Lamperouge eager. The students also attend the grand opening of the Clovis Land pool, much to the scantily clad Cornelia li Britannia's embarrassment. Events from Lelouch's past show a chapter from his royal upbringing, and how he met Suzaku Kururugi. Code Geass: Hangyaku no Lelouch Picture Drama shows that when they are away from the bloodshed and agony of war, the characters live very different and often humorous lives.

Title: Morita-san is Taciturn
Summary: Morita Mayu, a high school student who is kinder than any others, but thinks too much, and leads herself to a speechless high school student. Facing with many problems and even make a fool of herself. How would high school daily life will help her get through this?

Title: Kiyoko's Storehouse
Summary: Kiyoko Nagase (1906-1995) was born in a rural regional city of Japan, Okayama, and recognized as a mother of modern poetry. The storehouse of her home is a very significant object to understand her works. This memorial project was achieved thorough the experimental attempts, the fusions of stop motion animations, drawing animations, and documentary film makings. Overall, this film represents lives of local creators and implications of creativities from off-center in modern age.

Title: Taka no tsume 7: Joou heika no Jôbûbu
Mobile Suit Gundam 00 Special Edition 1: Celestial Being
The Girl Living Alone
Summary: In 1980s, the living alone little girl Rin Suzune inherited her passed parents' restaurant. Soon, some stories happened around her.

Title: A Child's Time: Kuro-chan and Shiro-chan
Ankoku Kazoku Warabi-san
Summary: The family of Mrs Warabi are all hedonists who end up following their desires without restraint and bringing down chaos to themselves.

Title: Glassy Ocean: Kujira no Chôyaku
Summary: On what apparently is a parallel world, time flows in a much slower pace than normal. The ocean remains on a solid state of matter as the eccentric individuals who inhabit this land casually wander over it.

Title: Soreike! Anpanman: Kyôryû nosshî no daibôken
Ranma 1/2: Best of Memories
Summary: A special featuring romantic moments from the series is shown, also includes interviews with some Seiyuu.

Title: Dai mahô tôge: Tesuto no tensû dake de ningen no kachi ga hakarerun desuka? Dôse watashi wa 0 ten desuyo â sôyo no maki
aaH/Hee
Summary: When the mind says aah, the body says hee. I dance around the confusion and the consensus, and my whole life is getting composed of these dances.

Title: Wôtarou no akua daisakusen: Suidou no mizu ga dekirumade
Delpower X Bakuhatsu Miracle Genki!
Summary: Manami Hanegi, a normal high-school girl, is forced by her inventor grandpa to pilot his recently created powered armor suit, the Delpower X.

Title: Bôkensha
Summary: A non-historical perspective over Christopher Columbus' years before sailing towards the American continent.

Title: Starship Girl Yamamoto Yohko
Stars: Minami Takayama,Hunter Mackenzie Austin,Patrick Seitz,Ryôka Yuzuki

Title: Tongue
Summary: Tired of being talked at by men, a woman takes a sensual trip with unusual friends.

Title: Eiga Go! Purinsesu Purikyua: Go! Go!! Gouka sanbondate!!!
Uchuu erebêta: Kagakusha no yumemiru sekai
Saishû heiki kanojo: Another love song - Mission 2
Summary: Chise is out of control while she fights against an enemy in Tokyo. Mizuki persuades her to stop. That causes them to have a good relationship.

Title: Yuuki Yuuna wa yuusha de aru: Washio Sumi no shou dai-2-shou 'Yakusoku'
Pilot Candidate
Summary: An OVA episode retelling the story of Pilot Candidate.

Title: The Big First-Grader and the Small Second-Grader
Osamu Tezuka's Last Mystery of the 20th Century
Summary: Osamu Tezuka is going to a 21st Century new year's party with all the characters he made. One thing leads to another and he ends up missing. It's up to his most popular characters to find out what happened to him and get him back safely before the rest of the guests show up.

Title: Ultra Nyan 2: The Great Happy Operation
Summary: Ultra-Nyan the amazing cat from another planet's adventures continue. This time, he is tasked with finding the cause of the crows' sudden declaration of war upon the cats. Can he stop the war before it's too late? The film was double-billed with the tokusatsu film Ultraman Tiga and Ultraman Dyna: Hikari no Hoshi no Senshi-tachi (Ultraman Tiga and Ultraman Dyna: Warriors of the Star of Light).

Title: Ultra Nyan: Extraordinary Cat who Descended from the Starry Sky
Summary: Haruka finds a cat in an abandoned building and names it "Nyan". Little does she know that this cat is actually "Ultra-Nyan" who has come from outer space. Using his mysterious powers, Ultra-Nyan helps Haruka and her friends foil the plans of a couple of no-good catnappers.

Title: Encouragement of Climb: Omoide Present
Summary: On the final day of summer vacation, Kokona is ready to spend some long-awaited time with her mother, but these plans are unfortunately canceled due to work. Opting to go outside instead, she takes a stroll down a familiar path - one where fond memories appear at every corner. Later, in the middle of autumn, Aoi and Hinata are looking through a scrapbook of their childhood. Snooping around in Aoi's room, Hinata finds that she has kept a strange acorn as a keepsake, but doesn't remember the reason why. As its discovery dwells on her, a wave of old memories comes forth, causing her to reminisce about a forgotten event from her childhood.

Title: Manmaru the Ninja Penguin
Summary: An old man named Jiya brings a new recruit, a modest penguin named Manmaru, to join in on a 300-year battle between the three Ninja clans living in the mountains he owns. But the others, the cowardly Tsuenjiro (fox) and quick-tempered Tanutaro (racoon), are disappointed when they learn the newest trainee is nothing other than a polite, if not flaky penguin. And not just any penguin, but a penguin with dreams to become a professional soccer player.

Title: The Wings of Rean
Summary: Suzuki is wanted by the US Army due to his friends firing a rocket into the US army base. While he was running away, the sea rose higher and he saw a strange battleship. He was dumped into the sea and he sees a beautiful girl, she says her name is Lyx and is a princess from another world and she needs his help.

Title: The World Is Ours
Summary: Hatsune Miku is the cute personification of a synthesizer software, all her content is fan-created. This project explores the merger of fantasy into reality through Miku cosplay performed by the artist, along sampled fan-made music and animation.

Title: The Day the Earth Moved
Summary: Over 6,000 people die when the 1995 'Kobe' earthquake hits Japan. In the aftermath of the tragedy a young student turns his attention outward to deal with death, console a friend and confront reality. Here is the story of one young man forced to deal with the world from a new perspective.

Title: Tennis no Ouji-sama: Best Games!! Inui & Kaido vs Shishido & Otori/Oishi & Kikumaru vs Niou & Yagyu
The Sprites of Floria
Summary: After an invasion by the Vivolian army, the Sprite Himawari and her childhood friend Tsubaki flee their homeland of Floria for the town of Romton. There, they live out their lives in peace - for a time.

Title: M.C. Escher Contrast
Summary: M.C. Escher today is seen in a new light, as the precursor of contemporary computer graphic art. These CG movies are digital representations of his works, designed to give a virtual and intuitive experience of artist's creative processes.

Title: Karasuma Kyoko No Jikenbo
Summary: A female police detective, Kyoko Karasuma, investigates bizarre murders in Tokyo, only to discover that ancient Japanese goblins / creatures, the "Oni," are rising up to take over Japan.
Stars: G. Larry Butler,Bryan Forrest,David Gerrold,Marieve Herington

Title: Hyoei and Heibei's Tengu Hunt
Summary: A cute and comical tale involving goblin-like creatures from Japanese folklore called "tengu".

Title: Little Heart
Summary: It tells the story of a doll in love with the window doll across the street and his adventure to find her after she is bought by a little girl.

Title: Time Patrol Bon
Summary: A Japanese schoolboy, Heibon, is enlisted in the efforts of the time patrol to keep the past out of trouble.

Title: Dr. Slump: Penguin Village SOS!!/Affairs of the Heart!
Self Portrait
Summary: A stop motion short film by Kihachiro Kawamoto. This short film humorously shows what happens when the artist creates a being that insists on 'creating' the artist.

Title: A Promised Place I Wish to see you there
Summary: Takeru, a boy who travels back in time with a plasma device - Is the end of the ego a dream, or was it God's plan? A Spectacular fantasy of love and inspiration to give to this generation.

Title: Kitten's Studio
Summary: The kitten from Yasuji Mori's earlier "Koneko no Rakugai" returns, this time putting his talents toward directing a samurai film starring his mouse friends.

Title: G-9
Summary: This is the story of wicked creatures, Yokoshima Ryu Zama, the destroyers and demon practioner of the unknown. In an uninhabited town, the only person, a little girl, wakes up.

Title: Peeping Life: WE ARE THE HERO
Hijikata Toshizo: The White Trail
Summary: A biographical sketch of the life and ideals of Hijikata Toshizô, Vice Commander of the Shinsengumi, fighting to uphold the Shogunate during the Meiji revolution.

Title: Mowb
Summary: A mother and her child weave their story in the mother's womb. The bond of the umbilical cord ties them with the strongest love. We witness the infinite chain of life the two unveil through this sui generis arterial interchange.

Title: My Ski Trip
Summary: Animated short features bunnies and tanuki having wacky hijinks while going skiing.

Title: El príncipe del país de las nieves
OVA ToHeart2: Ano natsu, ichiban sawagashii umi
Rurouni Kenshin: Volume 2: Battle in the Moonlight - Outtakes
Summary: A series of outtakes on the USA Rurouni Kenshin DVD Vol. 8: Battle in the Moonlight.

Title: Elevator
Summary: A man travels through the different stages of life in a crazy elevator ride while at work.

Title: Dr. Slump: Dr. Mashirito and Abale-chan
Raimuiro Senkitan: Side Story: The South Island Dream Romantic Adventure
Summary: After battle in first season battleship Amanohara was serious damaged and need to repair. It land on island where a Gogyou festival just begin. Umakai Shintaro and his five girls student who know as Raimu Unit begin enjoy a peace time in that island. But the enemy still follow them around. How Umakai Shintaro and his five girls student fight against the enemy. Still his five girls student begin try to draw his attention into them.

Title: Minami-ke: Tadaima
Summary: The everyday lives of the Minami sisters continue. Chiaki, the youngest, continues to call people idiots while worshipping her eldest sister. Kana, the middle, still can't figure out that Fujioka's feelings for her are a crush, not a grudge. Haruka, the eldest, still unknowingly avoids Hosaka's advances to invite her to the volleyball team, and after a long day of excitement, the sisters enjoy sitting at the table at their home.

Title: A Bridge to the Starry Skies OVA
Summary: Directly following the TV series, this OVA follows Kazuma's friend Daigo and his interactions with the girls as the school festival approaches. Shortly before the upcoming festival, a year after the end of episode 12, Daigo decides to find a girlfriend to dance with at the festival. Will he be able to do so?

Title: Paradise
Summary: Female bear whose nose was cut off by human and a boy who is a part time sanitary worker at space station. Story revolves around their accidental encounter including a girl working in a tooth costume, an army soldier and an ape-men in near extinction intertwine with time and spaces. Amongst the fantastical way of depicting the world, the work also give a glimpse into cruelty of the real world by searching out selfishness and loneliness of man kinds. This animation is made to profoundly glorify all the life.

Title: Chikara Bashi
Summary: A man walks along a mountain road at night when a mysterious woman asks him to take care of her baby. Despite his suspicions, the man held the baby in his arms, but as he approached the bridge, the baby suddenly became heavy Then suddenly I felt light and when I looked inside my arms, there was no child.

Title: Ark Nine
Summary: The series is set 150 years after humanity lost half of the planet due to a mysterious black fog. To contain the black fog, 3,000-meter-tall (about 10,000-feet-tall) walls were erected to split the world, and the half of the human population that survived now live in cities called arks. Shidou Enishi, one of the few Japanese survivors, runs a detective agency on the ninth ark. While pursuing a male suspect in a burglary, he learns of a massive conspiracy, one that may be tied to the Rivigarudo syndrome that is mutating its victims into something inhuman.

Title: Precure All-Stars DX the Dance Live: Miracle Dance Stage e Youkoso
Summary: It's an all-in-3D dance production featuring the Pretty Cures from seasons Futari wa Pretty Cure Max Heart through to Suite Pretty Cure.

Title: Nihon manga: Taro san no boken satsuei
Fastening Days 2
Summary: Situation becomes 'tighter' when Yoji and Kei face competition from a third unknown YKK zipper superhero.

Title: Aos
Summary: An animated short film by Yoji Kuri with vocals by Yoko Ono in which strange imagery and moaning sounds are seen and heard.

Title: Shinjuku Shinchan: Yoiko no koutsuu anzen
Street Fighter II: A Revived Fujiwara-kyou - The Fighters Who Ran Through Time
Sutorendjia - muko hadan
Summary: The story is set in the Sengoku period. A rounin called Nanashi saves a young boy Kotarou at an abandoned temple. Kotarou has no family, is pursued by a mysterious militia organization from China and hires Nanashi as his bodyguard.

Title: J rîgu wo 100 bai tanoshiku miru houhou
Dreamland
Summary: Short animation from Mirai Mizue. Simple rectilinear figures assemble into surprisingly complex "cities" that pulse along to Scarlatti Goes Electro's hyperkinetic score.

Title: The Adventures of Nadja II
Summary: Young Nadja Applefield must outsmart her evil uncle Herman, in order to finally meet her long lost mother.

Title: Miss Cinterrier's Groom
Summary: The beautiful girl Cinterrier (like the terrier version of Cinderella), was proposed to by many dogs. Who finally got her heart?

Title: The Prince of Tennis Best Games!! VOL.3
Yadokingu no ichinichi
Summary: The life of Yadoking (Slowpoke) who goes about his daily routine.

Title: Pulsar
Summary: Experimental stop-motion animation made with gypsum figures dancing to a pulsing beat.

Title: Hoshikuzu paradaisu
Summary: A high school student's father re-enters his life and brings along his famous new wife and daughter.

Title: Kubikiri Cycle: Aoiro Savant to Zaregoto Tsukai - Vol 8
Summary: The finale, or rather, the epilogue of Kubikiri Cycle.

Title: Kill Me Baby: Buddha Statues, Injuries and Fake Halloween
Magic Boots
Summary: The history of the geisha from an ancient lineage and a simple man who share a love.

Title: Iriya no sora, UFO no natsu: Iriya no sora, UFO no natsu
Tora-chan Ship Sweeper
Summary: Tora-chan and Miike are working on the side of a tuna steamship and manage to run afoul of the short-tempered captain. But the captain makes plenty of trouble on his own.

Title: Bavi Stock
Summary: The universe has fallen under the cruel military rule of the despotic Ventika empire. However, a rebel police state planet known as G.P.P has discovered the existence of a little girl called Muma, that could well hold the key to bringing down the Ventika empire once and for all. Despite her frightening potential, Muma is suffering from memory loss and is incarcerated in a maximum security prison. Charged with the assignment of busting Muma out and protecting her, the G.P.P send one of their most hardened elite, Agent Kate. Upon completing her mission successfully, Agent Kate is assigned yet another mission immediately after. This time, she must rescue another person that will prove instrumental in overthrowing the empire. His name is Bavi Stock, a young man of incredible talent but the problem is he that he too is currently incarcerated on the Ventika's purpose built prison planet. Can Agent Kate break him out? And just what can this Bavi Stock do?

Title: Nuumamonja: Time and Space Adventures - Chrono Trigger OVA
Summary: In a strange town in a strange time, a festival is about to begin, a festival of demons. Two rather harmless demons try their best to recruit people into their little group, but eventually give up and go off into the woods for a little adventure involving a giant robot cat named Gonzalez that sings about beating him up and getting silver points. Finally they stop Gonzalez and a few familiar faces show up.

Title: Ippatsu Hicchuu!! Devander
Summary: This story revolves around a spirited, carefree boy named Harukaze Kazuma, who lives with his little sister Sakura and his horse Lovely on a farm within sight of Mt. Fuji. One day, a "meteor" lands nearby, and it turns out to be Hinkle - a messenger from planet Muzanda who has come to warn Earth of a grave danger - and a robot horse named Roboni.

Title: Graffiti Night
Summary: Two graffiti taggers, depicted as cats, break into a city art museum late at night with a supply of spray-paint cans. When they find an open space of wall they set to work contributing their piece of art to the museum's collection. Will they finish the project before the museum security staff shows up at dawn?

Title: Doki Doki School Hours
Summary: A very short 27 year old teacher has an interesting time trying to teach her class. She has to deal with the eccentricities of her students as they present themselves over the school year. When you have an insane class (which includes a cross-dressing narcissist, an otaku, a dumb jock, a boy-band obsessed girl, a lesbian in love with the teacher, a homosexual in love with the jock, a guy who looks like a middle-aged man, a girl obsessed with material items and the vain rich girl), what's a person to do but hope?

Title: Deep Imagination
Summary: "DEEP IMAGINATION" is the omnibus animation film of SWEAT PUNCH SERIES, and includes five short stories entitled "DAN PETRY'S BLUE", "END OF THE WORLD", "COMEDY", "HIGAN", and "JUNK TOWN", which are directed by distinct and talented creators. This film is produced by STUDIO 4C, a top creators group in Japan who works high quality pieces such as "EXTRA (Ken Ishii's music clip)", "MEMORIES", "ANIMATORIX", "MIND GAME" and any other challenging animation films intended for the world.

Title: Hello Cherry Garden: Lun Lun the Flower Child
Summary: Lunlun goes to Japan to visit her friend Midori and the cherry blossoms. There, she sees the some pollution and runs into Togenishia and Yabouki trying to shed all the trees of their pretty petals. The film pleads Japanese citizens to pollute less and that cherry blossoms are the pride of the country.

Title: Bento Box Song
Summary: Bento Box Song is an original arrangement of a beloved Japanese children's song and dance. Sukeroku, a Kabuki character, sings and dances, with each movement representing the different ingredients used to prepare his bento box, a traditional Japanese boxed meal of rice balls, carrots, peppers, mushrooms, burdock, lotus roots and butterbur. The Kabuki orchestra features drums, a flute, and a shamisen guitar. Stagehands, dressed in black, assist with Sugeroku's performance. Bento Box Song uses 2D animation to combine the traditional arts of bento preparation and Kabuki.

Title: Akakichi no irebun
Summary: In the neighborhoods of Tokyo is Shinsei High School. Among the students is the young Shingo Tamai, a first year student. At the beginning of the school year the new coach of the soccer team is chooses Tenpei Matsuki. Matsuki intends to build a team that can compete at the highest levels.

Title: Soreike! Anpanman: Buruburu no takarasagashi daibouken!
Mami the Psychic: Dancing Dolls in a Starry Sky
Love Live! School Idol Project: Muse ->NEXT LoveLive! 2014 - Endless Parade Encore Animation
Air in Summer Kôhen: Ametsuchi - Universe
Beluga
Summary: A poor girl suffers even in her dreams.

Title: Eikoku ikka, Nippon o taberu
Summary: The anime is based on the essay Sushi and Beyond by British travel and food journalist Michael Booth. The book is about the author's 100-day trip in Japan with his family to sample Japanese cuisine from north to south.
Stars: Emily O'Meara,Tom Fox Davies,Finnigan Morris,Nicholas Jarnot

Title: Kojiki sho: Amano iwato-biraki no maki
Otogi-Soushi
Summary: In the magical world of the ancient Japanese gods, a young boy named Gurin must undergo severe tests and training with the help of kind monsters and goblins, so he can grow up to become the most powerful god in Otogi.
Stars: G. Larry Butler,Bryan Forrest,David Gerrold,Marieve Herington

Title: Tachikomatic Days
Summary: A Series of shorts that explore the "mindset" of the tachikoma intelligent tanks

Title: Ghost Cat Anzu
Summary: Friendship shared between Karin, a strong-minded girl sent to live with her monk granddad in the Japanese countryside, and Anzu, the even-more unpredictable phantom feline who acts as her guardian.

Title: Yonda? Movie: The Story of a Panda and Books
Fuusen'inu Tinî: Nandaka fushigina kyouryuu no kuni!
Ai Mai! Moe Can Change!
Summary: Girls change into clothes to save the day.

Title: Don't Forget About Friends Zachyr-kun
Summary: Zachyr was a helpful boy, from the High School. He was love interest by Ishie.

Title: Chojiku seiki orguss: Memorial file
Summary: Summary of

Title: Molly, Star-Racer
Summary: Molly, Star-Racers is the award winning pilot film for the series "Oban Star-Racers", which was released by Sav! The World Productions 5 years later.

Title: Kojiki monogatari: Tenson korin no maki
Sakura Wars 3: Is Paris Burning?
Summary: Ichiro Ogami goes to Paris, to command the pretty girls of Paris Kagekidan (Flower Assault Squad), led by the lovely Erica. Just as in Japan, this special unit has a complex base which is disguised as a theater, since the girls of Paris Kagekidan can act on stage as well as pilot huge steam-powered mechs. An unknown evil is threatening the city, so it's time for Ichiro to take command and save Paris from the demonic threat.

Title: Vita Lakamaya
Summary: Two creatures lie in a meadow in the land of Vita Lakamaya. The camera pans very slowly, exploring the ground and the world. There's a buzzing in the air. Something is different. The seemingly naïve animation reveals a tranquility - as similarly puzzling as the sudden procession of creatures passing through the forest. A funeral? Fish accompany them. The meadow is populated with beetles and butterflies. The year's cycle is complete. The leaves fall and the being sleeps. Dreamt and dreamy is the procession, the time. Just like Piezke, Popov's dormouse friend, whose favorite pastime is sleeping. The year draws to a close.

Title: Murder
Summary: A man has been murdered, and now it's up to a variety of investigators to untangle the mystery. Whether it is a classic gumshoe, a computer scientist, or even a James Bond look-alike, each of them must ensure that the case is solved, and the murderer is found.

Title: Super Deformed Double Feature
Summary: A super deformed parody which depicts the "making of " Eternal Story and Destruction. A very humorous behind-the-scenes look (if "Gall Force" were a live-action series instead of being animated). Cast and crew members run into severe and embarrassing difficulties as things do not turn out as they should; for example, Lufy totally drowns in embarrassment as she is object of a whole crowd of spectators while in the nude; the director's obsession with realistic filming causes some real high-voltage friction with Catty; and in the end, after the premiere, the girls end up in an ongoing on-stage tussle about which one is the most popular character.

Title: Starlight Scramble Ren'ai Kouhosei
Summary: In the near future, a space station is under attack by terrorists, during which Megumi loses her parents and almost dies herself were it not for a boy who manages to save her. Fast forward a few years and Megumi has now enlisted into her grandfather's military academy. There she meets a young man who looks very familiar. Could it be the boy who had saved her life?

Title: Chôjû kishin Dancougar: Ushinawareta monotachi e no rekuiemu
Summary: The Dancouga team prepares for its final showdown with their arch-enemy Zorbados. The team has to travel to the strange dimension of the alien invaders to once and for all save the earth. Fighting on the home-grounds of the enemy will take all their strength and cunning. The Dancouga will have to fight its way to the strange alien red dimension before it can start its final assault and assure the safety of mankind forever.

Title: Starship Girl Yamamoto Yohko II
Summary: Yamamoto Yohko and the team continue to fight and defeat Ness in the space contests that are used in the future in place of war to decide differences between worlds. In this sequel to the first Yamamoto Yohko OAV, Yohko, Madoka, Ayano, and Momiji try to find ways to enjoy their summer vacation, explore the ruins of an ancient civilization, and deal with a rival who is bent on defeating Terra's new ace pilot.

Title: Soul Men
Summary: Following the apocalypse, some aspects of life still go on. In this case, a noodle delivery boy must make his rounds. Shielded inside an armored robot-like machine armed with heavy lasers, he fights rampaging robots and over-zealous security systems until at last he reaches his hungry customer.

Title: Shima Kosaku's Asian Entrepreneurs
Stars: Toshiaki Karasawa,Odjargal Jambaljamts,Tony Fernandes,Sultan Ahmed Bin Sulayem

Title: Onikiri Musume Saisen
Summary: A monster and a girl fight each other because of an incident from the past.

Title: Minky Momo: The Brat Prince's Great Strategy
Summary: Magical girl Minky Momo must use her powers to save a young prince from being captured by enemies of his country.

Title: Himeyuri
Summary: The 30-minute film centers around a group of high school nurses called Himeyuri who served during the Battle of Okinawa during World War II.

Title: A Piece of Green
Summary: Dwarfs in red, blue and green colours have been working in each dark cabinet in a factory called television. They have kept working without questioning their own identities. Midori, a green dwarf, becomes aware of himself. . .

Title: Ohayo ninja-tai gatchaman zip!
Summary: A short series about Gatchaman.

Title: Beyond Creation
Summary: While drawing, Rui is surprised by the presence of Epsilon, a mysterious girl with magical powers.

Title: Kinnikuman: Seigi chôjin VS kodai chôjin
Summary: Kinnikuman and Buffaloman protect a Kindergarten class from Satan King while his armies of Ancient Supermen battle the Justice Supermen on Easter Island and all around the globe.

Title: Nurse Love Addiction
Summary: Follow Asuka Osachi, a ditzy girl training to become a nurse at Teito Nursing School. Experience her story with her classmates as they discover love, medicine, and adulthood.

Title: Hidamari Sketch Tokubetsu hen: 11 gatsu 27 nichi Soko ni ai wa arunoka?
Sushi Police
Summary: Three officers named Honda, Kawasaki and Suzuki works for the Sushi Police, where they're job is to sniff out restaurants serving illict or non-traditional sushi and stop them.

Title: Generation of Chaos III: Toki no Fuuin Session 2
Vegetable Restaurant
Summary: Two tomatoes sitting in an all-vegetable restaurant watch (and become part of) a dinner show.

Title: Oedipe
Summary: Oedipus was a mythical Greek king of Thebes. He blinded himself after having fulfilled a prophecy saying he would kill his father and marry his mother. Two thousand years later : what if the oracle completely missed the point?

Title: CSG TV-Game Collection '96
Summary: Promotional video for games coming out in Japanese Super Famicom, Sony PlayStation, Sega Saturn, NeoGeo CD and PC-FX, for the year 1996.

Title: OVA Switch, Act. 1
Summary: Two new investigators at the Narcotics Control Department in Japan, Kurabayashi Hal and Eto Kai, struggle against drug dealers, gangs, murderers, psychopaths, and mysterious organizations.

Title: Batchishi V yugio kiwamero! De: yueru monsutazu! !
Summary: A special recap video of the Yu Gi Oh Season Zero.

Title: The Water People
Summary: In a small country, surrounded by a dyke, dwell the Water People. They live partly submerged in water, for instead of keeping it out, the dyke keeps the water in. Their King, however, hates water and tries to sell out.

Title: Conan to Kiddo to Kurisutaru Maza
Summary: Kaito Kid will steal the Crystal Mother from Selizabeth(the Queen of the Principality of Ingram) aboard the train. On the other hand, Conan decided to stop him, as well as other people who plans to steal the Jewel.

Title: Niji no Kanata e! Shoujo Diana Monogatari
Summary: The rare anime biography of Princess Diana from her birth to her early teen years.

Title: Antique Heart
Summary: There's an old decrepit building at the edge of the school grounds that hasn't been used for years, and it falls apart a little bit more each day. But the little house holds a secret, as Takahiro and his friends are soon to find out...they wind up making contact with a mysterious entity known as Saki. Can Takahiro save Saki's world from destruction.

Title: Akane maniakkusu: Jôji Hakuryô ni tatsu
Summary: Jouji Gouda is a new transfer student at Hakuryo High. He fell in love at first sight and boldly proposed to Akane Suzumiya, representative of his class, on his first day at the new school. Although Akane finds him very annoying, hot-blooded and simple-minded Jouji never gives up and would do anything to express his love towards Akane.

Title: Kitsunetsuki
Summary: A young boy tells the story of going to a nighttime village festival with friends. He's wearing his mother's clogs, so they stop at a shop so he can buy new ones. An old woman tells him that whoever buys clogs at night will turn into a fox.

Title: The Animal Neighborhood Community
Summary: The Neighborhood Community (Tonari-gumi) was the smallest unit of population which was the national mobilization program established by the Japanese government during the World War II. This was to regulate rationing and thought control more efficiently. Each unit was consisted from 5-10 households, and organized to help one another, also to keep eye on any suspicious behavior.

Title: Monster Strike the Animation: Monsto no Kiki
Summary: Oragon lived a lonely life all by himself, until one day he was pulled into a mysterious new dimension. There he learns that an incredibly powerful enemy will attack in six months, destroying his beloved Monster Strike forever. Now Oragon must gather allies in the Strike World to save Monster Strike.

Title: Baja's Studio
Summary: Kohata Anime Studio is a place full of dreams where animation is made. Baja was raised in this studio by the people who create animation. Floating in a pond outside are his friends the ducks. Baja enjoys a fun and blissful daily life. One night, when all the people are no longer at the studio, Baja takes a peek outside and finds that his duck friends are being attacked by a cat. Will Baja be able to save his friends? A wondrous night adventure begins.

Title: March 1945, Tokyo
Summary: The story takes place in Tokyo during the World War II. In 1945, Tokyo had been bombed by the US Army Air Forces. An old man, who lives in Tokyo, keeps a photo of his lost wife with him all the time even when he needs to evacuate from air raid. One night on March 1945, the most destructive bombing raid is conducted.

Title: Ruriiro Princess
Summary: Ruri, a ditzy high school girl who lost her parents in a fire at a young age, is now living a blissful life with her cousin Tooru, for whom she harbours romantic feelings, and his family. But one day her life is thrown into turmoil, when members of the popular j-pop band B-Flash appear before her and reveal Ruri to be a descendant of the Pulsean Moon's royal family. One by one assailants try to take her life, only to be thwarted by Tooru in their attempts. However, the fate of the two is taken to a trial once he receives a mortal wound trying to protect her.

Title: Wansa-kun OVA
Summary: The hero of Wansa-kun was Wansa, a husky puppy who is sold for a pittance, then escapes, and spends much time looking for his mother. During his adventures on the street he meets friends, enemies and his beloved girlfriend. Reminiscent of Disney's Lady and the Tramp, this work depicts the friendship between Wansa, who looks for his mother, and his friends. Wansa-kun was originally developed as the mascot character for the Sanwa Bank. The character was used for the TV series, and Tezuka Osamu was credited only as the writer of the original story.

Title: Ninja Fireball in Edo
Summary: A short story about a young ninja.

Title: Kanón
Summary: Based on the novel "Adam Stvoritel" by Karel Capek: angry at the world for its imperfections, Adam destroys everything except himself. God, as punishment, lets Adam rebuild the world to his whim and will.

Title: From Heart to Heart
Summary: A short message between a boy and a girl.

Title: Itoshi no Muuco
Summary: The anime depicts the life of the pet dog Muuco and her owner Komatsu, who lives in his glass-making workshop in the mountains.

Title: Doragon kuesuto: Gureto Adobencha
Summary: It starts with a kid named Dai remembering a story told to him by his grandfather, the monster magician Brass, about the defeat of the Demon Lord Hadlar by the hands of a hero who, as the story progresses, is known to be Avan

Title: Space Journey: The First Dream of Wonder-kun
Push
Summary: Eco-toon, the rough looking rider spruces up from the desert vending machines but his attempts to replace the devastated earth are rejected.

Title: Sakura Wars: The Gorgeous Blooming Cherry Blossoms Act 2: The Golden River
Taro's Monster Hunt
Summary: A 1936 movie short about Taro a young man and his adventures against various creatures from different legends.

Title: I Am Takamiya Nasuno!
Summary: A spin-off from Teekyuu which centers on the daily life of Nasuno Takamiya, the "exceedingly airheaded" school tennis club member in

Title: Getsumento Heiki Mina
Summary: Actor Itoh Atsushi plays Yamada, whose main love in life is the Mina anime, a cutesy busty heroine with floppy rabbit ears and carrots sticking out her rear. (Source: AniDB)

Title: Maximum the Hormone: F
Summary: Maximum the Hormone's musical tribute to the Dragon Ball villain Frieza.

Title: Misuke in the Land of Ice
Dokaben
Summary: A baseball team is formed at a high school and goes on to become a champion team.

Battle Spirits: The Core Bearers
Summary: The series follows the adventure of Bearers of Light's Core that will shape the destiny of the world.

Title: Kiss Kiss Kiss
Summary: An experimental collage of comic book characters making out.

Title: Seirei Tsukai
Summary: After a family tragedy, Kagura is left with only his friend Asami. Meanwhile, war breaks out between Elementalors and Asami is kidnapped by Lord Shiki for her powers. Kagura must join forces with the elementalors to stop him and free Asami.

Title: Ah! My Goddess: Fighting Wings
Summary: Morisato Keiichi has a happy daily life, albeit unusual, which is rather unsurprising when you consider his household is home for four goddesses - the sisters Belldandy, Urd and Skuld, and their friendly rival Peorth. Belldandy, Urd and Peorth are having tea together so that their angels can have fun, while Skuld is sulking about her angel not coming out and Keiichi is trying to cheer her up. When Urd teases Skuld about her angel, the latter throws a fit, calming down when they share some of their wisdom with her. So far, a day perfectly like every other. However, while they were having fun, an emergency occurred in Heaven, and a Valkyrie, a goddess belonging to the powerful fighting squad, interrupted their party by descending to their home. That goddess is Lind, known as the Fighting Wing or as the One-Winged Angel, said to be the most elite fighter even among the Valkyries. Lind's descent is a sign that the goddesses are in grave peril, and that Keiichi's daily life is about to be turned upside down yet again.

Title: Sekai Meisaku Gekijou Kanketsu Ban: Haha wo Tazunete Sanzenri Part 2
The Datum Point
Summary: Yoshiro Ishihara (1915-1977) is "poet of silence." He said "A poem is an impulse to resist writing." This film is an attempt to seek out the landscape from his poem.

Title: Pukkulapottas and Hours in the Forest

Title: The Restaurant of Many Orders
Summary: Two gentlemen from the city go out hunting. After getting lost on a mountain road they found a cheap restaurant. But everything is not as it seems.

Title: Opening Sesame
Summary: A story about the conflict and growth of three people in their mental world.

Title: Pengin no mondai

Title: Kurayami no oto

Summary: The protagonist of the game is Nelke von Lestamm, a noble in charge of developing the frontier town of Vestabalt. Nelke is not an alchemist herself, but will have the aid of alchemists from all previous Atelier titles.

Title: Heybot!
Summary: The anime takes place on the screw-shaped island country of Nejigajima and follows the two "Bokyabots" Hebot and the Yurui Prince Nejiru as they collect different "Bokya Neji" screws.

Title: Konoha kaseki no natsu
Summary: While at the riverbank looking for fossils, Rintarou meets a boy named Toshi, and their days of adventure begins.

Title: Mobile Suit Gundam 00 Special Edition 3: Return of the World
Haiyoru! Nyaruani: Remember My Mr. Lovecraft
Woman Who Stole Fingers
Summary: One day, a child who had let go of his mother's hand has his finger taken. Whenever the mother's affection shows a different side, her child's finger turns into a larva and leaves his hand. No-one knows about the relationship between the two of them, and their house hides them from everyone. What kind of person will the child who lost his finger grow up to be?

Title: The Bat
Summary: Once upon a time, the birds and the beasts fought each other in a war. It was a terrible conflict, and the clever bats would side with the birds when the birds were looking victorious, and then they would become allies of the beasts when that side was winning battles. At last the war came to an end, the two parties reached an amicable settlement, and a great party of friendship was held. But when it came to the turn of the bats to perform in the program, their fence-straddling tactics were exposed, and everyone refused to associate with them. Since that time, the bats have been too ashamed to show their faces during the day, coming out only at night to flit silently around.

Title: Galaxy Angel S
Summary: Galaxy Angel special that contains 2 stories. During an infiltration of the Angels' base, Milfeulle grabs a grenade and runs off with it, sacrificing herself to save her friends. Later on, she wakes up, believing it all to have been a dream. Things seem off when Commander Volcott and the others can not see or hear her. Realizing she is now a ghost, Milfeulle must come to terms with memories of her friends, both good and bad. Commanders Mary and Volcott have been ordered to switch commands. Neither is very happy with the situation, but they make do. That is, until the Twin-star boys insult Commander Volcott's mustache. Enraged, he reverts to his old army self, the "White Supernova Wolf". The Angels try desperately to control their former leader while Mary sneaks off for some tea.

Title: Elite Jack!!
Summary: The story is set at the elite Omega High School, where test results decide everything. The high-scorers in the student council, in particular the student council president, have a lot of authority. Yuria Aikawa comes to this school, and though she seems like an ordinary girl who loves fun things and her boyfriend Shuri, she's actually a super-genius who gets the top score on every test. She becomes student council president and tries to make school life more fun in various ways.

Title: Shippuu! Iron Leaguer: Silver no Hata no Moto ni
Madō King Granzort: The Final Magical Battle

Summary: Early "gekimation" by Japanese filmmaker Ujicha.

Summary: Minky Momo (Gigi) must use her magical powers to shrink down in size, in order to help her friend Willy battle evil ogres.

Title: Wolf Guy
Summary: Akira is a young man who has infected by a bad poison. The only antidote has a side effect however, it turns him into a werewolf. The military wants to capture him for their own needs however.

Title: Mikan-bune
Summary: A Japanese businessman makes his fortune by shipping oranges from the farmlands to the capital city of Edo.

Title: True Love Story: Summer Days, and Yet...
Animal 1
Summary: Ichirou Azuma, a young amateur wrestler, wants to participate in the Olympic Games in Mexico.

Title: Gekijo ban Yu-gi-oh koukai chokuzen sp eien no koutekishu (ribal) Yuugi to Kaiba!
Summary: Jounouchi and Mokuba host this special depicting the rivalry of Yugi and Kaiba.

Title: Sore dake ga Neck
Summary: Through the appearance of a convenience store clerk who does not talk properly, while raising problems with the way of modern communication, we will approach the secret of the mysterious hero Mutou.

Title: Kiddy Grade: Maelstrom
Summary: A retelling of episodes 12-18 of the Kiddy Grade TV series.

Title: Hidamari Sketch Tokubetsu hen: 8 gatsu 11 nichi Soshite moto no ichi ni modosu

Summary: Animated shorts focusing on the Yamada family.
