Title: Sakura Wars: The Gorgeous Blooming Cherry Blossoms Act 4: A Midsummer Night's Dream
Lullaby for Wednesday's Cinderella
Summary: On a Wednesday morning, Kenji goes touring with his girlfriend when he spots some other riders waiting and stops his bike. One of them explains that a legendary female driver nicknamed Wednesday Cinderella passes this place every Wednesday in her white Porsche. Kenji becomes interested in this mysterious driver; however, racing with her proves more dangerous than it first seems to be.

Title: Soundcheck Featuring Method of Defiance
Summary: A film about how a group of musical legends from utterly different genres come together to make original sounds. Features the legendary Bill Laswell, Bernie Worrell, Toshinori Kondo, Dr. Israel and DJ Krush.

Title: Aoi & Mutsuki: A Pair of Queens
Sankichi the Monkey: The Air Combat
Summary: Monkeys battle polar bears in air combat.

Title: Panyo Panyo Di Gi Charat
Summary: Princess Dejiko goes around helping people with the goal to make everyone happy while trying to hide she's a princess from her friends.

Title: Castle
Summary: During the period of the 'Provinces at war', many lives were lost. A castle architect discovers the possible role of a tea room as a place for warriors to regain humanity.

Title: Ame to Shoujo to Watashi no Tegami: Short Short Story
Summary: A young girl who dreams of becoming a novelist, writes a love letter to a boy at school. Unwittingly, she is creating a short story that will move a little girl's heart.

Title: The Great Escape
Summary: Two men and their olive tree.

Title: Zukkoke sanningumi no koutsuu anzen: Itsumo anzen kakunin no maki
Snail's House - Pixel Galaxy
Summary: A small-time singer with very little money suddenly finds a "snail girl" living in her apartment.

Title: Tamayura: Minna de arukeba happî, nanode
Anal Juke -anal Juice-
Summary: A dream that occurs after breaking up with a boyfriend.

Title: The Expression Amrilato
Summary: Rin was just buying an afternoon snack but she gets a shock when her surroundings suddenly transform. The strange language the people are speaking have made things unrecognizable. Just then, Ruka, appears and extends a helping hand.

Title: Zoom Dating with Evil-Lyn
Summary: Desperately searching for a boyfriend, sorceress Evil-Lyn embarks on a series of disastrous Zoom dates with an oddball selection of candidates from across the galaxy.

Title: Hamm's Friend's Goal! Ham Ham Gold Medal-Run! Run! Battle!
Two Worlds
Summary: Animated short film about a Grasshopper and Ant story, giving moral guidance to children who learn that insects who work hard are rewarded while the lazy ones suffer and fall into poverty.

Title: Maji de otaku na ingurisshu! Ribon-chan: Eigo de tatakau mahô shôjo
Minky Momo: Love Attack in the Haunted Mansion
Summary: When magical girl Minky Momo (Gigi) and her friends get lost during a trip to a lake, they take shelter in a spooky haunted house.

Title: Yamadeloid
Summary: "I sing with all my heart." A lone, robotic, samurai travels from town to town up until he falls in love with a beautiful maiden. But then she gets kidnapped by the yakuza.

Title: Sore Ike! Anpanman: Gomira no hoshi
Mechakko Dotakon
Summary: Geeky genius Michiru has already got her Ph.D. in atomic physics (from California university) by the age of 11. But she still longs for a little brother, so she builds her own. Robot boy Dotakon is soon joined by their little robot sister, Chopiko, and the trio embarks on a series of fantastic adventures fueled by Michiru's inventions.

Title: ME: Story of a Performance
Summary: ME - Is a story of a performance. We follow the performance from different perspectives: how it is perceived by the dancer, the audience and how it can be seen from an objective point of view as a mere code. Through these the interpretation of a different world - The Performance is created and we are all sucked into being a part of it. ME: English: Me, Finnish: We, Japanese: Eye ME is a short film created by filmmakers Jopsu Ramu and Timo Ramu of MUSUTA and Production Company Directors Guild Helsinki with choreographer and dancer Johanna Nuutinen.

Title: Tantei Opera Milky Holmes: Arsene Karei Naru Yokubou
Summary: The Phantom Thief Arsène is undeniably powerful. If she wishes for it, she could steal any treasure she wants without being caught or arrested. However, she pulls her punches because she desires that Milky Holmes achieve their full potential as detectives-and then to battle them without holding anything back. To achieve this, she tries every trick up her sleeve to create various situations for them to face each other-avoiding any hindrances that may come her way.

Title: Rose Flower and Joe
Summary: It's a Sanrio picture that feels partly like an anime art film and partly like a Warner Bros. cartoon. The film features some very creative imagery, a groovy 70's jazz score, and very little spoken dialogue. It's a story about a dog named Joe that falls in love with a rose and protects it from a mean spirited crow. There's some energetic Fritz Freeling style action. There's also some unexpectedly grim tragedy, not including the anticipated outcome, which does occur as expected.

Title: The Shaman's Journey: Nine Worlds
Summary: 'The Shaman's Journey: Nine Worlds' was created as part of a multimedia installation by anthropologist and media artist Thomas Ross Miller for the exhibition 'Schamanen Sibiriens: Magier, Mittler, Heiler' at the Linden Museum Stuttgart Staatliches Museum fur Volkerkunde in Stuttgart, Germany, in cooperation with the Russian Museum of Ethnography. Originally projected on a wide screen in 360 degree surround sound, it forms a distinct aural and visual environment. The film navigates a passage through Siberian nature and supernature, from twilight evocation of local spirits to shamanic chanting and drumming. A montage including rare photographs, petroglyphs, landscapes, and pure color combines with sounds of sea ice, wind, fire, birds, animals, and ethnographic field recordings to suggest transformations of consciousness which might have occurred at shamans' ceremonies.

Title: The Fox of Shichigorosawa
Summary: This story is told in the Ainu language, which has been deemed a critically endangered language by the United Nations Educational, Scientific and Cultural Organization (UNESCO). Ainu is an indigenous people of Japan (Hokkaido, and formerly northeastern Honshu) and Russia (Sakhalin and the Kuril Islands). Some of main staffs USA Teruyo (Ms), YUKI Koji (Mr), nitankur (Mr), FUKUMOTO Shoji (Mr) are Ainu artists. Story; Higashiyama, the home of the foxes, has become an illegal dumping ground. This has resulted in the decline of small animals, which the mother fox relied on as prey to feed her children. The fox comes down for the mountains in search of food to feed her children, and comes upon a human village.

Title: Candy Candy - The Call of Spring
Summary: Candy returns to Pony's Home and she meets a girl who has lost her parents and doesn't associate with the other kids. In order to cheer her up she decides to tell her about herself from the moment she was found by Miss Pony and sister Lane to her decision to leave the boarding school in England and walk her own path.

Title: Don't Cry
Summary: In this era, AI has come to power. Birthing limits were implemented in order to manage the AI population that has grown too much. Although AI's threatening, illegal birth laws are no end of mankind's desire.

Title: Kubikiri Cycle: Aoiro Savant to Zaregoto Tsukai - Vol 5
Summary: Second beheading has occurred, making the murder case into a serial murder case.

Shimajiro to Sora Tobu Fune
Summary: Qiaohu is having a temper tantrum because his mom is spending too much time on taking care of the little sister, he meets with the little inventor squirrel Jin Jin from the forest kingdom while he tells the story to his friends.

Title: Jungle Emperor Leo: Hon-o-ji
Summary: When a Tiger Cub named Paola appears in the Jungle and chases the other animals seeking a friend, unrest begins to stir. When Leo befriends Paola, Bubu begins to cause trouble, and it's up to Leo to bring peace back the jungle.

Title: Banana Mura ni Ame ga Furu

Hidamari Sketch: Sae & Hiro's Graduation Arc
Summary: Sae and Hiro graduate from Yamabuki Art High School and say goodbye to the Hidamari apartments.

Summary: Special shorts of

Title: The Apple

Summary: A cat just wants some alone time with his girl, but is interrupted by his stressed owner. Can't those stupid humans just keep things like relationships simple?

Suddenly, a guitar of the toy made a melody and she was invited to the world where dolls were living. There was a huge monster who hated music and the monster attacked the girls. Dolls begins counterattacking...

Title: High School Agent
Summary: Teenager Kanemori Kousuke is a secret agent for the international VN spy network. Using his computer hacking skills, he tracks international criminals. Later he goes after Neo-Nazis to the Arctic were they try to raise a U-boat with a sinister secret.

Title: Meisou-Ou Border
Summary: Featuring a modern-day odd couple, the naive virgin Kubota and the handsome charmer Hachisuka, who meet up by accident in a Middle Eastern desert and return to Japan to hustle their way through life. They start by getting involved in shady TV dealings, where they get jobs making fake documentaries.

KY kei JC Kuukichan
Summary: On the first day as a transfer student, Betao comes to meet one girl. Her name is - Kuuki Yominashi. The contemporary story, intersecting lives; a story of duty, human nature and friendship. (Source: AnimeBancho)

Title: Kokoro Library
Summary: Deep in the mountains lies a library with the same name as one of its caretakers, Kokoro. With her sisters Inna and Aruto, she strives to uphold the best characteristic of a librarian -- to help users with all her heart. Join young Kokoro as she starts the journey to become a full-fledged librarian, while learning about life, and being the best she can be.

Title: Mobile Suit Gundam SEED Destiny: TV Movie III - Flames of Destiny
Summary: The Earth Alliance and Orb Union gather their forces in the Mediterranean Sea, and launch a second attack on the Minerva. Shinn unleashes an attack on the Orb Fleet and Kira and Athrun confront each other in battle. Chairman Durandal thinks on his past and also thinks about the future, Shinn reaches an a young woman, Stella who is the enemy pilot he promised to protect is now captured. Stella is weak though and Shinn goes in to save her.

Title: Starting Over
Summary: You fall down every time before reaching your goal. At each fall, the glass you held in your hand breaks, then everything starts again from the beginning. But there are things one can only discover through repetition. The answer lies within yourself.

Title: The Discharged Murderer
Summary: It's a hard-boiled detective story in the city of intellectual excrement. A private detective starts to investigate a serial murder case. And through the pursuit of the invincible serial killer, the detective finds a secret of his world finally. The movie expresses the world of living excrement by using realistic puppets and VFX.

Title: Sayonara
Summary: A short story about two unlikely friends saying goodbye. A young man lost his home, a result of global warming and rising oceans. He spends one last day with his best friend, a sea turtle, before moving on. 'Sayonara' is a touching experimental short created using a novel mix of techniques ranging from CG animation, drawn animation, video, puppets, painting, and photography.

Title: Sôkyu no fafunâ: Raito obu refuto
Tôkyô Wan Pîsu Tawâ: Tongari Shima no Dai Hihô

Title: Kodomo no jikan 2 gakki: Hazakura no koro
Sutoreito jaketto: The convicts - Togabito no kioku
Dancouga Nova
Summary: The series takes place in 2107,[1] where small wars take place all over the globe. A team of four people; Aoi Hidaka, Kurara Tachibana, Sakuya Kamon, Johnny Bernet, are chosen to be the pilots of the mysterious large robot that "protects the weak" and stops these small-scale wars, the Dancouga Nova. Like its predecessor, Dancouga Nova is a combining robot type of Super Robot, which have four separate units with each unit having its own pilot; the Nova Eagle, Nova Rhino, Nova Liger, and Nova Elephant, that form the Super Robot Dancouga Nova. The pilots are gathered by a secret organization that maintains the Dancouga Nova and dispatches its pilots on assigned missions from the organization's base of operations, the Dragon's Hive.

Title: Mattsu, Yamma and Moburi - The Mystery of the Seven Gems and the Flying Castle
Summary: Mattsu and Yamma are two boys who live in Matsuyama. Their favourite pastime is looking for "the seven wonders of Matsuyama". One day, two men appear. What are the 7 hidden gems that they seek? Moburi, a high school girl who is like an older sister to the boys, also gets caught up in the adventure as this thrilling story set in Matsuyama begins. Faced with all kinds of trouble, what will they choose for the future of their city?

Title: Monster Strike the Animation: Hallelujah - Umi no Sentaku
Summary: The story is set in the ungoverned Tokyo shortly after a mysterious power outage incident. Those who survived from the incident had to protect themselves from the mob. It was "Links," the young people with superpower, that saved the people in Tokyo. Among these young people, a performance group known as "Crown" gained tremendous support. The protagonist Hallelujah and and his best friend Akatsuki, who grew up with him together in an orphanage, are also awakened with the abilities of Links. They join Crown and play an active part to save people every day.

Title: Fist of the North Star: The Kaioh Saga
Summary: Super fighter Kenshiro faces the toughest opponent he's ever had, the sinister brother of Raul, Kaioh.

Title: Tomorrow from There
Summary: Every single day as always The Way to home as always ...The thing waiting ahead is...??

Title: Sweet Little Chiko
Summary: A short film based on a children's choral suite, about a little boy who falls in love with a girl named Chikotan only to lose her in a traffic accident.

Title: Chromosome Sweetheart
Summary: An ex-couple in a café, a girl sucking on her girlfriend's hair, a running woman, a fleeing town, a little girl walking along the river. In this world, there are as many forms of love as there are people.

Title: Natsunagu!
Summary: A young girl visits Kumamoto Prefecture of Japan in the aftermath of its 2016 earthquakes. Despite the tragedy, people there are optimistic and inspiring.

Title: Olympic Games on Dankichi Island
Summary: It shows the Olympic Games on Dankichi Island, where humans and animals compete against each other, in the categories: relay race, tug-of-war and tree-changing race. Who will be the champion?

Title: Mamoru-kun ni Megami no Shukufuku wo!
Minky Momo: Good Luck Miracles
Summary: When a baseball team won't allow girls to play, magical Minky Momo (Gigi) uses her powers to change that.

Title: 5-Oku-Nen Button
Summary: A button grants a million yen to whoever pushes it, with the condition that the person must spend 500 million years alone in an empty space.

Title: Little Busters! EX
Summary: Eight additional episodes added to the Blu-Ray release of season two Little Busters! (Refrain). The timeline falls into the middle of the regular episodes.

Title: Momo and Her Cat
Summary: Momo and Myu the cat are old friends and irreplaceable family members. But Myu ages much faster than Momo. This heartwarming short animation with gentle sensibility depicts a girl whose encounter with a cat thrusts her into adulthood.

Title: Choujigen Game Neptune Hi Light: Ranzen no Bifrost-hen
Wazaguu! VS Dangerous Jiisan Ja: Houfukuzettou! Anime Quiz
Summary: A crossover featuring Wazabo Saishuushou: Wazaguu. and Dangerous Jiisan Ja.

Title: The Night Game: Neko no Sakusen
Summary: Cats play baseball at night. When their ball goes over the fence a dog is indifferent on giving it back. The cat tries different methods to get revenge.

Title: Kuma no gakkou: Jakkî to Keiti
Kamakura
Summary: A snow hut in the middle of the rice paddy. Now, let's see what to do, in the space full of whiteness and quietness, until the Spring comes. Until the snow hut melted, and lose shape.

Title: Kyô kara maô! R: Kawaita kaze
San Chôme no Yûhi
Summary: The adventures and daily lives of a group of residents in a 1960s Tokyo apartment block.

Title: Tasukeai no rekishi: Seimei hoken no hajimari
Sports Day at Animal Village
Summary: A lively day of sports has arrived. For plenty of animals this means rousing competitions of skill and stamina. Monkeys swing from their hands and tails on the high bar; bears and even a hippo dive from high above into a tiny pool; and kangaroos and pigs box it out in the ring. From acrobatics to one-on-one combat, there's plenty of fun to be had in sports.

Title: Pygmalio
Summary: Coult, the prince of the kingdom of Loon, is living a happy life with his father King Stephan and many retainers. He is cheerful, bright, tender-hearted, and gifted by the god Aganade Coult's mother Guaratia-the daughter of Aganade-married King Stephan However, Medusa-daughter of the evil spirit-was envious of her happiness and turned her into a statue together with many villagers when Coult was still a baby. In order to save the other villagers, Stephan pledged allegiance to Medusa, and was forced to promise to make Coult do the same on his 8th birthday. When the day arrives, Coult declares that he will defeat Medusa and revive the people who were turned into statues. He sets out on a long journey to search for the daughter of the evil spirit.

Title: Generation of Chaos III: Toki no Fuuin Session 1
Summary: Fuujin Year 130 (Medieval times when magic and gods were of great importance). Two years ago, the great war in the "Old Fuujin Continent" was controlled by the "Zenon Country" who possessed great power. In Randia, a small country to the south, the young prince Alfred is attacked by an assassin but gets saved by his friend Welles. The young prince was the last key to the revival of Randia - It was said that in legends the prince had the power to unleash the "Seal of Power" because of his blood relation. This brought fear upon the Zenon country and thus their attack. Welles was just another soldier, but he was also a close friend of Alfred's and they had been fighting together in the battlefield for a long time. That is why they're known as the "Galloping Winds" on the battlefield. And so, the two of them along with Welles' younger sister Teefa, are burdened with the fight for their country. Hearing that war is once again about to break out, the former loyal subject Rea also returns. As more and more people get involved in the war, the mystery of the seal unfolds - To reveal the "Blood Relation of the Prince".

Title: Star Dust
Summary: In 2061 CE, humanity's indiscriminate pollution of space has substantially hindered the development of space travel. In response, an international federation has designated the sun as a natural incinerator, federally establishing a treaty with the goal of first processing hazardous waste on Jupiter and forming the space environment defense force Cosmo Ecology. However, polluters evading surveillance networks continue to illegally dispose of radioactive waste directly into the sun. As a result, increased solar flare activity is on the verge of turning the Earth into a desert.

Title: Yowamushi Pedal Special Ride
Summary: It's another training day for Sohoku team as they prepare for the Inter-High. This time, they climb the slopes of Minegayama, with each of the grade years going separately from others. Meanwhile, the bond between Onoda and Makishima becomes a little deeper as the former shares with the latter his passion for anime merchandise.

Title: Youkai Watch Jam: Youkai Gakuen Y - N to no Souguu
Princess Katsura
Summary: Short film about a princess being kidnapped.

Title: Girls und Panzer das Finale: Part IV
Carnival Phantasm EX Season
Summary: Caren Ortensia attempts to control the world using money with varying degrees of success, Phantas-Moon receives a movie adaption of her T.V. show, and Shiki is involved in a love plot that spans years.

Title: Rapid Rouge
Summary: 3D CGI based digital animation short.

Title: Ashita genki ni nâre!: Hanbun no satsumaimo
Seikima II Humane Society: Jinrui ai ni michita shakai
Mobile Fighter G-Gundam: Prologue I: Birth Chapter
Kyô kara maô! R: Shô shimaron no shônen ô zenpen
Master of Epic: The Animation Age
Ichigo mashimaro: Orijinaru bideo animêshon - Keshiki.
Kidô senshi Gandamu Yunikôn: Niji no kanata ni
Summary: Banagher and Riddhe continue to fight each other as the Nahel Argama crew and the Sleeves join forces with Conroy's ECOAS troops in taking on the Neo-Zeon forces around Industrial 7. In the...

Title: Sekai Meisaku Gekijou Kanketsu Ban: Konnichiwa Anne Part 1
White Tunnel
Summary: There is an April day with inconsistent weather. A taxi driver, four passengers, sisters and brother are going to visit their mother. As strangers. Chaos is in silence, in their minds, on the road...

Title: The Silence of the Grave Yard
Sergeant Keroro the Super Movie: Creation! Ultimate Keroro, Wonder Space-Time Island De Arimasu!!
Belly Drum Dance at Shojoji Temple
Summary: It's about tanukis singing and dancing.

Title: Mind and Galaxy
Summary: This cosmic film narrates the endless transformation of the Mind into Brain, Galaxy, and blossoming Universe and vice versa.

Title: Fossil Tears
Summary: In a mossy planet, beings found a shining blue fossil which was formed out of someone's tears many eras ago.

Title: Haunted Junction
Summary: Three students, the son of a Catholic priest, the son of a Buddhist monk and the daughter of a Shinto priest are recruited into a haunted high school's "Holy" Student Council and given the task of handling the campus's out of control spirits.

Title: Minami-ke Omatase
Summary: Halloween descends upon the Minami family: Kana surprises Makoto wearing a vampire costume that Touma made. Since Makoto knows nothing about Halloween, Kana enlightens him. To get into the spirit Makoto is dressed up as a magical girl, and saying "Trick of Treat" to Takeru, yields some candy. The New Year's Day festivities are pretty much over on January 3rd, but when Hayami hands out sweet half-sake (without alcohol supposedly) Yuka and the other girls all end up slightly tipsy. Preparing food on a whim does not agree with Chiaki, she prefers time and effort put into its preparation. Kana and Haruka then start doing things in a whim... with mixed results. On a hot day the air conditioner breaks down, so Kana and the other girls decide not to go to the pool, that would take effort, so they sit around the table in their swimsuits.

Title: Shichinin no Nana: Oshougatsu Da yo! 7 x 7 = 49-nin no Nana?
Summary: Nana slacks off from studying by going to the shrine on New Year's day. Panic ensues when Nana discovers that the rest of the Nanas all show up at the same shrine. But things turn to worse when they find out that their New Year's money gets lost in the crowd. It didn't help their cause when they tried an inventive way to make more money.

Title: Karo & Piyobupt: Imagination
Summary: Karo was hurrying to his house on a rainy day. Then he met a fish swimming in the air. He talked about the fish to Piyobupt but he laughed at Karo. So they started to imagine. And outside of the window, flying fishes were enjoying the rain.

Title: Pinball Mania
Summary: As a Japanese teenage boy plays pinball in a deserted arcade, he sees himself pulled into the machine. Once inside, he is pursued by mysterious spiked balls and forced to run for his life through deserted city streets. As he runs, the perspective switches back and forth between the boy outside playing the game and the boy inside who has become part of it.

Title: Shakugan no Shana SP: Love and Outdoor Hot Spring Tutorial!
Summary: Yuji and Shana's class go on a trip to see various temples and shrines, followed by a trip to a hot springs resort. During the trip, Matake Ogata tries to tell Eita Tanaka her feelings for him, but various complications and hijinks occur that prevent her from doing so.

Title: The Kindly Lion
Summary: This is an animated version of Yanase Takashi's picture book featuring the friendship between a mother dog, Muku-Muku, who lost her puppy, and the baby lion Buru-Buru, who lost his mother.

Title: Right Places: Sono Toki, Boku No Irubeki Basho
Hâi sureppu Jun
Summary: Jun Nonomiya is an extremely intelligent girl, who spends most of her time building new inventions: her two best friends, Floppy (Kichinosuke) and Flappy (Yukinojo), are just two robots created by her.

Title: Jinzô Mahô Shôjo Kaini
Summary: The mysterious bond between a woman named Mai, who can't escape the memories of her abusive parents, and the "Cosplayer Killer," a murderer who kills while wearing a cosplay suit.

Title: Dr. Slump & Arale-chan Ncha! Wakuwaku Hot Natsu Yasumi
Zdravstvuite!
Summary: On a summer day a strange man who teaches Russian at the beach takes a trip to town.

Title: Happy Bogeys Episode 11-13
Summary: Strange message that strange creatures emitted.

Title: Good Bye Marilyn
Summary: A playful, satirical pop-art look at American culture, focusing on Marilyn Monroe.

Title: The Monkey Sword Masamune
Summary: Short movie from 1930 about a soldier traveling a great distance to deliver a letter. Along the way he receives a sword from a monkey.

Title: Modern No.2
Summary: We went for it without any hesitation. We have formed the world at a quickening pace. What on earth is this world that we have created?

Title: Sûpâ Dôru Licca-chan: Licca-chan zettai zetsumei! Dôru naitsu no kiseki
Zettai Karen Children OVA: Aitazousei! Ubawareta mirai?
Coinlaundry XYZ
Summary: 3D computer animation of the TV program and project "D's Garage 21", featuring three divers getting lost in a laundromat.

Title: Ogami Matsugorô
Summary: Ogami a tough high school kid with enemies and supporters. He meets Koume a pretty girl who despises violence . He decides to try and help out at the kindergarten, which is being terrorized by local yakuza thugs.

Title: Superdimensional Romanesque Samy: Missing 99
Summary: During the creation of this World and many parallel others, gods and demons fought over control of the Universe. The turning point of this battle lies now in the power of a special girl named Samy.

Title: What Is Happiness?
Summary: Alto is going home from school, when he finds a girl who calls herself an angel.

Title: Why We Live
Summary: An anticlerical peasant in the Japan from the feudal era, after the death of his mother and his wife, ends up contributing to the spread of Buddhism throughout the country after hearing the lecture of a Buddhist monk.

Title: Sore Ike! Anpanman: Roll to Laura Ukigumojou no Himitsu
The Story of the Monkey King
Summary: The Monkey King goes goes out in search of the Sacred Text.

Title: Yokohama Meibutsu Otoko Katayama Gumi! 2
Summary: The city of Yokohama has become a lawless district for biker gangs. One particular gang, the "Crazy Babies", have a 17 year old leader called Hiromi Katayama that is famous throughout the entire Kanagawa alliance as being a strong fighter with a devout sense of morality. However, when a young rookie by the name of Toshi Ikeda wants in, he swears to Katayama that he will uphold the ideals of the Crazy Babies and vows to not fight with anybody for his first probationary month within the gang or else forfeit his chance to join the gang. Ikeda being the fiery young man he is, soon finds himself caught in the middle of a fight and unintentionally sparks off a feud between the gangs of Kanagawa and the dangerous Nagoya based group, The Dragon Star Crew, who have their eye on taking the whole of Kanto. Can Katayama defend Yokohama from the encroaching hoodlums?

Title: Kushimitama-Samurai
Summary: The blind samurai Haku can perceive that which cannot be seen by the eye. But he does not try to see the world that the eye can see. 'This world is the full of darkness' Attacked by thief in the dead of night, he lost both his parents and his sight. From that day on his faith in the world was gone.

Title: Chou dengekiban SD Gandamu Sangokuden: Brave battle warriors
Tokyo Cosmo
Summary: A young girl dreams in the midst of her routine life.

Title: Minami-ke Natsuyasumi
Summary: Chiaki, Kana, and Haruka decide how to spend their last few days of summer together. Kana struggles to finish her homework.

Title: Au Fou!
Summary: A series of shorts pointing out the various ways that people meet their death through their own stupidity.

Title: C.P. Cavafy in Tokyo
Summary: A collection of animation films inspired by Cavafis poetry made by students of the Musashino art University Tokyo.

Title: One Punch Man: OVA 2 #06 Zombieman Satsujin Jiken 2 - Fubuki no Sansô to Samugari-tachi
Summary: Child Emperor, Zombieman, Superalloy Darkshine, and Metal Bat are dispatched to a forlorn, snowy mountain to hunt down a monster.

Title: Konna Watashitachi ga Nariyuki de Heroine ni Natta Kekka www
Dr. Slump: Arale's Surprise
Summary: Arale and friends discover a beautiful stone with strange powers. Before they know it, dangerous pirates invade their peace and steals the stone. Now it is up to them to retrieve the stone before it is used by evil hands.

Title: Supa Mario Kato
Summary: Promotional video for "Super Mario Kart", coming out for Super Famicom.

Title: Pieces
Summary: A woman finds the pieces of a puzzle. She starts in motion a series of events that bring her to a frightening point in time.

Title: Kyô kara maô! R: Ai no otome
Wandaba Style
Summary: Michael Hanagata, manager of Mix Juice, an Idol group trying to make it big, strikes a deal with Teen Genius Susumu Tsukumo. Together they plan to land on the moon with eco-friendly experiments, using Mix Juice as his pilots.

Title: Ojarumaru: Mangetsu rôdo kiki ippatsu: Tama ni wa maro mo dai bôken
Chame bozu dakana tsuei no maki imokawa ryozo tsuri no maki

Summary: An 8-second animation that keeps looping - or does it?

Title: Taro Urashima
Summary: Urashima Taro is a well-known Japanese folk tale about an honest fisherman who is invited to an underwater castle after saving a sea turtle on a beach from bullies.

Title: Tokyo Babylon: Vision
Summary: This is a music video that was included with the 'Tokyo Babylon' premium laserdisc released in Japan in 1992.

Title: Takeda Station Memories
Summary: Takeda Station, where Shimiko used to visit with her mother when she was a child, has shut down. Shimiko decides to build an altar for the station and makes a wish to the elephant in the park to see the station again. The director reflects back on her own memory of Takeda Station in this infectiously joyous animation.

Title: Cosmic Fantasy: Galaxy Cougar's Trap
Summary: Yuu and Saya are two of the top Cosmic Hunters in the galaxy, and Yuu is enjoying a bit of fame after his most recent adventure. The two are on a date when they are interrupted by a distress signal from their "ally", the feline pervert Nyan. In the meantime, the space pirate Belga begins attacking space freighters in an attempt to lure out Yuu, so she can take him to bed with her. Of course, when he spurns her, she decides that if she can't have him, then no one can.

Title: Paper Bunnies
Summary: Feature film adaptation of the animated short films that are presented as supporting films at TOHO Cinemas throughout Japan. Set in downtown Tokyo, Ropé, a paper bunny, and upper class paper squirrel Akira play out a slacker-style drama with relaxed conversation. Akira and Ropé get extremely busy as they try to savour the final day of summer vacation. Akira has to deal with the problems of his yet-to-be-started summer research project and fixing his big sister's earrings. On top of all that, he gets tangled up in a robbery.

Title: Gekijouban Inazuma irebun Go vs. Danbôru senki W
When to Crush Fried Egg Yolks?
Summary: Marujiro Tamiya is always bothered by the way of eating, he has a strange way to eat. He thinks too much about how to eat food, this is the story about his troubles.

Title: Mai otome: Tsuvai - Shima no mai/Otome no meikyû
Dr. Slump: N-cha! Penguin Villiage is Swelling Then Fair
Anpanman: Revive Banana Island!
Summary: Clouds and cold may ruin all the sweet fruit on Banana Island, but queen Banna refuses to ask Anpanman for help, while while Baikinman goes to Banana Island in search of the legendary Giant Banana.

Title: Tamayura: Mizuiro no chiisana kippu, nanode
Kamikire ichimai
Summary: Three girls, reaching 30 in their age. Their main focus in in marriage, and their 'race' begins. Who will get married first? How are they going to get what they want? What is 'real happiness'? The answer is in this film.

Title: Sponchoi pispochoi
Summary: In fact, human beings are a group of insects having their own intentions. The big parasites, SPONCHOI Pispochoi appears suddenly. How do the insects and SPONCHOI Pispochoi break away?

Title: Fortune Arterial: Akai Yakusoku - Tadoritsuita Basho
Summary: Everyone goes to a hot spring for a vacation.

Title: Chamebo shingacho nomi fufu shikashi no maki
Kubikiri Cycle: Aoiro Savant to Zaregoto Tsukai - Vol 6
Summary: The clues don't add up, and the lies mixed up with them certainly aren't helping. Yet is seems the key to solving the mystery might just be within the reach.

Title: Amagi Brilliant Park: Wakuwaku Mini Theater - Rakugaki Backstage
Summary: Unaired specials included in the BD/DVD volume releases of

Title: Mashin eiyuden Wataru: Sokaizan eiyu densetsu
Manê wôzu nerawareta wôtâ furonto keikaku
Natsu no gero wa fuyu no sakana
Summary: Painful events become memories over time. Still. we vomit and eat again. Life is Eco.

Title: Chamebo kuki ju no maki chame no kuri ju
The Secret of the Snowman
Summary: On a Sunday, a girl build a snowman .Then a strange thing happened.This is an animation work, which 6 - 8 years old children made the story and created with wool.

Title: Atsumare! Amazon kizzu shimajiro to asobou
The Noisy Second Floor
Summary: Kotaro is the heir to a drapery business named Ebisuya. He cannot restrain himself from visiting Yoshiwara, the former red-light district in Tokyo, every night. Though he is old enough to take over the family business, he continues to spend all of his time fooling around, and his father can no longer put up with him. Amid a tumult of threats to disown him, Kotaro is visited by the perplexed manager of the house.

Title: Hayou no Tsurugi: Shikkoku no Mashou
Summary: The OVA is based on the first volume of a 40 (!) volume light novel series by Maeda Tomiko, it tells the story of Laethreel (or just plain Lath), a wannabe demon-breaker who controls a powerful sword, Gurenki, but not much else. She suddenly acquires a "protector", Anshu, and a mission: to rescue the kidnapped princess of Gandia from the clutches of the jet-black demon Aju. However, Laethreel shares a dark secret with her younger brother Leedyle, and her mission proves more complicated, and dangerous, than it first appears.

Title: Over a Drink
Summary: An unemployed man picks up a flyer which happens to be a notice asking for investors to put up capital for raising a sunken ship. The sum is 10 yen each. To the man, who cannot even scrape together enough money to buy a 10-sen shochu (cheap distilled spirits), this notice seems to be completely beyond his realm. That evening, the man passes by a bar and is enticed inside where he drinks himself to sleep. When he comes to, he realizes that he is at the bottom of the sea. The man meets a samurai who is suspicious of him at first, but when he realizes that the man is Japanese, they cooperate to hunt for treasure. Almost immediately, they come upon the sunken ship of Mononai-go. What will become of them?

Title: Venger Robo
Summary: It has been 15 years since the fateful battle with The Empire of 100 Demons. Humanity is under attack by the scientist Dr. Lando with their mechanical monsters empire. Getter Team has begun training on a new Getter Robo, Hayato recruit a boy named Go Ichimonji as Getter One's pilot. Go - along with co-pilots Sho and Gai - must use Getter Robo to exterminate the Mechanical Beasts of Dr. Lando.

Title: Gekijô ban kino no tabi: Byôki no kuni - For you
Summary: Kino travels to a country divided into two parts: the very clean and peaceful city, closed off from the surrounding wastelands. Kino meets a little girl in the city suffering from a disease which is constantly being researched. The girl, however, does not know just how the research is being done.

Title: Sore Ike! Anpanman: Tenohira wo Taiyou ni
Hero: Song of Hope
Summary: Flow's music video for Dragon Ball: Battle of Gods.

Title: Street Fighter II: Jougai rantou hen
Rhizome
Summary: The film is inspired by the philosophies 'Rhizome' of Gilles Deleuze and Felix Guattari . The film shows 'Spirit of Rhizome' by 'Art of Rhizome'.

Title: 3D Onara Gorou ga Dance Dance Dance
Spoon
Summary: A boy's spoon falls on the floor when he is having a breakfast. The moment he is trying to pick it up, the boy is thrown into the different world. There he begins the adventure to take his spoon back.

Title: Bird Shit
Summary: A study of birds, through an arrangement of photos of bird shit.

Title: Growlanser IV: Wayfarer of the Time
Joe Higashi vs Big Bear
Summary: A deleted scene from 'Fatal Fury 2: The New Battle' that shows Joe Higashi fighting Big Bear.

Title: Likes/Dislikes
Summary: Japanese and Western citizens talk about what they admire and dislike in their own culture and that of the others.

Title: The Sea of Animals
Summary: One day, 4 animals swam in sea.However, today's sea turned to an unusual journey for them.

Title: OVA ToHeart2: Minna no gakuensai, sasayaka na negai
Chibikuro Sambo to futago no otôto
Nine 2: Koibito Sengen
Summary: Second part of the Nine film trilogy. Things get more complicated, however, when Katsuya starts to fall for Yuri - but their budding romance is interrupted by a few potential rivals. Can Katsuya learn both how to win at baseball and at romance?

Title: Little Friend
Summary: The meerkat of one animal which was taking a nap achieves shocking encounter with the meerkat baby of the missing child who appeared suddenly. However, a baby will carry out to the spare time which looked aside for a while at somewhere... It is brandished by an energyful of a baby, and one day of meerkat is changed completely.

Title: Okawari-Boy Starzan S
Summary: On a planet in a distant galaxy live two tribes, the Senobi and the Robot. The Senobi people dwell in the verdant forests, while the Robot inhabit the hardscrabble desert, but are anxious to leave the area for a more hospitable area to better their lives. The two tribes engage in constant warfare in their border areas. Adding to the strife are the completely alien philosophies of the two tribes - the Senobi love nature and would prefer to live in peace, while the Robot tribe is advanced technically and have gradually become militarized over the years. One young hero, known as Starzan S, tries stop the battles between the two tribes so their peoples can coexist in peace.

Title: Sarukani-gassen saru to kani no gassen
Ranma ½: Tendo Family's Annoying Acquaintances!
Summary: Nabiki narrates where she talks about characters that the Tendo family has had to tolerate but is spliced with new animation, this was available only through the Kitty Animation Circle.

Title: Yu Yu Hakusho: In Next Week's Episode Part 3
Summary: The next episode previews of Yu Yu Hakusho are compiled into this video.

Title: Tenchi Muyô! Ryo-Ohki: Dai-5-ki #03 Banjô-tô e yôkoso
The Bear Dodger
Summary: Morality tale, musical, involving two boys who find themselves being pursued by bears in the forest.

Title: Kodomo no tame no hana to manga
Sanmen-kiji no tsumatachi: Chikan, inran, furin
Alice Gear Aegis: Doki! Actress Darake no Mermaid Grand Prix
Mets Dragon Ball Z Japanese Commercial
Baja's Studio: Baja and the Sea
Summary: The magical girl Coco shows Baja the meekness of the ocean, but things get out of hand when the evil Gii leaves the stormy sea and Ga-chan ends up being carried away by the current.

Title: Ranma ½: Chugoku nekonron daisakusen! Okite ya buri no gekito-hen!! Saiko-teki bamen bideo
Summary: A short preview of the first movie and was only available through the Kitty Animation Circle.

Title: Kintaro's Physical Education Diary
Summary: A young man in a leotard leads a group of animals in a sumo wrestling match. The bear is the final victor of all the animals, but then loses when he must face Kintaro.

Title: The Window
Summary: A night in the life of an apartment building features interesting occurrences, as seen through its lit windows.

Title: Bio-Sensor
Summary: The film's early use of primitive motion capture, using profile and head-on films of a tiger walking.

Title: Little Tiger and Bride
Summary: Tora-chan and Miike are playing while their big sister prepares for her wedding. Just then a letter arrives; it's from Grandfather, who writes that he won't allow the wedding as long as he lives. Bride and groom rush to the church to get married before the old cat can stop them, but his boat has just arrived. Can Tora-chan and Miike keep him distracted long enough for their sister's happy day to go uninterrupted?

Title: Memories Off #5 Togireta Film
Summary: Kawai Haruto belongs to a cinema club to realize his dream to make his own movie. But he is losing his passion of the movie because Hina Yusuke, his best friend as well as a good rival, died suddenly last year. One day, he meets Sendo Mahiro. She asks him to make a movie with her. Also she says that she was at the place where Yusuke died, and that he died because of her. On the other hand, Yusuke's little sister Hina Asuka blames him for killing her brother.

Title: Strange+
Summary: Kou comes to a slum neighborhood in search of his elder brother Takumi and finds him to have become the head of a private detective firm. Kou is drafted by Takumi to do errands and chores in the detective firm, and they come to meet various interesting people.

Title: Kipling Jr.
Summary: HD. Canelo Alvarez and Julio Cesar Chavez Jr. sit down to discuss their highly anticipated May 6 showdown.

Title: Man & Whale
Summary: Past and the present relationship between men and whales through the eyes of an old Japanese man.

Title: Poppo-ya san: Nonki ekicho no maki
Mobile Suit Gundam 00 Special Edition 2: End of World
Eiga Kaiketsu Zorori: Uchuu no yuushatachi
Gekijouban Majesutikku purinsu: Kakusei no idenshi
Tobidasu Puripara: Mînna de mezase! Aidoru guranpuri
Hanoka
Summary: The story takes place on a planet Tokinea where human beings and Star Races have been fighting. The story revolves around a girl who was made as Demon God, an ultimate weapon against human beings, and a boy who is a partner of the girl.

Title: Kaibutsu-kun: Suna Majin wo Yattsukero no Maki/Kaibutsu-kun to Haniwa Kaijin no Maki
The Rose of Versailles: The Rose and Women of Versailles
Tensai Bakabon: Yoru mawari wa kowainoda
Iriya no sora, UFO no natsu: Saigo no michi
ToHeart2ad: Omoide no tsumeato
Summary: Takaaki has recently lost his memory, and the girls do everything possible to help fill in the gaps with more or less pleasant memories while keeping him from remembering what happened. Within this, Tamaki seems to have a specific memory that she holds dear involving a particular letter.

Title: Movements Arising from Different Relationships/Between Regularity and Irregularity 2
Summary: This is the second film in the series, following on from the previous work, 'Between Regularity and Irregularity'. As with the previous film, this work continues to focus on fluctuation in the timing of sounds, changes in timbre, movement of particles, and form. In addition, this film also uses the different movements caused by different relationships between minute units such as structures and cells in mouse brain as living organisms, as well as between particles in non-living matter.

Title: Kindaichi Case Files SP: Legendary Vampire Murders
Summary: Kindaichi and the gang are on their way to a hot spring, but get lost and end up at a run-down and sinister hotel. They are told that a vampire used to live in the hotel way back. Someone even died (was found with bite marks on the neck). Six years ago a girl was found in the cellar with bite marks on her neck, and the villagers killed her. When one of the guests is killed and Miyuki is attacked by a creature with fangs, it would seem like the vampire is still there.

Title: Ane Jiru the animation: Shirakawa san shimai ni omakase - Onêsan ni mo shite hoshii
Summary: For some reason, Shirakawa Yuu has been living with his grandparents, but he is supposed to live with his mother after an interval of more than ten years with her new husband, that is, his step-father. There, his step-sisters, Shirakawa Kyouko, Ryouko and Anzu, who have grown to be very beautiful women, are waiting for him. The sisters welcome him, and let him use the room of their father who is always absent because of his archaeological studies. In the room, he finds a queer jar. It is a cursed jar that will cast upon him the worst of curses unless he collects women's love juices within a limited period of time.

Title: Rasuto eguzairu: Gin'yoku no Famu - Over the Wishes
Pro yakyû wo 10 bai tanoshiku miru hôhô Part 2
Watanuki's House
Summary: VTuber Tokino Sora, Hibiki Ao, and Sarugakuchou Futaba will play as the Watanuki family's three sisters whose parents are passed, living in Koto City, Tokyo. Each episode is based on the various "events" that happen in their daily lives.

Title: Sunflower
Summary: Electricacoustic Video. Sound Experiment Animation.

Title: Tokita Fujio-san to aruku Kaga Noto mukashi banashi no tabi
Table Cloth Given by the North Wind
Muramasa
Summary: A samurai discovers a cursed sword thrust through the heart of a straw man. With this weapon he slays all who oppose him, and many who do not. Men are scythed down as if they were made of straw.

Title: Animated Revue Spring
Summary: A lighthearted anime about spring time. It was originally set to an elementary school song. The film features several vignettes.

Title: Tempura
Summary: Masashi and Takeshi are lost in the woods while looking for their loving dog John. They find John in a cave in the woods, but something is wrong with John.

Title: Little Polar Bear: Shirokuma-kun, fune ni noru
Summary: Little Lars gets caught in a fishing net while swimming in the ocean.

Title: Hatanosuke Takes Down the Inazuma Gang
Summary: Short film where the hero Hatanosuke battles with an evil gang of thieves.

Title: Ninjutsu Hinotama kozo: Kamishibai no maki
Gulliver's Great Activities
Summary: A retelling of part of the Gulliver's Travels adventures.

Title: Lion Nanny's Journey
Summary: Lion Nanny rides the train and embarks on a life journey while interacting with those around it.

Title: Dr. Slump: Hero Legend of Penguin Village
Doging Donsessmao Nobubu Round and Round
Sleeping Man
Summary: Yoshio is an ordinary man with an ordinary family living in Tokyo. One day, out of blue he starts living as a 'sleeping man'. With everything else perfectly functioning in his body, he can no longer stay awake. This is a story of his family battling and embracing this dysfunction and more.

Title: Mon-Soni! D'Artagnan no Idol Sengen
Summary: When D'Artagnan went to Tokyo for a little fun, she spotted an unforgettable sight: Lucifer singing while basking in moonlight in a park. From that moment, no matter if she was asleep or awake, D'Artagnan's heart would not stop throbbing for some reason. One day, D'Artagnan sees a concert by the popular idol act Angely Diva at her friend Izumo's invitation. There, she resolved to follow her idol dreams, and the story of song and miracles begins.

Title: Strawberry 100% OAV
Summary: Further continuation from

Title: Selfie with Tokyo
Summary: Japan welcomed a record 24 million visitors in 2016, with Tokyo remaining the most popular destination for national and international travelers. SELFIE WITH TOKYO celebrates one of the world's leading cities, its many tourists, and the richness of Japanese culture enjoyed by all who visit. This stylishly playful animation perfectly captures the excitement and energy of exploring a new city, and its highly-detailed sets reward multiple viewings. SELFIE WITH TOKYO was created in the Summer of 2015 and was commissioned by TBS (Tokyo Broadcasting System) for public screenings to celebrate their 60th anniversary.

Title: The Little Prince
Summary: The Little Prince lives on Asteroid B612, a tiny rock floating in space. He spends his days cleaning out the three small volcanoes on the asteroid (which he also uses to cook his breakfast) weeding out the baobob trees that threaten to take over, and caring for his friend the Rose Girl. When he gets lonely for company he catches a comet in his butterfly net and flies off to Earth for all sorts of adventures.

Title: Tomato Babies
Summary: Within one minute, androgynous creatures hatch from a group of frisky, ripe tomatoes and scamper across the tabletop to a score of accordion music. They engage in a hilarious romp with some menacing peas in the shadow of a fruit basket, harass the family cat, and ultimately all reach an unpleasant end.

Title: The Researcher's Search
Summary: Buildings, black crows, a flood of bar codes, clone-looking businessmen, shopping-addicted ladies...these images which probably symbolizes excessive, standardized and overcrowded modern cities are condensed in this animation. Various techniques, like modified photo, drawing animation, 3D object and permeating lighting are combined onto a multi-planed (line drawing) stand, with a challenge to express a unique sense of unity and compression.

Title: Jump Out and Squeak! Pui Pui Molcar
Summary: This work is an original animation using the technique of stop motion. In the world where guinea pigs became cars - the "Molcars" made of wool felt move around expressively. The sound of Molcars are taken from an actual guinea pig, and live actors appear using pixilation technique. This is an animation full of guinea pigs with healing, friendship, adventure, and crazy action around various situations unique to cars.

Title: Strike Witches: 501 Butai Hasshin Shimasu! Movie
Pieces
Summary: A series of nine flipbook-like vignettes showcasing simple revelations of movement and color. Koji Yamamura's animation refers back to the phenakistoscope, one of the earliest mechanisms used to make drawings move.

Title: ToHeart2 Danjon toraberâzu: Saiaku no saiyaku
Natural History
Summary: In this short several painted figures are superimposed.

Title: Saiko ama Gobarian
Summary: An alien metaphysician/mech designer and defector of the Garadian Empire trains multiple psychic youths to use their talents against the oncoming Garadian invasion of Earth.

Title: Motto! Majime ni fumaji me ka iketsu zorori
Cherry Blossom: Spring Fantasy
Summary: A visually artistic animation with no real story. It follows a pair of butterflies as they drift past various beautiful depictions of people and animals.

Title: Meitantei Konan: Machitanken! Doubutsu mâku o gettoseyo!
Odoru Kizuna Akari BB sozai + shiyourei
Kiss Me on the Apple of My Eye
Summary: Ibuki Morisato's dream of kissing a prince turned into reality when her dream prince appeared as the new transfer student?.

Title: The Sparrows' Lodge
Summary: A short morality/folktale film about an old couple that learn the virtue of not being greedy.

Title: Fantomu obu kiru: Zero kara no hangyaku
Taro's Early Training Days
Summary: The hero Taro attempts to rescue a kidnapped girl from a bandit. Short film from 1936.

Title: Flowers
Summary: Two distinct people have their lives entwined by fate.

Title: Serenade
Summary: One night, Mr. K Went goes out for a walk with his pet.

Title: Buonomo - Bustaman
Summary: Animation made with pasta about an ugly young woman who wants to change her face.

Title: Kimagure Orange Road: Soushuuhen Tanabata Special
Summary: Tanabata is approaching but Kyousuke, being his usual indecisive self, is unable to invite Madoka to a concert and later gets beaten up after making Hikaru cry. In a hospital room Madoka approaches a sleeping Kyousuke, and then.

Title: Spirit of Wonder: Miss China's Shrinking
Our Baseball Match
Summary: Tanuki (raccoon dogs) and rabbits play baseball.

Title: Tokyo = Fukushima
Summary: Tokyo Fukushima is a time lapse, stop frame animation film of the city of Tokyo, six months after the nuclear meltdown at Fukushima. The film depicts Tokyo as throbbing with life and electricity despite the crisis and constant radioactive threat. Recorded over a two month period, using a Bolex Super 16mm wind up camera on the streets of Tokyo, the film acts as a love letter to an anxious friend. The city is trying to return to normal, although paranoia and anxiety are found everywhere due to minor earthquakes and aftershocks and government untruths. This beautiful and dark film is propelled by electronic music recorded by the filmmaker in Tokyo.

Title: Konigiri-Kun Shopping
Summary: When captured by fashionable and new things, and it seems like you are about to lose sight of yourself, stop and think a little. Consider what it is that can help you regain control of yourself. You will definitely find it very close to you. I want to convey that thought to children with this work.

Title: Karaena
Summary: Filmed using a combination of live action and stop-motion puppetry. A young man sits alone in his apartment watching television and taking care of his bonsai plant. Two neighbor children come in and persuade him to eat one of the fruits from the tiny tree. The fruit causes him to have a series of bizzare hallucinations, from which he wakes up to find his precious plant missing.

Title: Polar Bear Bears Boredom
Summary: A polar bear interacts with their neighboring species in this beautifully animated short. The sea dwelling characters explore their environment and ecosystem throughout a day. Encountering both the delights and challenges of underwater life, this film will take you through a vivid, lively environment that is usually hidden to humans. At the end of the day, boredom is a matter of perspective.

Title: Anna, Kidnapper
Summary: 196X. Anna, an enigmatic and attractive professional kidnapper, abducts The Professor during his wedding ceremony on request from one of the latter's former girlfriend. This woman, whose face Anna has never seen, wishes to die with The Professor before he marries. Leaving the church with The Professor on the back seat of her motor-bike, Anna starts on the journey to the fictional city of Alpha Paris.

Title: River of Art
Summary: This film follows the journey 96 year-old artist Liu Yu. After losing his wife he decides to go back to his hometown in China with his daughter. Liu Yu was born in China in 1918 and moved to Japan in his 20's to study art. He returned back to China during World War II and eventually left China moving to Taiwan. During Taiwan's white terror era he was arrested and endured many hardships. After his release, Liu kept a very low profile. But all these time he uses his art to document the history, the life of people, the places he traveled to as well as an expression of his pain and sorrow. We follow Liu and his daughter through his amazing life's journey, getting to see how his sketches, 8 mm films, water color and oil paintings come to life.

Title: 7th Dragon III: Code: VFD
Summary: In the year 2100, dragons have descended upon earth and humanity is at the mercy of these terrifying beasts. However, not all is lost. As the protagonist, the player will team up with Nodens Enterprises-a video game company dedicated to stopping the dragon menace-to become a dragon hunter and eventual savior of the universe. Although times are bleak, Nodens Enterprises has found a way to tip the scales in favor of mankind: By traveling through time to three different eras, the protagonist can upset the balance of the dragons' power. This will give them the edge to defeat the True Dragons, and stand a chance against the most powerful one of them all... the 7th Dragon: VFD.

Title: Takoyaki Story
Summary: Always attracted to takoyaki-octopus balls, a famous Japanese street food-a girl tries them for the first time and becomes addicted.

Title: 1nd Class Soldier Norakuro
Summary: Norakuro gets into more trouble.

Title: Monster Strike: Rain of Memories
Summary: Follows Ren on his vacation in Okinawa. There, he meets a mysterious girl.

Title: Canary
Summary: Mika wants her band to perform at the upcoming festival. However, her keyboard player quits and the mayor threatens to take their stage away. Will she be able to fix things before the festival starts?

Title: Senko 8
Stars: Dio Senko,Yojuani Guillaume,Zack Ben Adj,Ryan Kuni

Title: The Quack Infantry Troop
Summary: Ducks get into a conflict with frogs and start a war.

Title: Chiruran 1/2
Summary: Unlike the historical Shinsengumi, whose daily lives were filled with blade, blood, and betrayal, lives of Shinsengumi members here are always funny and laid-back.

Title: To Heel
Summary: A young student, an office lady, a hostess, and an old woman each pursues their secret fantasies and desires in this ambitiously symbolic animation produced in 3D space with hand-drawn sketches.

Title: Harvest Festival
Summary: A few minutes long black and white anime which shows the traditional Japanese harvest festival, featuring a song by Eiko Hirai.

Title: Junjô shimai! Perfect: Chiibô to mark
Karma
Summary: Experimental animation by Nobuhiro Aihara.

Title: On Time
Summary: Japanese trains. Non-places. An intense travel experience through time and space. From Matsuo Basho's haikus to images of a vanishing world created by Hokusai in Manga catalogues.

Title: One Piece Pilot 2
Summary: The second of three One Piece English dub pilots that was adapted to get One Piece adapted in the USA. This was dubbed by the Blue Water Studios in Calgary, Alberta, Canada.

Title: The Siamese: First Mission
Summary: June and Naomi, by day they're Radio DJs, by night they're the crime fighting Siamese Cats.

Title: Karo & Piyobupt: The Sandwiches
Summary: It was a wonderful day. At the kitchen, Karo and Piyobupt were making sandwiches. Yes, they were going on a picnic. When you eat sandwiches on the beautiful green field, how delicious they are and how much you eat them.

Title: My Milk Cup Cow
Summary: The father tells his daughter Nunu a lie that there is a cow in her milk cup. She believes it and drinks up milk, but there isn't any cow. Her father tells her a variety of lies, which Nunu finds increasingly difficult to believe.

Title: The Tale of Japanese Envoys to Tang Dynasty China
Heren to tomo ni: Anî Sariban
Minky Momo: Please, Santa Claus?
Summary: Minky Momo (Gigi) uses her magical powers to help a little boy named Billy believe in Santa Claus.

Title: Decorations
Summary: A quaint kitchen in a house tucked away in the outskirts of the city. Amidst preparations for a banquet, the birth of a new life brings turmoil and change. And then, she heads off on her own journey. Those who send her off recall the day they embarked on their own journeys, just like her. Birth, growth and departure. Repeated cycle of life story is now told as a fantasy in the world of creams and cakes. By using creamy materials, seemingly unsuitable for animations, I aimed to realize the animation with a fresh touch. I hope this story would bring back your sweet memories from old days and you could find your own story of growth and departure overlapped with it.

Title: Mahoutsukai Tai! vs. Shamanic Princess
Summary: A parody-esque epilogue to both Shamanic Princess and Mahou Tsukai Tai!. As a marketing ploy back when Shamanic Princess was first released, buyers who purchased all six first edition LD's of both Shamanic Princess and Magic User's Club, and sent in their proof of purchases before a deadline received a special OVA entitled Shamanic Princess vs. Magic User's Club. It was never sold in stores and was a special omake by the series' creators to the fans. The OVA contains an epilogue to both series, which is fitting considering they both came out at the same time.

Title: Mori no gohiki no dobutsu tachi
Left O'Clock
Summary: A young man sets out on a motorbike to find his own way in life.

Title: Proverb Dictionary: He Who Shoots Often, Hits at Last
Fight! Spirit of the Sword
Summary: A normal high school student named Hikura Yonosuke finds out that he has to protect the harmony between Heaven and Earth with his sword, the mighty Chitentai and his friend Inbe Tsukinojo; he seeks to battle the evil demons,

Title: One Piece Pilot 3
Summary: The third of three One Piece English dub pilots that was adapted to get One Piece adapted in the USA. This was dubbed by FUNimation Productions.

Title: Fun History of Civilization: Iron Story
Musou Kakyou: A Summer Day's Dream: Story 2.5
Gô-chan: Moco to kôri no ue no yakusoku
Oishinbo: Kyûkyoku tai shikô chôju ryôri taiketsu!!
Seito shokun! Kokoro no midori no nekkachîfu wo
Dai mahô tôge: Iyân kawaii! Futago no umareru kakujitsu wa 120 bun no 1 tte shitteru? no maki
Nê, chan to shiyôyo!: Nê chan ni un to amaetene no maki
Tsuri baka erika san: Sukai gâruzu dainamaito fisshingu - Isô kessen mejina zuri
Getter Robo
Summary: From deep within the Earth's surface, the Dinosaur Kingdom make their move to wipe out mankind and conquer the planet with their mechanical dinosaurs. After a prototype Getter Robo is shot down by a mechanical dinosaur, the Saotome Research Institute decides to use the real Getter Robo, which is combat-capable. Due to a lack of pilots in the institute, Ryo Nagare goes to his college to persuade martial artist Musashi Tomoe and outcast Hayato Jin to join him and pilot the Getter Machines to combat the new threat and protect mankind.

Title: Yôkai gadan
Summary: These are a collection of animated shorts based on Shigeru Mizuki's illustrations. Each short focuses on a Yokai, a type of Japanese spirit. The shorts range in length from about one to four minutes. They have been categorized based on what order they appear in, and what Yokai is being discussed. Episodes 1 and 15 do not focus on a Yokai, and instead features dialogue and an appearance from Shigeru Mizuki himself.

Title: The Golden Flower
Summary: A young man has a strange adventure on a hill as he returns from the village festival where he has performed as an actor: a giant snake frightens villagers, but the farmer finds out that the monster is vulnerable to nicotine. He achieved convincing other neighbors to the attack and end with her. In the mountains he will find a Buddha who will beg help and thanks to which he will become rich.

Title: Dai mahô tôge: Sanka suru koto ni igi ga aru nante nurui koto omotterun ja naideshône no maki
Rurouni Kenshin: Meiji Kenkaku Romantan Summer Special
Yu Yu Hakusho: In Next Week's Episode Part 2
Summary: The next episode previews of Yu Yu Hakusho are compiled into this video.

Title: Tsuri baka erika san: Sukai gâruzu dainamaito fisshingu - Gekitô! Ayu tsuri taikai
Tottoko Hamutaro: Anime dechu!
Summary: Hamtaro is a hamster living together with Natsumi-chan, and having some exciting adventures with a group of many other hamsters.

Title: Angel Sanctuary: Special Video Set
Summary: A behind the scenes look at the making of the Japanese version of the anime OVA, 'Angel Sanctuary'.

Title: LaLaLa, Brother
Summary: The way the everyday and the extraordinary constantly change in the environment around us and within ourselves.

Title: Mattsu, Yamma and Moburi - The Naval Treasure and Riddle Island
Takushî doraibâ Gion Tarou the Movie
Crazy for It
Summary: Short drawn colour animation film, with rock music style sound track

Title: Gekijouban Puripara: Mînna de kagayake! Kirarin sutâ raibu!
My Life
Summary: A high school girl, while pondering her future, sees it flash before her eyes.

Title: Retro Future
Summary: The world of the future that I have imagined in childhood, different from the world of the future to visit now.

Title: Mori no densetsu: Dai ni gakushô
Summary: Sequel of Mori no Densetsu, created from Tezuka Osamu's notes.

Title: Monster Hunter Diary: Felyne Village
Summary: Nyaito lives in a village where Felynes are very happy. He aids in the development of the Village by gathering Special Mushrooms, fishing Goldenfish, and carrying Rathian's egg. The various quests become more challenging everyday. His village companions Leader, Nyami, Pakase, and Puni have all suddenly turned to him for help - Can Nyaito overcome each visit and clear their urgent quests!?

Title: Kuma to Usagi no Daibouken
Summary: Best friends,,but the poor Bear and the Rabbit went on a picnic today as usual. However, today's picnic turned to an unusual journey for them.

Title: Massara
Summary: An original animated short film was inspired by the song "Massara" by Kiyoe Yoshioka, the vocalist of the band Ikimono Gakari.

Title: Possible World
Summary: Guided by a "voice", a young man avoids multiple disasters on his way to realizing his dreams. But is this all about fate, or is something more sinister taking control?

Title: The Fantastic Elevator
Summary: On a Sunday, a girl went to the Department Store for shopping. There was something very surprising at that time.

Title: Dr. Slump and Arale-chan: The Great Round-the-World Race
Meitantei Konan: Nazo no suisei kaijuu o oe!
Bleach Colorful!: Gotei Juusan Yatai Daisakusen!
Dr. Slump and Arale-chan: Hoyoyo!! Follow the Rescued Shark...
Summary: Arale and her family visit the Underwater Kingdom after she saves a baby shark.

Title: Robotech: The Inside Story
Summary: Industry insider and animation fan

Title: Fate/Grand Order: Himuro no Tenchi - 7-nin no Saikyô Ijin-hen
Summary: The source material follows three girls - Kaede Makidera, Kane Himuro, and Yukika Saegusa - at Homurahara Academy, but has nothing to do with the efforts to restore the Human Order.

Title: The iDOLM@STER SideM: Wake atte mini! - Shoshi kantetsu daisouji!
Space Yokai War
Summary: Early "gekimation" by Japanese filmmaker Ujicha.

Title: Friends
Summary: LA, a shy musical note will little by little meet other musical notes and discover that singing with friends extends the melody. He will discover also the sharp, the octaves and the chords.

Title: 1000 Pine Groves
Summary: After suffering severe floods in 1753, the people of Senbon Matsubara in Shizuoka cooperate on flood prevention around the Kiso, Nagara, and Yuhi rivers. The people of Satsuma (Kumamoto Prefecture) endure great hardships after being forced to undertake the work by the central government, a subtle indication of the bad feeling that would foment into open rebellion the following century.

Title: Ziggy: Soreyuke! R&R Band
Summary: Japanese rock band Ziggy comes to London and gets attacked upon arrival at the hotel after a recording session. The musicians barely escape the attack; however, soon they learn that their producer has been murdered, and they are the suspects. Chased by police and some mysterious organization, they find shelter at a local rockers' place and even give a performance there; but it is not too long before their pursuers appear again.

Title: Komaneko no orusuban
Summary: A fine day. Ojii leaves Koma alone at home. While Ojii is worried, Koma is a little excited, wondering if Ojii will be happy if she behaves nicely. In time, it begins to rain and thunder. And finally the light goes out. Koma, scared, shivers and something is behind her...! Can Koma go through this situation?

Title: White Home Town
Summary: One shows dedication while the other relies on dedication. All life forms survive this way. With delicate sensibility, this stop motion animation tells a story about a lamp that offers unconditional love and a wolf that refuses to accept it.

Title: Metamorphous: Mountains and Streams: Ms. Yamakawa Keiko Never Looks Back
Summary: We sometimes long for the landscape of the past which was much purer and much more beautiful than that of the present. Regardless of these nostalgic feelings, the natural landscape is continuously changing as if in constant flux, with a will almost of its own. The landscape, the mountains and streams, never remains the same or returns to as it was before. Through a series of several thousand pencil drawings, this work abstractly depicts this theme of the metamorphical nature of the landscape.

Title: Zoku Zou no Senaka: Baton Touch
Eien no Aseria: Ugoki dashita shukumei
The Monkey's Big Catch
Summary: A monkey gets into a lot of trouble with the king fish and its henchmen.

Title: Comic Party Special
Summary: A series of short 'omake' Easter egg special episodes.

Title: Talking About Amy
Summary: An animated short about a Japanese pop-artist Emi Iijima.

Title: Inari, Konkon, Koi Iroha. Inari, konkon, semi shigure.
Ging
Summary: Ging came this city 3 years ago. Everybody loves cute Ging in a small cage. But one day Ging became too big and the people had no choice to make a tough decision.

Title: Ya-Ne-Sen a Go Go
Summary: Shishi Yamazaki dances through the Yanaka, Nezu, and Sendagi areas of Taitou, Tokyo.

Title: Santa's Mountain Fairy Forest
Summary: This is a delightful and heartwarming story about Santa Claus and and the Tonto (fairies) that help him.

Title: Young Eleven
Summary: A boy from the farm with amazing running speed is asked to join a newly formed national soccer team and discovers a natural talent for the game. The movie is inspired by Japan's hosting of the 1979 FIFA World Youth Championship.

Title: Tensai Bakabon: Wakare wa tsuraimono nanoda
Sekai Meisaku Gekijou Kanketsu Ban: Daisougen no Chiisana Tenshi Bush Baby Part 1
Drifting Cloud
Summary: The lost cloud wanders in the sky while repeatedly meeting and parting.

Title: Ultraman Super Fighter Legend
Summary: From the north of the galaxy a dreadful menace, Comet Warrior God Tsuifon, is fast approaching the Earth destroying everything in its path. There awaits it Fighter Ultraman, the legendary defender of the planet, and a deadly battle is about to begin.

Title: Shashinkan
Summary: The story takes place before WWII at a photo studio on top of a hill. Many people visit this studio to have their photos taken. One day, a couple comes, but the wife is so shy that she always lowers her head. The owner of the studio tries all kinds of tricks to get her to smile and eventually succeeds. One year later, the couple comes again, but this time they bring their daughter along. She always looks grumpy, and again, the owner has to try everything to get her to smile. Thus starts a long-running relationship between the girl and the owner, and time passes to years and then decades.

Title: Harbor Tale
Summary: In the Harbor town 'Y', The old red brick-built building which is in a corner of the town has watched the changing times of the harbor and people's lives for above hundred years. A red brick who is a piece of the building has seen 'the glittering square thing' from there. It has been in his mind. One day, he gets out of the building wall and begins to walk. After walking, he finds it a sea. And then, he is given some encounters.

Title: Kumo no ito
Summary: Based on a short story by Akutagawa Ryunosuke, Ofuji's 10-minute silhouette animation depicts scenes in Hell, and a tortured soul seeking redemption. When Buddha offers him the chance to escape by climbing up a spider's web, the sinner attempts to do so.

Title: Kachi Kachi Mountain
Summary: Based on a Japanese folktale, Kachi Kachi Mountain is a very cruel story about a mischievous raccoon who tricks a farmer into eating his wife, and a rabbit intent on punishing the raccoon for his evil deeds. Although the tale of Kachi Kachi Mountain is well-known throughout Japan, not many people know the original story. Due to the cruel nature of the characters, many variations have transformed Kachi Kachi Mountain into softer, moral tale. This retelling stays as close to the original story as possible in an effort to preserve the true value and power of this folktale for future generations.

Title: Sû kyatto
Summary: After an accident, the amnesiac Sue was taken in to live with Torao's family. She always had the urge to become a singer, but didn't know why. As it turns out, Sue is actually part of a band formed with her two twin sisters. But Sue's climb to the top of the charts is a long and hard way.

Title: First Kiss Story
Summary: Moments before her upperclassman, Yoshihiko, left for college, Kana Orikura finally built up the courage to confess her love to him. Sharing their first kiss, the two decided to enter a relationship-a dream come true for Kana. Since that first moment, however, Kana and Yoshihiko have struggled with their relationship, resulting in Kana feeling lonely and depressed. But things take an unexpected turn when Shougo Hayakawa-the young and attractive teacher assigned to Kana's class-starts living in her house. Will Kana betray Yoshihiko for this new contender, or remain loyal to the man who took her first kiss?

Title: High School Jingi
Summary: The impulsive Yakuza Jouji was ordered by his boss to teach at a misfit-filled school. He now has to settle the score with a fated rival while falling head over heels for a colleague in the process. The impulsive Yakuza Jouji was ordered by his boss to teach at a misfit-filled school. He now has to settle the score with a fated rival while falling head over heels for a colleague in the process.

Title: Flowers Will Bloom
Summary: A short film made in remembrance of the 2 year anniversary of the 2011 Tohoku earthquake and tsunami as part of the ongoing relief effort.

Title: Daft Punk: Harder Better Faster Stronger
Summary: Music video for "Harder Better Faster Stronger" by Daft Punk.

Title: A Gum Boy
Summary: The primary schoolboy "Kuchao" is hated person in his class. Everyone fly balloons, but he can't get it, so he will try to use his imagination to achieve it.

Title: Home!
Summary: In the year 2124, an astronaut on a Mars research expedition stumbles upon the wreck of a commercial vessel that went missing three years ago and finds a paranormal discovery.

Title: Sougiya to Inu
Summary: A horror take on the classic tale of Snow White.

Title: The Rule of Dreams
Summary: A spirit drifting after death.

Title: Senko 9: Senko's New Gen
Stars: Yojuani Guillaume,Junko Lu King,Zack Ben Adj,So Lono

Title: The Boy and the Whore
Summary: A boy meets a lady who has come from the future on the spaceship. They fall in love with each other and find out a new history is about to begin.

Title: Dai mahô tôge: Dokkiri Burekku fâsuto dai sakusen!? Nakanunara koroshiteshimae hototogisu san!! no maki
Little Jumbo
Summary: Adrift at sea a boy and his pet white elephant, Jumbo, wash up on an island that is between two other islands at war with one another in this musical fantasy film.

Title: Bakuon!! no Kobeya
Summary: Short specials included with the

Title: Ninja & Soldier
Summary: A child soldier and a child ninja are talking about a difference.

Title: Yu-Gi-Oh!: Volume 1, Volume 2 and Volume 3 Japanese DVD Commercial
Ikenai Boy: Ikasu Maruhi Hand Power
Eiga Ojarumaru: Yakusoku no natsu Ojaru to Semira
Dark fairy tale
Summary: Famous fairy tales get transformed into lurid and chilling ghost stories.

Title: Kubikiri Cycle: Aoiro Savant to Zaregoto Tsukai - Vol 4
Summary: Are geniuses above the law? Can they solve the mystery? And would you, even for a moment, let yourself be killed? Such are the confronting questions of fourth part of Kubikiri Cycle.

Title: KodoTsura
Summary: Watabe and Nokishita are ordinary elementary school students who live in Sapporo, Hokkaido, Japan, around 1990. This work is a comedy animation that introduces Japan's Heisei era child culture with fiction. Nostalgic boy culture around 1990, such as video games and sweets with extra stickers, which became very popular in Japan.

Title: Man-Eater Mountain 'Hitokui Yama '
Summary: Inspector Haido and his fellows came to visit a mountain for the on-the-spot inspection of a serial killing. However, they do not know that the mountain was a site of a bloody inferno and is called 'HITOKUI YAMA.' As Haido meets Haruko in the village at the bottom of the mountain, his heartless mind gradually warms up for her. The director creates this movie as a picture-card show, and he is also acting as a narrator for the movie.

Title: Manga Girls
Summary: This is a story of when I liked to draw manga alone. I would always draw manga by myself at school, but then someone started to follow me. "Am I being stalked?!" To run away from them, I hid in a random car trunk. "Okay, they can't find me here." But as soon as I thought of that, the trunk closed, and I got locked in. My phone was dead too. What do I do?.

Title: Chatting with Creatures
Summary: Fifteen-year-old Chacha is a typical teen with an atypical talent: she can communicate with cats. Though her friend Mito thinks this is the coolest ability in the world, Chacha finds her unique skill to be annoying at best and disruptive at worst. Whether she's dealing with countless strays proposing marriage, neighborhood cats offering to help her with tests or waking up to 'presents' on her bed in the night, Chacha's normal school life will be anything but.

Title: What's Michael
Summary: A fat orange cat gets into trouble.

Title: Meitantei Konan: Necchuushou no nazo o toke!
Kyô kara maô! R: Eikô wa dare ga tame ni
Kyoiku otogi manga: Usagi to kame
Summary: A retelling of the classic Aesop Fable, The Tortoise and the Hare.

Title: Little Polar Bear: Shirokuma-kun, Doko e?
Summary: Little Lars gets separated from his father and ends up on an island in Africa.

Title: Akane-chan no Wasuremono
Summary: Forgetting her recorder at school, Akane returns alone. What awaits her there?

Title: Taka no tsume Go: Utsukushiki erîeru shoushuu purasu
The Man with the Chocolate Gun
Summary: Secret Agent 007 (voiced by 8-year-old Dylan) must team up with American female CIA agent Wyldstyle to stop the diabolical Dr. Diarrhea, who's destroying the world's supply of chocolate.

Title: Heavy Metal L-Gaim I: Pentagona Window + Lady Gavlet
Minky Momo: UFO Comes to Visit
Summary: Magical girl Minky Momo (known on Earth as Gigi), meets a boy named Tony who claims to have seen a flying saucer.

Title: Super Famicom Perfect Video
Summary: Promotional video for Famicom video games coming out in Japan 1990.

Title: Why Is the Sea Water Salty?
Summary: When a poor, yet honest, man rescues an old man who has fallen off a log bridge, the little people of the forest give him a "Mortar of Treasures" that will grant any item that a person desires. The man uses the mortar to become the richest person in the village. But the man's greedy brother steals the mortar and, determined to enjoy all the luxuries by himself, climbs into a rowing boat and heads for an isolated island. On the way, however, he asks for salt from the mortar, but then cannot figure out how to stop it. Finally, the boat sinks under the weight of all the salt, and the mortar sinks to the bottom of the sea where it is pouring out salt to this day.

Title: Gals Panic S2
Summary: The objective is to uncover the silhouette portion of background with a marker until at least 80% of the silhouette is uncovered.
