When capturing background, only the enclosed area without the stage boss is uncovered, so it is possible to capture 100% of silhouette without capturing the entire background, by limiting boss's movement to an area without silhouette.

Title: The Story That Might Be a Dream
Summary: A grandfather comes out of the house and gets involved in an accident. He meets a frog in the dark and floats through the window. What unfold are various moments in his memory; his daughter's wedding, the day she entered school, her birth, and more. A nostalgic animation about the precious moments in life flashing by.

Title: High School! Kimengumi
Summary: Three additional adventures for the Kimengumi and friends. In the first episode, the boys fail their exams right before summer vacation and have to take supplementary lessons. The second episode is a mandatory school trip to the beach during summer vacation for a swimming competition. In the third episode school is back in session, the karate club is in danger when a new opponent appears.

Title: Mahô shôjo neko Taruto
Summary: Taruto is a little cat who has just moved to a new city with her master's family. Taruto spends her days making friends and trying to help people with her rather unpredictable magic. And it turns out that Taruto just might be a legendary magical princess! But if she has to go back to her kingdom how will she ever be able to leave her beloved friends and master?

Title: Yûwaku
Summary: From famed adult comic artist Hiroyuki Utatane come six of the most erotic, the most exotic, the most unusual and just downright odd stories ever animated. In "Alimony Hunter" we see Jun in an extremely unusual three-for-all in which not everyone is what he (or she) seems. She also makes an appearance as a teacher in "Cherry Lips" (under an alias). It all comes to conclusion in "Virgin Road", there perhaps too-willing bride is having a last minute fling with her in the back room of the chapel; the groom is also not a stranger to Jun... Then there's a manly knight who discovers the joys of bondage at the hands of a fair maiden; and a samurai policewoman forced to tackle a giant walking statue, controlled by a sex-crazed megalomaniac, before it destroys Tokyo. "Crimson" is a bloody story of a man and his blind love slave.

Title: My Dread Is School!, School Is Dreadful!
Summary: Bukida is disliked by all the students in his class because of his unpleasant face. However, he loves a girl named Matsuko and so he stalks her. Though Matsuko rejects him, Bukida fancies she likes him at heart. One day, Bukida is killed in a traffic accident. Matsuko feels relieved. But Bukida appeared to her as the living dead. Bukida says, "I love you forever, even though I am dead!".

Title: Dagram VS Round-Facer
Summary: Flying Dougram battles in space. The story is centered around a small group of guerrilla freedom fighters on a colonial planet named Deployer, who are known as the "Deployer 7", or "Sun Fang" team. In an unexpected coup, the elected Governor of Deployer becomes dictator and rules Deployer under martial law with the support of Earth's Federation. Fighting for independence from Earth's Federation influence, the freedom fighters begin a rebellion against the Federation's Combat Armors using a Combat Armor of their own: the Dougram.

Title: PES: Drive your Love
Summary: An original animation short film created by STUDIO4C in collaboration with TOYOTA. Cutting-edge production techniques of STUDIO4C, which have been a global recognition, blends with world-class advanced car technologies of TOYOTA to make it possible that all cars appear in the story to be 3D-CG models made of actual car-design data. The alien Pes and NaSuBi land on Earth. A romantic-comedy between Pes and a human girl unfolds while NaSuBi are moved and inspired by technologies and hospitality on Earth. Through aliens' point of view, the film brings a realization of joys of connecting with people, the value of safety we take for granted, and small bits of happiness we don't notice in everyday life to the audience. The world is blight and filled with rush of excitement.

Title: Pocket Monsters: Gym Battle Complete Pack
Summary: A clip video showing scenes from the Pocket Monsters Gym battles.

Title: Kiddy Grade: Ignition
Summary: A retelling of episodes 1-11 of the Kiddy Grade TV series.

Title: Dreamland
Summary: Dreamland will never be completed. It will continue to grow as long as there is imagination left in the world.

Title: In the Big Yard Inside the Teeny-Weeny Pocket
Dynamic Venus
Summary: The mysterious super heroine Dynamic Venus. She is a housewife, receives the violence of her husband every day, but her real nature was an alien.

Title: The Great Rabbit
Summary: If you believe in the Rabbit, it means that you will believe anything. If you don't believe in the Rabbit, it means that you would not believe anything.

Title: Weiss Survive
Summary: Teenage boy Takeshi and girl Michi get lost in the Card Battle world and have to win card battles to return home.

Title: Melan & Chory
Summary: A boy sees a sad girl during his walk and tries to approach her, although she ignores him, he does not lose hope of cheering her.

Title: Cosmos Pink Shock
Summary: Micchi thrusts though space on her spacecraft Pink Shock, hoping to be reunited with her long lost lover.

Title: Locke the Superman
Summary: The original Locke the Superman Pilot film animated in 1979.

Title: Matsugae o musubi
Summary: A young girl weaves her way through time in remembrance of her twin sister. A snow globe and the Rabbit-man help her along the way.

Title: The Monkey Fleet
Summary: Very short movie from 1936 about a war between monkeys and Octopuses.

Title: Kuro Kumo
Summary: A woman is haunted by dreams of a samurai that she thinks is from her past life.

Title: Swim, Monkey, Swim!
Summary: The animals are having a swimming contest. The strutting Saru-kun, a monkey, can't bring himself to admit that he cannot swim, and puts himself forward as a contestant. He dives right in, but immediately starts to sink. For some reason the bottom of the pool is littered with seaweed and coral, and a kappa, a type of water imp, also lives down there. Saru-kun fights with the kappa, and manages to seize the saucer off its head. The kappa agrees to let Saru-kun ride on his back while he swims, in exchange for the return of his saucer. Saru-kun then cruises right through the pool, looking for all the world like he is swimming under his own power, and wins the race successfully. But what happens in the end?

Title: Prism Magical: Prism Generations!
Summary: There is a small town on the sea. Raika just enjoys his school life with Ibuki, his old friend, and Yuri, his maid. However, his father is actually a magical girl (?). Also, a group of magical girls come to his school to look for a treasure stone called Mana Prism. Though he doesn't want to wear a girl's costume, he is forced to be a magical girl as well. "Come back, my peaceful life!" To save his school, his battle against the magical girls starts now.

Title: .hack//G.U. Returner
Summary: The characters from previous .hack//G.U. Games and .hack//Roots receive an email from Ovan. He is requesting them to go to Hidden Forbidden Festival where is set up a mysterious summer festival. There they find an AIDA Chim Chim who wishes to peacefully co-exist with the other players of The World. It then transforms into the word "Returner", so they assume it to mean that Ovan will return to The World.

Title: Kubikiri Cycle: Aoiro Savant to Zaregoto Tsukai - Vol 3
Summary: The significance of beheading a genius is obvious. It is to take away that genius, to level them down to the ordinary, to reduce them to the same dust we are all made of. Choosing this method of murder sends a message. The Beheading Cycle has begun in earnest.

Title: Tokimeki Fushigi Diary: Ultra Maniac
Summary: Ayu Tateishi is a popular second-year student at her middle school admired for being calm, cool, and collected. But this carefully preserved image was all crafted to catch the eye of her crush Tetsushi Kaji, who once complimented her for those qualities. Studying, playing tennis, and finding chances to speak with Tetsushi are all that are on Ayu's mind-until the day she finds a mini-computer underneath a bench. After returning the item to Nina Sakura, a girl who was searching for a lost item earlier, Ayu is chosen by Nina as a confidante for her secret. When the school's two tennis teams have a dispute regarding use of the courts, Ayu is forced to settle the matter by playing against Hiroki Tsujiai, the captain of the boys' team and Tetsushi's best friend. While dreading the prospect of losing and embarrassing herself, Ayu is approached by Nina, who is revealed to be a witch who came to Earth after failing to graduate from the Magic Kingdom's middle school. Wanting to help Ayu win the match, Nina imbues a piece of chocolate with a spell that just might come in handy.

Title: Good Night
Summary: For these twin boys, a little sibling rivalry is an everyday occurrence. And no matter how minor the infraction, as far as they're concerned, each quibble is like an act of war. It's easy to imagine that for them, every single day is as thrilling as an action movie, playing out in their heads. They're fighting with all they've got... and even in dreams, the battle rages on. Our story peeks in on these two boys, and we have a chance to look on as they grow.

Title: Musou Kakyou: A Summer Day's Dream
Mahô no purinsesu Minkî Momo: Tabidachi no eki
Summary: Minky Momo travels through time and teams up with her previous magical princess self to help an old man.

Title: Shin Get Robo Tai-no-Meo Get Robo
Cherry Scandal
Summary: A comedy between a young girl and her two housemaid boyfriends.

Title: Haruka III, 961 puro no shiro, Soshuhen
Candy Boy: EX01 - Mirai Yohouzu
Summary: Twin sisters, Yukino and Kanade Sakurai, move to a new school in the big city of Tokyo but not everything is quite like they expected.

Title: Gensomaden Saiyuki: Kibou no zaika
Summary: A mysterious light falls from the Heavens. It's the Pearl Jade. It can grant any wish. Dr. Ni tells Gyokumen Koushu about it. Then Sanzo and company to go and find and seal it before it falls into the wrong hands.

Title: Reneepoptosis
Summary: Three Renees go on a quest to find God, who is also Renee. As they travel the hills and valleys of Renee, they discover all the great joys, trials, and mysteries of being Renee.

Title: Mâbô no tairiku senbutai: kohen hizoku taiji no maki
Hana yori dango series Dai san wa: Yowamushi Chinsengumi
Tenchi Muyô! Ryo-Ohki: Dai-5-ki #04 Paradise Paradigm
Tenkû Senki Shurato: Sousei e no Antou
Summary: The battle for the celestial sphere is over. However, another danger is coming ahead, and the eight guardians are sent back to Earth to investigate.

Title: Dragon Ball Z KFC Japanese Commercial
Ninki no shouten ni tateru Gotou Shinpei
Karen Senki
Summary: In the post-apocalyptic aftermath of a war between machines and their creators, machines rule while humans exist in a state of servitude. Titular character Karen leads Resistance Group 11, an eclectic group of humans who find themselves fighting for their lives as they are hunted by the robots in each episode. Is this the end of humanity? Are they fighting a losing battle? Through Karen, we delve into a struggle between right and wrong, between indifference and love that explores some of the deepest questions about humanity. What is the difference between a thinking machine and a human being? What is a soul?

Title: Pittanko!
Summary: Kattan and Chicchi are elementary schoolchildren of the school of shapes. One day, they break an important shape of their teacher Mr.Sun. As soon as it's broken, the sky gets dark. The pupils are all scared. Even Mr. Sun gets upset by shock. Kattan is totally at a loss, all of a sudden the bag starts moving. A huge starry shape pops out from the bag. The star is spinning around and flying out at full speed. The star sticks around the Mr. Sun's face, and makes his mane. When Mr. Sun runs up to the top of a hill, the light is back on again. All of the pupils are gathering around. Now they can play together again!

Title: The Plane Cabby's Lucky Day
Summary: A young boy lives with his grandmother in a city where people use small airplanes to get from place to place. He drives a taxi plane, and during one of his travels he bumps into a bird that has been shot by the boy's latest customer. The bird, as well as a hungry bear he meets next, offer him a reward for his help. Men cause many problems for animals - is there a way to help them stay out of trouble?

Title: The Animal Village in Trouble
Summary: This is the Animal Village within the forest. The Monkey Family with many children, the Bear Family, the Raccoon Family and many other animal families live happily together in this village. One night, a strong northerly wind puts the Monkey Family in panic, and the little boy bear of the Bear Family falls into the river. The Raccoon Family and the Monkey Family members all rush to the river to rescue him.

Title: Moeru! Onisan
Summary: When Kenichi Kokuho was a small boy, he was lost in the mountains and never found. However, unknown to anyone, Kenichi has been brought up by his foster father in the wild. When Kenichi becomes 15 years old, his foster father tells him the truth about his background. As he finds out, Kenichi decides to go to a civilized society where his parents live. Everything Kenichi experiences in the town is a series of surprise and wonder. His family is delighted to see their son alive, but shocked at the fact that he has become wild and different from other children. And now, his new life is about to begin. His wild attitude and physical toughness cause various problems in the town. Kenichi has his own way to handle things, but it is too different for the most people to understand what he is up to. Can he get used to life in the town?

Title: Legend of the Phantom Heroes
Summary: Yazawa, a Japanese pilot, suffers a crash in his Phantom jet fighter. After a six month recovery, his old friend from an airplane magazine wants him to investigate the appearance of a Phantom in an armed conflict in El Salvador. Yazawa's investigations makes him wind up in an international arms conspiracy.

Title: Ganbare! Lulu Lolo - Tiny Twin Bears
Summary: Twin bear sisters Lulu and Lolo are hard workers but are also quick to cry. Lulu is an orange bear. Lolo is yellow. They love their grandma's homemade cookies. They take on new challenges every day. Although the tasks they undertake may be easy for adults to accomplish, it's a huge mission for the young sisters. Not knowing what to prepare, Lulu and Lolo gather lots of tools and materials that they often don't need. When something goes wrong or a rival interferes, Lulu and Lolo wail in sorrow, and the only thing that cheers them up is grandma's cookies. After they finally finish their tasks they take a well-deserved nap.

Title: PriPara & Kiratto PriChan Movie: Sparkling Memorial Live
Super Mario Galaxy 2 for Beginners
Summary: A tutorial video for

Title: Tokyo/Jitensha
Summary: Cycling through Tokyo at the speed of light.

Title: Tamayura
Summary: Fuu Sawatari and her father used to take photos of his hometown when she was younger. Some time after his death, she and her family move there. In that new place, Fuu makes friends and together they explore a mutual love for photography.

Title: Toki: Kono hoshi no mirai wo mitsumete
Pacalien
Summary: An alien surveying planet Earth crash-lands, and after coming across a cabin in the woods, finds himself in a battle for survival against a crazed knife-wielding human.

Title: Captai Tsubasa FNS27 Special
Summary: Short special of Captain Tsubasa animated for the FNS27 2019 event.

Title: Hannya Shingyo
Summary: Layering the wave-motion of endlessly returning waves, in this work I animate the world of 'Time soon passes ' and ' Life is a constant motion towards death' .

Title: The Witch's House
Summary: There was a candy house in a wood.Witch's sisters lived in the house.The witches had gone. A fox and a raccoon dog come to Witch's house...

Title: Ryori
Summary: An Ojizo Statue returns from nature into a temple to have a Shojin Ryori (Vegetarian Buddhist) Meal.

Title: Peachboy Legend
Summary: A childless woodcutter and his wife adopt Momotarou, a foundling child who springs from the inside of a peach. The super strong child defeats Lord Brindled Dog, Lord Monkey of the Mountain, and Lord Pheasant of the Moor, who agree to become his travelers companions as he sets out to defeat all the ogres from nearby island of Onigashima.

Title: Unable to Breathe
Summary: A boy blames himself for almost drowning his friend. He goes into the water and eventually finds himself alone in the water deep enough so that his feet don't reach the bottom. A sand animation portraying the delicate psychology of an adolescent.

Title: Futari wa Milky Holmes
Summary: Two years have passed since the event of Tantei Opera Milky Holmes, a new group of phantom thieves called Color the Phantom have appeared at Yokohama to bring a revolution. Kazumi Tokiwa and Alice Myoujingawa who aspired to become detectives just like Milky Holmes rise to the occasion to opposed this new threat as a detective duo, the Feathers.

Title: The Ancestor
Summary: A man wakes up to the voice of someone calling him. When he opens his eyes, he sees a young man from the year 3022. His future descendant is paying him a visit for advice. This hand drawn animation depicts a mysterious world with a dose of black humor.

Title: Forty Burglars
Summary: Ali Baba was a poor woodcutter of Persia who witnessed the visit of a gang of forty thieves hiding their treasure in the forest in which cutting wood. The thieves treasure is in a cave whose mouth is sealed magically: it opens with the words "Open Sesame!" And closes with "Close, Sesame." When the thieves leave, Ali Baba enters the cave and takes part of the treasure home. Ali Baba's brother, who had become a millionaire by marrying the daughter of a wealthy merchant, finds sudden wealth of his brother, he tells his discovery of the cave despite not having helped to overcome their poverty. Cassim goes to her to take some of the treasure, but their greed and nervousness about the riches forget the magic words to get out of the cave and the thieves are in it, carving him up. When Cassim not return, his brother goes to the cave to look for him and found his body in pieces at the entrance of the cave, carrying the pieces home. With the help of Morgiana or Night Light, a slave family list of Cassim, and the old tailor Baba Mustafa they manage properly rebuild the body for burial without arousing suspicion about his death. The thieves saw Cassim's body disappeared, warn that someone else knows your secret and set out to locate it. The first attempts are thwarted by Nightlight, now serving the family of Ali Baba, but finally manage to find out the location of the house of Ali. The head of thieves posing as a trader needed oil hospitality of Ali Baba, bringing with him mules loaded with forty jars, one filled with oil and the other thirty nine robbers band. The thieves plan to kill Ali Baba when he sleeps, but again Nightlight discover and thwart the plan, killing the thieves hidden in pots of boiling oil filling them. When the boss will look to his men, he discovers that all are dead and flees. Ali Baba expressed his gratitude to Moon Night freeing it from its status as a slave. In revenge, some time after the head of the thieves is established as a merchant and befriends the son of Ali Baba (who is in charge of business Cassim now). He was invited to dinner at his home, but Nightlight recognizes and executes a dance with a dagger in honor of the guests, sticking it to the thief in the heart while he was unprepared. In appreciation of his loyal friend Nightlight, Ali Baba decides to give the hand of his young and beautiful child. Ali Baba remains as the only connoisseur of the secret treasure of the cave and the magical words to enter it.

Title: The Intelligence - The Counterattack of Robots
Summary: A story which uses robots to depict the crisis facing Earth in the near future.

Title: Five Dodoes and the Last Egg
Chein kuronikuru: Hekuseitasu no hikari Movie 1
A Novel Relay Isn't an Odd Finale
Pyû to fuku! Jagâ: Ima, yuki ni yukimasu
Daijoubu.
Summary: Miyuki is a shy girl who is not good at socializing. Her only friend is an imaginary friend named Techi-techi. A story about an encounter that Miyuki experiences. The use of pastel color creates a refreshingly nostalgic atmosphere.

Title: Just Another Day
Summary: Just Another Day is an animated short following Rickey Maus, a bear lookalike mouse who is looking to find a way to survive a mundane office job.

Title: Ojamajo Doremi Dokkaan! Hana-chan ga Ippai
Summary: Recounts Hana-chan's story.

Title: Doamayger-D
Summary: In a traditional Japanese sweets shop in Kyoto works Daijiro Kyogoku, who finds a giant robot in the basement.

Title: Tenchi Muyô! Ryo-Ohki: Dai-5-ki #05 Iroiro goiken mo oari deshôga, naru yôni natta to iu koto de
Katsuhiro Otomo Cinema Anthology
Summary: A promotional DVD that includes nine trailers for some of Katsuhiro Otomo's films.

Title: Chiri mo tsumoreba yama to naru
Spirit of Wonder: Chaina-san no sakazuki
Wakusei robo Dangard A: Uchû taikai sen
Rootless Hearts
Summary: Two boys are playing in ruins. There is something lurking in the dark and they are extracted their hearts. A boy and his sister come near the ruins...

Title: Futon
Summary: Wrapped in the futon... Memories are coming up to the mind, the future is imagined, senses are recaptured, physical feelings as a woman are deeply ingrained...Everything melts pleasantly all together. In the futon, the body wonders seeking for these sense...

Title: Bousou Sengokushi
Summary: Modern-day bikers make and break alliances with neighboring gangs, fight over the right to use a local petrol station, and are eventually united under a powerful leader. It's a replay of the events of Japan's 16th-century civil war, but with bikes instead of horses and knives instead of swords. Based on the manga by Jiro Ueno in Weekly Playboy.

Title: Yoshikazu Yasuhiko & Ichiro Itano: Collection of Key Animation Films from Mobile Suit Gundam
Summary: MOBILE SUIT GUNDAM series are still favored by various generations, passed its 35th anniversary. The animators who played the core roles in the memorable first series MOBILE SUIT GUNDAM are Yoshikazu Yasuhiko, Ichiro Itano We would like to leave the key animations as the film production to posterity to praise their achievements, which influenced not only on the audience but also on the current anime industry.

Title: Yokohama Meibutsu Otoko Katayama Gumi!
Summary: When a number of biker gangs ranging from small to large started to appear in Yokohama, Hiromi Katayama united them at the risk of his own life. Set in the present, this OAV tells the story of Toshi Ikeda, a young rookie who returns to Yokohama to join Katayama's group. There, he will encounter an old friend and things will turn violent when the yakuza gang Mad Emperor attacks them.

Title: D.C.S.S: Da Capo Second Season
Summary: Hatsune-Jima is an island formed from a dormant volcano and is known for its cherry trees that bloom out of season. Some people believe that one of the trees is capable of granting any wish. The newspaper club has been challenged by the unofficial newspaper club as to who can write the better story that investigates the supernatural. Kiyotaka and the five cute girls of the newspaper club take up the challenge, but the girls have more on their minds than just the story.

Title: Okasantoissho famirikonsato pote iji ma e yokoso!!
Furiko: Pendulum
Summary: The back and forth swings of a life.

Title: Yasashii Akuma
Summary: Foo, a kind boy, lives together with his grandmother. One day, as Foo is off picking herbs on a mountain to treat his grandmother's illness, he finds himself lost. But then he is saved by a boy demon with bright-red skin named Smoochy.

Title: From Cherry Blossoms with Love
Summary: A short film by Tadanari Okamoto.

Title: Dr. Slump and Arale-chan: Huh!? Penguin Village Through the TV Jack
The Day the Sun Was Lost
Sekai Meisaku Gekijou Kanketsu Ban: Romeo no Aoi Sora Part 2
Taiyou no ko Meguchan no ringyou annai: Watashitachi no kurashi to ringyou
Shogi Hour
Summary: A NHK shogi tournament parody.

Title: Katana Maidens - Tomoshibi
Summary: Since the ancient times, the Kannagi priestesses have used their swords to exorcise the creatures that brought chaos upon the world.

Title: Mâbô no Tokyo olympic taikai
Summary: A boy competes in various events during the Olympic games.

Title: Shibai Taroka
Summary: There is a new student at Oobu High School. His name is Yakuda Daigo. With his buff body and a tough-looking face that can make everyone run, soon rumors spread about him. Some say he's a gang leader, others say he is involved with Yakuza business, still more say he rapes, steals, and likes beating people. There are only a handful of people who know who Yakuda really is, including Manami-a. She is a girl Yakuda fell in love with. Yakuda loves to cook and he likes cute things. He also enjoys gardening, crafting and adores pets. He is a very caring person. He always carries around a cute sewing kit and a cute first-aid kit around. However, with many unfortunate events, he often gets involved with a gang fight or a criminal, along with other coincidental things that happens around him. People always assume the worse for him.

Title: A Snowflake Into the Night
Summary: The snow eventually melts into the ground and turns into an earthworm. The earthworm wants to see the outside world so it turns into a tree. With a desire to be something more powerful, it keeps turning itself into a different creature. One day, it remembers what it used to be, the snow.

Title: Kidô shinsengumi: Moe yo ken
Summary: Three girls are the current Shinsengumi, a group of people who fight for the rights of humanity. But while the ones known are pure samurai, these girls have a pretty bad attitude and make way too much trouble when they handle things. Not to mention that they can request instant armor to fuse with, to increase their powers when they face battle.

Title: Harutosyura
Summary: 'Dear my friends, we will put our pure energy together and create 'The Fourth Dimensional Art' with our fields and lives.' Kenji MIYAZAWA, Idea of Farmers Art. I walked around rice fields for over four years and took tens of thousands of pictures to create the film which is inspired by the philosophy 'The Fourth Dimensional Farmers Art' of Kenji Miyazawa, a Japanese poet, farmer, buddhist, and scientist. His literature was also inspired by 'The Fourth Dimension', Albert Einstein's Theory of Relativity. The title HARUTOSYURA can be interpreted in various ways, 'Heaven & Hell', 'Romanticism & Realism' and 'Spirit & Science'. Nature always has deeply affected the spirit and culture of people. 'YAOYOROZU NO KAMI': an ancient animistic concept of multitudinous gods in Japan, means that the gods dwell in all natural things, like in the sun, in the water, and in a grain of rice. In the film you may feel the sense of the endless circles of sustainability of the rice fields.

Title: The Strange Tale of a Dream Sphere Dealer
Summary: A young girl who has sacrificed much to care for her little brother meets a man selling dreams that could change her life. What dream will she choose?

Title: Taiyou no ko Meguchan no kankyou o mamoru nourin suisangyou
Chiisana koi no monogatari: Chicchi to Sarî hatsukoi no shiki
Smile Evangelist
Summary: You can't stop smiling when you see Elfy's Stories. Elfy has special honey that makes everyone happy. Smiles are contagious - (an object-animation short film).

Title: Noobow: Kieta Medal
Summary: Adventures of Noobow during the town festival.

Title: Momotaro's Underwater Adventure
Summary: In this short we see another adventure of Momotaro, this time he is called to fight a terrible shark, so Momotaro and his team accept the mission, only this time the Pheasant can not go because he can not swim.

Title: Dekobo the Big Head's Road Trip
Summary: A man encounters strange animals during his road trip in his car.

Title: Madly in Love
Summary: A surrealistic tale including three young girls and anthropomorphic cakes.

Title: Dreaming White
Summary: White was left alone in the atelier and he longs to be vivid colors.

Title: Aoi Hitomi no Onna no Ko no Ohanashi
Summary: The story is set in a village in the southern Japanese prefecture of Kôchi during World War II. Even in this remote mountainous area, the perception of American and British people as "brutes" has taken root, due to the deaths and injuries among the villagers' relatives. A elementary schoolgirl named Eiko transfers from the city of Yokohama to this village. Eiko happens to have blue eyes from her American father, and her classmates make no attempt to rein in their bullying. Other than Eiko's homeroom teacher Akiko, even the teachers view Eiko the same way that the children do. However, a boy named Kenta views Eiko more with curiosity than with hostility. The children's lives change as the injured father of one of Kenta's classmates returns from the battlefield and news of more casualties arrives in the village.

Title: What Happens Before War?
Summary: Designed for Japanese schoolchildren, this is a rhetorical piece that argues for the continued support of Japan's pacifist post-WWII Constitution and predicts ways that warmongers will seek to change public opinion in favor of military solutions.

Title: Akane maniakkusu: Saraba aishiki Jôji yo
Summary: Gouda Jouji, a new transfer student at Hakuryo High, instantly falls in love with Suzumiya Akane and boldly proposes to her, right on his first day at the new school. Although Akane finds him very annoying, hot-blooded and simple-minded this does not discourage Jouji, who keeps on trying to find ways to express his love to Akane.

Title: It's the New Year! Pocket Monsters Special!
Netoranmono the Movie: #1 Netto no sumi de burogu to sakebu
The Sun and the Frogs
Summary: A short film about frogs and a fish trying to eat them all.

Title: Chiruri
Summary: A story of a boy and a girl who try to find the one thing that matters.

Title: Yamete! Raitâ asobi: Doubutsumura no shoutaidai shutsudou
Fear
Summary: A boy walks by the city. Suddenly, he feels the presence of a dark character who begins to pursue him. While he escapes, his perception of the context distorts and the thin line between reality and fantasy begins to become blurred.

Title: Osomatsusan: Haru no zenkoku daisenbatsu joueisai
Maze King
Summary: We cannot stay here any longer. We must leave tomorrow morning. A clown convinces and hurries the residents of an amusement park, a girl, a gay, a soldier, a dog, to be in time for the merry-go-round.

Title: Miracle of Love: Doctor Norman's Story
Private 2nd Class Norakuro: The Drill
Summary: Norakuro keeps getting his allies and enemies mixed up while on training maneuvers. What he had thought to be a successfully eliminated enemy tank turns out to be the tank carrying the Regimental Commander.

Title: Meja warudoshirizu-hen yume no shunkan e
Kappa the 5th
Summary: Description of Movie: The story is about 5th generation Kappa(Kappa means Japanese traditional monster, usually lives in river in village) 's life in Saga, Japan. Kappa had become the legend of gang star but suddenly he changed his mind to be gentle. He came back to his home town and then he try to think about how to repay an obligation to his home town.

Title: Track
Summary: The birth of the universe, and the origin of all creation - Humans invented tools, discovered fire and painted murals in dark caves. Murals were created on a mission to pass down stories and history to posterity. From murals, we could tell that the discovery of fire was a highly important turning point for ancient humans. Now it's time for us,humans,to reconsider energy. When I have a look back in history and imagine the life style of ancient humans, I always feel grateful for what we have now in our modern civilization.

Title: Carol
Summary: Carol is the tale of a teenage girl whose life seems normal enough until she notices music disappearing from all around her, such as the sound of Big Ben, her father's cello-playing, and the concert of her favorite band, Gaball Screen. After hearing some mysterious voices, Carol is transported to a fantastic world where she must fight against the evil monsters who are stealing the music from Earth. She meets and is assisted by three dashing heroes: Clark, Tico, and Flash.

Title: Be-yond
Summary: When I woke up from the darkness, I learned that I was the legendary Devil of Darkness that was said to have the power to destroy the universe. The beautiful girls make approaches to me one after another. My shout roars in space. When I touch a villain gently, he decomposes into molecules - It seemed that I have the power - But - am I really the Devil?

Title: Petals of Fire
Summary: The pilot headed to the bombing to the Middle East. he remembered the fireworks seen in childhood, turned back. This work has been produced together with Shing02. Shing02 (Shingo Annen) is a hiphop MC by trade. Many other musicians have participated.

Title: Trapped
Summary: The film focuses how societies in the developed countries are getting oriented to urbanized ones, in which people feel isolated and vulnerable to media onslaughts. The film sees dark, cold and machine-like city as scary, monstrous existence. The story shows how the protagonist faces this environment and evolves as a kind of superman, who can overcome the burdens imposed by our highly urbanized and comsumeristic societies. He finally becomes a hope in this world.

Title: Friends
Summary: A series of stories of 3 middle school girls.

Title: Ansan Buru Sutazu! Dream Raivu: 2nd Tour Bright Star! - Osakakoen Nokatto-Ban
Bungaku Shoujo Memoir III - Koi Suru Otome no Rhapsody
Summary: Prequel to Book Girl (2010) that pictures Nanase's backstory.

Title: LiEat
Summary: A collection of three short stories, each of which following a man and his adopted daughter: a dragon with the ability to materialize lies and eat them.

Title: Anpanman: Apple Boy and Everyone's Hope
Color Spring
Summary: This is the story of a teenage girl and her beloved grandmother. After passing the nice voice, she returns to her granddaughter's side and leads her on a fantastic journey.

Title: Under the Stars, a Boy of the Day
Summary: It is the story of a boy who is going to spend his summer vacation in the country.

Title: Good Night, Convenience Store.
Summary: At a convenience store in the night, exhausted people mess up, so they are set free.

Title: Goodbye Rabbit, Hop Hop
Summary: A mind in the city looks inwards, and escapes into the rabbit's domain.

Title: Myujikaru token ranbu higekiri hizamaru so-ki shutsujin 2019 ~ soga
Kojiki monogatari: Koson-ke no mittsuno takara
The Longest Five Minutes
Summary: Our hero faces the origin of all evil, the Overlord himself, but suddenly loses all memories of his adventure. His finishing moves, the name of his hometown, and even the reason he's trying to defeat the Overlord in the first place, all gone. Our hero feels as though he's letting his allies down... In the midst of battle, his allies' words and the Overlord's taunting triggers flashbacks, bringing his memories back piece by piece. Our hero tries to regain his priceless memories before it's too late, but the Overlord stands before him, his power unyielding. What can happen in The Longest Five Minutes?

Title: Osora de deeto
Summary: A circus acrobat walks along a tightrope high above the stage. As he walks along, he suddenly finds himself pursued by an enormous Japanese teenage girl who leers at him with a look of evil intentions. He tries to run away from her, but soon loses his balance and plummets to the floor below. Will his admirer catch him in time?

Title: Airy Me
Summary: After injection of medication, the test subject girl turned into Chimera when her switch of nose got pressed. What kind of sight can be seen when no longer a human being keeps humane needs or wants? Is the creature moved by memories, admiration, love, or hates? Who saw the world of this fragmentary story that swinging camera works tell? Song: 'Airy Me' Cuushe

Title: Kishin hôkoku Demonbein
Summary: The main character is a detective named Kuro Daijuji. His normal everyday concerns consist of somehow managing to pay the rent for his apartment and affording to eat meals. The meals are taken care of by his good friend Laika from the neighborhood orphanage, but Kuro has a harder time keeping his electricity and water connection coming (which finally runs out when he gets back from his latest free-loader meal at Laika's orphanage). However, it seems as though Kuro's luck has finally changed when the young president of Hadou Enterprises, Ruri Hadou, offers him a job to find a Grimoire to power Hadou's trump card against the terrorist organization Black Lodge: Demonbane. Despite personal objections to looking for the Grimoire, Kuro takes the job in exchange for a hefty fee offered by Ruri. Instead, the number of Kuro's problems increases when he saves Al Azif, the human form of the Grimoire Necronomicon from the clutches of Doctor West of Black Lodge. In the battle, Kuro and Al fall into the depths of Arkham City where they find Demonbane....

Title: Itokoishi
Summary: Ito falls in love with his classmate Ichinose, as his love grows a red thread on his little finger increases and tries to connect it with him, but without knowing the meaning of this thread she breaks it and always flees, until, a one day she discovers the meaning of this mysterious thread.

Title: Mobile Fighter G-Gundam: Prologue II - Departure Chapter
Amanchu!: Yakusoku no natsu to atarashii omoide no koto

Summary: Manga on web is a Japanese TV Show about to comic by Haruka and Mangaka.

Kyô kara maô! R: Shô shimaron no shônen ô kô'hen

Kenja no okurimono
Summary: This is a story that Jim, an apprentice magician, and Della, his wife on Christmas day. Della has her proud beautiful and long hair cut off and sells it in order to buy him a present that is a chain made for his gold watch. In the evening, Jim reaches home in high spirits, but he is stunned to see her look so different.

Title: Gigalopolis
Summary: Mesmerising swathes of colour and liquid 3D animation.

Title: Kyuukyoku vs Shikou!: Renzoku shashin no katamari
2nd Lieutenant Norakuro: Sunday Magic
Summary: Norakuro's adventures in the Fierce Dog Brigade continue in this short film from the 1930s.

Title: Twins in Bakery
Summary: A magical incident happened in an ordinary bakery while the baker was away for delivery. That incident made this bakery the best in the town. But it is a secret not to be disclosed.

Title: Tatamp
Summary: This living thing has one sound. The kind of the sound increases, too, if the kind of the living thing increases. They become chaoses, and become melodies.

Title: Gekijouban Argonavis from Bang Dream! Prelude
Achoo!
Summary: This is a story of a snow child. As winter approaches, the snow child rises into the sky. Chilled in the high air, the child turns to crystal, and then gently falls back to the ground.

Title: Shinjuku Shinchan patorôru: Warui otona ni ki o tsukete
Hiromi Iwasaki: Egao
Summary: A short music video about a girl and her pet hamster.

Title: Okubyou na Venus
Summary: Four theme songs narrate the make of fictional idol Kirita Yumiko from early days of singing and dancing lessons to the triumphant debut concert.

Title: Nightbus 2011
Summary: The protagonist is traveling to the tsunami-devastated Northeast of Japan. His night bus passes the prefecture of Fukushima, afflicted by the nuclear accident. Dreams and recollections of the days of disaster are blending in his head. Finally the protagonist reaches his destination, the town of Kesennuma, seeing the aftermath of the tsunami with his own eyes.

Title: Oto - shikaku
Summary: A graduation project from a student of Shizuoka University of Art and Culture. 'Oto-shikaku' means 'visible and square sound' in Japanese. This work features a world that has been seen by a man who edits the sound of a city. The state of the city is shown where sounds are visualized.

Title: Mobile Suit Gundam Seed: After-Phase Between the Stars
Tiandi wuyong! Liang huang gui ii si qi

Summary: A commentary on how the job market affects Japan's young graduates after university.

Title: Mâbô no tairiku senbutai: zempen circus no maki
Girl Gaku. Hijiri Girls Square Gakuin
Memories of Tsukiji
Summary: Memories of Tsukiji uses photogrammetry technology developed by Cody Ellingham and Ruben Fro to take you on an ambient journey through the iconic Tsukiji market in Tokyo, which was demolished in 2018, and accompanied a soundtrack by SJF.

Title: Pants no Ana
Summary: A collection of short stories, all of which are perverted to various degrees.

Title: Kojiki monogatari: Okuni no mikoto to inaba no usagi
The Trip
Summary: A woman taking a trip encounters a nightmarish landscape juxtaposed against scenes of classical beauty.

Title: Let's dance with Papa
Summary: Two irresponsible siblings who live with a irresponsible father, who likes to drink and gamble.

Title: Let's Just Get It Started
Summary: When you feel it, get it started

Title: Dr. Suranpu Arare no bikkuri ban
Osyama na marshe
Summary: Mashe is a really shy girl. She worries all the time about her very curly hair, and rainy days make her endlessly depressed.

Title: Such a Good Place to Die
Summary: Scenery transforms as if it has a life of its own and goes round and round in memories as the time echoes. Anything that has shape dances. Marked by an abundance of imagination and made extensively with drawings, this animation was produced without any storyboards or time sheets.

Title: Walking Meat
Summary: Humanity has grown a taste for zombies: stewed, sautéed or squeezed. In an alternate world, the Japanese corporation Flesh Inc. has managed to create zombies on domestic soil during the roaring Sixties (the years of the economic boom) using voodoo techniques imported from Africa, and it has built a fortune thereafter by selling zombie products of all kind: instant noodles, soft drinks, hamburgers, pet food, and cosmetics. But when a trio of self-centered millennials on their first workday get trapped inside a fully automated zombie farm with their old-school Technotard supervisor and a horde of undead running amok, overcoming generation gaps becomes a matter of survival.

Title: Mr. Shape
Summary: There are various shapes in the world. These shapes can break, unite and change its shape, it's their own style. This short film is some episode according to the shapes, with a little surprise and discovery, by simple method, to make viewers feel fun.

Title: Gordian, the Warrior
Summary: It is the future. Daigo, a reckless teenager, speeds across the wilderness on his super cycle. He is accompanied by his robot pet black panther. The two arrive at Victor Town, a showcase ideal city built in the middle of the barren land, just in time to find it under attack by an army of fanatics equipped with sophisticated weapons. Daigo and his panther are drafted into a defense force, but despite a strenuous resistance the defenders are soon on the verge of total defeat. Suddenly a giant robot warrior, Gordian, appears from nowhere to drive off the brutal invaders. GORDIAN is a fast-paced SF mystery-drama that will intrigue viewers of all ages as it gradually reveals who Daigo and his panther are, who the invaders are and what they want, and what Gordian is and the motives for its intervention are.

Title: Mudai
Summary: Splotched in blooms of color and bursting with ideas, a young artist paints another beautiful piece, his girlfriend supporting him all the while. Their lives are modest, but they know they will stay by each other no matter what. When one of his works sells, he experiences unprecedented renown; life couldn't be any better for a man with both love and success. However, the lust for creativity consumes him, and as his world crumbles around him, he is left scrambling to pick up the pieces of what remains.

Title: Creative Evolution
Summary: The creative worlds of Cezanne, Matisse, Picasso, Braque, Delaunay and so many artists are connected each other and finally create new story of evolution of life. Where do I come from? What am I? Where am I going? Where do we come from? What are we? Where are we going? Life keeps traveling across the universe.

Title: Omochabako series dai ni wa: Kuroneko banzai
A Place Where There Are Moths
Sakura Wars: The Gorgeous Blooming Cherry Blossoms Act 5: Father and Daughter
Puchimas!!: Petit Petit iDOLM@STER - Fuyu Kotatsu Haru
Summary: Takane does not want to put the kotatsu away, even though it's spring. This leads to a huge court battle lead by the Producer and Takanya, on whether the kotatsu should be taken away or not.

Title: Mori no ongaku tai - Grimm dôwa yori
The Bathroom
Summary: A time-lapse animation produced for a solo exhibition at the Sony Building in Ginza, shot when Kuri was moving out of the house where he lived at the time.

Title: The Tale of the Plump Bird
Danse Macabre
Summary: A surreal animated movie about the end of life's path from the perspective of a tightrope walker and based in part on a song from the 'Death and the Maiden' quartet by Franz Schubert.

Title: Here and There
Summary: Musique concrète and electronic sounds made by modulating everyday noises such as flush toilets are interspersed throughout the work.

Title: Hi Hi Puffy AmiYumi: Behind the Scenes
Summary: The real life Ami and Yumi talk about how the cartoon was made.

Title: Yu-Gi-Oh!: Turn 31 and 33 Japanese DVD Commercial
Salaryman
Summary: Rickey Maus is trying to find a change in his mundane life

Title: Anata wo Hitokoto de Arawashite Kudasai: no Shitsumon ga Nigate da.
Summary: The anime depicts the "smart city" envisioned by Kyocera, where everyone can comfortably and safely live with the use of advanced technology, and it also depicts the worries of job seekers. The anime's title and theme reflect both the vexing issue of how to describe Kyocera's extensive business in just one word, and the mood of job seekers vexed by the interview question, "If you had to describe yourself in one word, what would it be?"

Title: Imagination
Summary: Karo comes inside from a rainy day to tell Piyobupt about seeing fish swimming in the air. Piyobupt laughs at his friend's delusion but his own imagination starts working. There's no such thing as an ordinary thought bubble in Koji Yamamura's inventive claymation.

Title: Parallel Botanies
Summary: Urban architectures have been transformed their forms influenced by natural environment, the individual inhabitants' desires and everyday lives within the geographical and physical limitation. The Urban cities have been formed following with function. The structure of chimneys, which provides ventilation for hot flue gases from inside to the outside, symbolizes this. This film attempted to recreate the real world as a fictional or imaginary world by the subjective way of filming and editing. This practice is influenced by Constant Nieuwenhuys's imaginary architectural project 'New Babylon', Situationist International's psycho-geographical activity 'Derive' and 'Automatic Writing' in Surrealism. The title of this film comes from Leo Leoni's pseudo 'Parallel Botany', a pictorial book of imaginary plants.

Title: Cyborg Sakura
Summary: Cyborg Sakura is a futuristic anime series set in the city of Tokyo (Los Angeles in the American dubbed version). It follows the story of Kyoko Sakura, a cyborg with money problems (she spends too much money on clothes). Sakura has constant conflicts between her two love interests, Nogoro-san, a fly-by-night detective investigating an underground go-cart racing gambling cartel (who incidentally lives with his grandmother who is also an important character), and Hikaru Reza Hikari (Hikaru LaZer-Lite in the American dubbed version), a go-cart enthusiast and cybernetic mechanic. Although as the series begins, Sakura and Hikaru appear to be in a relationship, it becomes strained at points and Sakura waffles between her affections for both Nogoro-san and Hikaru. Another plot, which was never fully explored as the series was canceled before details could be revealed, is that of Sakura's search for her father, whom she suspects is the mysterious vigilante and sometimes villain, the Bladinator (who is named in the credits but never actually referred to as such during the show itself. The Bladinator is seen in the opening scene of the series shaking down a street vendor who is unable to pay his protection money to the Yakuza. For this, the Bladinator insists that the street vendor pay the blood price instead; after hearing this, the street vendor commits sepukku. The Bladinator is often referred to as "the mysterious man in the shadows" throughout the series but makes very few appearances aside from silhouettes until the final episode of the series in which Sakura finally confronts the Bladinator himself.

Title: Psalms of Planets Eureka SeveN: Episode 51: New Order
Mushiking: The Road to the Greatest Champion
Ici, là et partout
Summary: Love(or being in love) is a wonderful thing that colors our life, but love is not always visible and sometimes is vague and ephemeral.

Title: Au
Summary: A family of freed thinking teddy bears.

Title: Waza no Tabibito
Summary: The story centers around Tekuni Depagaa, a girl who embarks on a journey to train and become a fighting master known as a "wazabito."

Title: Eggs
Summary: It is a story of an egg which cannot become a chick.

Title: Gojira Okoku
Summary: Animated infomercial series where a woman known as "Doctor" and her monster companion Megabyte analyze the data and stats of various monsters.

Title: Boku no Natsuyasumi 3: Kitaguni hen - Chîsana boku no dai sôgen
GA: Geijutsuka âto dezain kurasu - Aozora ga kakitai
Zettai shôgeki: Puratonikku hâto - Shizuka ni, ori no yô ni
Meitantei Konan: Nazo no choutaijou jiken
Atomic World
Summary: The rotation of an atom ends up leading to dizzying movements throughout the world.

Title: Yu-Gi-Oh!: DVD Duel Box 3 Japanese DVD Commercial
Corporal Norakuro
Summary: The Fierce Canine Army has been given the day off, but Norakuro has no home to return to. After he goes to a yakitori (fried chicken) shop for a drink, he goes to the park to take a short nap. Just then, soldiers from the Mountain Monkey Army, who have stolen some secret documents, make their appearances and Norakuro goes after them in hot pursuit. When the Mountain Monkey troops appear to have made their escape in a hot air balloon, Norakuro, as a last desperate measure, climbs into a tube designed for launching fireworks and blasts himself right into the balloon. He retrieves the stolen documents, but the plot unfolds in an unexpected manner.

Title: A Forest Fire
Summary: Day 1: A man returning to the village informs the villagers of a distant forest fire Day 2: A young couple leaves the village, and the villagers burn a fire begging for rain Day 3: The wind changes and a forest fire approaches the village Day 4: The fleeing villagers return and stare at the misery of the village And the days after that.

Title: Allegory of Mrs. Triangle
Summary: The complexity of one persona and the different aspects of personality. This is done with an abstract storyline, encouraging the audience to evoke new possibilities of understanding the work in their distinctive way.

Title: Dankichi on a Tropical Island
Summary: A boy fights with savage tribesmen and animals on a tropical island.

Title: The Red Bridge Is Falling Down
Duel Masters: Black Moon God Emperor (Lunatic God Saga)
Taiyou no ko Meguchan no nougyou annai: Watashitachi no shokuseikatsu to nougyou - Okome yasaihen
Tarô no bampei: Senkô-tei no maki
Uncle and Girl
Summary: A girl is home alone and playing outside. She finds a room to play in, when suddenly the uncle who is a resident comes back. She hides in the closet.

Title: Moovie Star
Summary: She's just a southern cow moving to Mumbai to be a big star.

Title: Drawer Hobbs
Summary: A woman receives a wardrobe from her mother that includes a little surprise.

Title: Platonic Chain
Summary: If God can tell tell you anything you want to know, what would you want to know? Some part of the future. Around Shibuya, words are spreading quickly that there is a site that enables you to look up anything, called "Platonic Chain".

Title: Ranma ½ Nettou uta gassen volume 2
Yu-Gi-Oh!: DVD Duel Box 2 Japanese DVD Commercial
Le projet Sapporo
Summary: The Sapporo Project is a poetic homage to the work of acclaimed Japanese calligrapher Gazanbou Higuchi. A unique glimpse into the world of calligraphy, this animated film takes a look at his creative process. His calligraphy is animated, transporting the viewer into his vivid imagination.

Title: Tale of Baku
Summary: When the night falls, an unsuspected vigilante guards the dreams in all feudal Kyoto. He is Baku, a cuddly chimerical nightmare eater that may look too small for the job but knows nothing but bravery. One night, he faces his most toughest adversary yet: The nightmares of a samurai-crazed boy.

Title: Corazón en fuego
Summary: As a woman depressed, she wares pajama all day long and shut herself in the room. No matter who she is in the society, she keeps herself uncombed and indulged in the sweet memories of the lost days. A woman in pain looks fragile, but be careful, a wounded animal could be wild as well.

Title: Time bokan in: Series Itadakiman
Summary: Three intelligent children are called in by the principal and asked by Shakyamuni dwelling in his body to find missing puzzle copper plates scattered all over the world and complete the puzzle board to heighten honor of Oshaka School. As for the familiar villain trio, they are in firm belief that they are genuine descendants of Priest Sanzo's clan although actually they are of uncertain lineage. They study hard to enter the school in spite of their repeated failure.

Title: Sankô to tako
Summary: Sankô is the typical loafer and sleeper who ignores his wife's complaints. One day, a neighbor pulls Sankô out of bed to show him a map showing an island in front of whose shores a ship carrying a treasure sank. Sankô the greedy will hasten to go in search of it, but as he plunges into the waters he runs into a severe problem: a giant octopus and his family inhabit the cave in front of which the treasure rests.

Title: Sakura Taisen: Sumire

Title: Homecoming
Summary: Homecoming is a two-track visual poem following Akio Yuguchi's journey back into his childhood and his quest for coming to terms with living abroad far from his former home. Facing up to past and future challenges, the protagonist decides to send a letter of condolence to his father, who lives in Japan in a high-risk area for earthquakes and tsunamis. Through the rhythm of his reflective soliloquy, the desire for homecoming sounds a bell for the departed while heralding the dawn of a new life.

Title: Yuki Terai
Summary: Yuki Terai is a vivacious 17-year-old who lives just outside Tokyo. In most ways she is every bit the typical teen-except she doesn't exist. The invention of acclaimed computer animator Kenichi Kutsugi, Yuki Terai is Japan's No.1 Virtual Star. Capable of unprecedented life-like expressions and movement, she inhabits many worlds: real-life, science fiction and music. And now she can inhabit yours. In Secrets, the multi-faceted Yuki is showcased in six irresistible short stories. In Fly Away Alone, she plays a sensuous songbird; Dos/Chin, which also happens to be the name of her mischievous robotic dog, finds Yuki exploring her artistic side; A Life is a meditative piece where Yuki reflects on happier times; in fully-fledged Matrix mode, Comet The Thief stars our idol as a mischievous martial-arts bandit; The Mirror explores the darker side of Yuki as she is mysteriously followed by images of herself that seem to emerge from mirrors; and in Lazy Gui, our scantily-clad heroine embarks on a race against time as her Space Freighter is set for self-destruct. Welcome to the worlds of Yuki Terai. Enter.. and your world will never be the same.

Title: The Outgrowth
Summary: A woman wakes up one morning and finds a boil on her forehead. One day, the moon explodes and disappears. There's a man who lives with the woman. A dog on the sidewalk watches the woman walking by. The boil keeps getting bigger. This humble pencil drawn animation tells a bizarre story with a unique edge.

The famous police drama of the 70s in today's Google Street View. A found footage movie exclusively using Google imagery (Street View, Earth & Maps) and audio material from the original series 'The Streets of San Francisco'.

Title: Ai to Ai.
Summary: 'Ai to Ai' is a film that explores what it means to experience loss, yet never lose the love given to you when it is shared, keeping the legacy of a loved one alive. It explores the subtle power of showing and sharing love to change sorrow into love. Done in stop-motion, it reflects life and how in facing problems that stop us, we should keep moving in small steps for every small move propels change.

Title: VIVAldi VVinter
Summary: This short film is an expressionist turbulence. It captures the subconscious drama of the music, and the juxtaposition of the movements. It is a dive into a snowstorm, structural chaos and an exploding gestural animation. It is a return to the roots of the "pure" abstract animation, synchronization of movements into a maelstrom, and pèlerinage to a sacred art form. It is an end, and a beginning at the same time, as the winter itself.

Title: Garda
Summary: This is a story of two young men in love who are tied to their country's traditions and culture, which forbids them from expressing their feelings and removing the mask that covers their face, being penalized with severe fights if they break the rules.

Title: Sneeze

Chap the adventurer is ready to explore, hoping the camouflage techniques he learned work just the way it did in the human movies. Worried of getting caught, shy Arthur helplessly wobbles behind his fearless mate. Together, they journey into human territory. Depicting the human world from the eyes of a pint sized height, 'sneeze' is based on 'The Adventures of Pick and Nick,' a series of children's stories by Japanese illustrator Shinji Yamamoto. About Dandelion Animation Studio LLC Under the concept of animation as a 'gift to children, worldwide' Dandelion Animation Studio has been dedicated to creating Computer Graphics Animation since 2007.

Title: Psychedelic Afternoon

Akko always cherishes the palm-sized mirror that was given to her by her father and treats it with care. However, the mirror was accidentally broken by her absent-minded mother. On a night where a beautiful full moon hangs in the sky, Akko-chan buries the mirror pieces in the garden and goes to sleep. She is awakened by a soft and kind voice that belongs to the Queen of the Mirror Kingdom. She sends her gratitude to Akko-chan for cherishing the mirror with care and offers her a magical compact mirror. Whenever she sings the magical words, Akko-chan will be able to transform into anything she wants. Everybody goes to the ocean for a summer festival and the guys sneak off to a cursed island.

Tina has come from a world 10,000 years ago to the present time using the power of Sidi to help the people living in the current era where the separation is severe. However, the divided consciousness of the present world was unexpectedly intense, and Tina's half-spirit, the half-material body, could not last much longer. To save the world, Tina and Takeru decide to create the plasma device once again and use Tina's Sidi and the power of plasma to change people's consciousness.

Title: Kohtaro in Space Wonderland
Summary: Kotaro is a 7-year old boy. He lives with his Mom, and his raccoon robot Pon, in a spaceship shaped like a merry-go-round. One day, he somehow becomes separated from his mom... He ends up heading for the Chocolate Star with his companion Pon, but over there also awaited them an event so big that it would shake the whole star and its inhabitants. Once he gets there he meets Wave; they become friends and start a wonderful adventure.

Summary: A normal day turns into a day of adventure when an elevator that carries a boy does not stop where it should.

Summary: A monkey and tanuki go fishing in a frozen lake but the king catfish isn't pleased. Condensed version of Osaru no Tairyou.

Summary: The son of King Asfal, Galgear, has inherited the magic ring making him Dream Land's new ruler, If you're able to harness the power of the Valis, you just might survive long enough to face the king and restore peace to your homeland.

Title: Sound's Deli: Made in Tokyo Bang
The Adventure of Vegetables
Summary: All of a sudden, a crown of the king of a peaceful vegetable kingdom has been stolen! The vegetable creatures of the kingdom,who had read a letter about the news,took a trip working together to find the crown.Are they able to get it back without any trouble???

Title: Mood Hall
Summary: Mood Hall-the enigmatic game played amongst the survivors in the post-apocalyptic world. The strange space in which the game is played is also known by the same name. Mysterious middle-aged and older gentlemen and beautiful women, giants, and little people appear and disappear in various places. What is Mood Hall? "Overture: Close Encounters of the Third Kind," "Five Flukers in the Fluke Pit," "Homo Ludens," "Multiplication 1," "Rooms," "Mood Hall St.," "Multiplication 2," and "Blue Skies from Pain"-a high-density labyrinthine world consisting of eight experimental, artistic, and adventurous sketches, half sci-fi and half mystery.

Title: AUJIK - Cathexis
Summary: Concept: AUJIK are an esoteric group who believes in animism and worships nature. They divide nature in to: Refined and Primitive: AUJIK states that:The refine nature originates from the primitive and vice versa. That refine nature is order and primitive nature is chaos. That the resistance between them will decrease until they converge in to a state of supreme clarity. In order to reach this state AUJIK project sacred artefacts that are a crossbreed of organic and synthetic entity. The film illustrates how they interact with their artefacts. Each artefacts consists of an unique and multifaceted Artificial Intelligence (AI). By transcending emotional inputs to the artefacts artificial limbic system the AUJIK members can reveal various areas and aspects of the artefacts minds.

Title: Kinema No Yoru/Film Night
Summary: The first almost entirely "animated" work within the oeuvre of Peter Callas, "Kinema No Yoru" introduces the motif of the menko playing card as a recurrent symbol. Popular among Japanese children, menko's colorful appeal is underscored by a darker ideological bias in the set of cards at Callas' disposal. Disjunctive images of war and territorial conquest (human bombs, brave feats, gas masks) thus convey more about Japan's colonial aspirations than of the game's competitive nature in the simple winning and losing of the iconic cards. The introduction of political and propagandist imagery reflects the artist's profound skepticism toward notions of universal truth and authenticity of experience.

Title: Magica Wars
Summary: Mahou Shoujo Taisen is a project created from a variety show for the Otaku "2.5 Chigen TV" (2.5 Dimension TV). The characters are the mahou shoujo that represent each local town in Japan. The characters that won from the second illustration competitions that were held on pixiv will appear in the anime.

Title: ToHeart2ad: Happy New Year
Summary: Takaaki and his group of female friends visit the shrine and spend the night until the first sunrise of the new year together. They get fortune cookies whose (mostly negative) predictions all turn out to come true in a strange way; there is only one predicting a positive outcome: Yuma whose luck poem tells her she will "fall in love with someone close to her whom she did not see with much interest before" - could that be Taka-kun, her "eternal enemy"?

Title: Eiichi Yamamoto
Summary: A father and daughter in Japan climb to the top of a ridge to watch the moonrise. As they wail, an old man tells them his story. An adaptation of Tetsuya Takeda's story about the relationship between a Japanese child and an American soldier.

Title: Hirusagari no hitozuma (Otto no inai ma ni)
Dir en Grey: Glass Skin
Summary: A music video for Dir en Grey's song "Glass Skin".

Title: Dramatic Memory Honoo no Alpenrose: Love-Me Road o Kakete
Summary: Summary of second half of Honoo no Alpenrose featuring a new dubbing and reworked scenes.

Title: Banana
Summary: After a hectic working day, a man falls asleep at his desk, exhausted. He wakes up and realizes.

Title: Home Alone Mice
Summary: This anime shows a mission commanded by the Lord of the Rats to bring food, but a cat is watching the mice, so the Lord of the Rats orders them to kill the Cat so that the mission is successful.

Title: Saki: Achiga-Hen Episode of Side-A Portable

Summary: Catarina and her friends go on an ocean cruise. But when pirates suddenly attack, another doom flag appears for her to overcome.

Title: Bubble Bobble Revolution
Summary: Bub and Bob are back as they fight their way through 100 levels in Classic mode or New Age mode.

Title: Carpe Diem
Summary: In this very short kinetic novel, you will play as Jung who's meeting up and hanging out with a girl named Ai. Spend your time wisely.

Title: Boku wa sugu ni nigetanda: Higashinihon daishinsai kara manandakoto
Touhou 2 Fuumaroku: Story of Eastern Wonderland
Summary: The protagonist, a resident shrine maiden Reimu Hakurei, returns from a training session in the mountains only to find the Hakurei Shrine overrun by a contingent of ghosts and youkai (demons). Excited at the opportunity to test her fledgling abilities, she takes the powerful Hakurei Yin-Yang Orbs and takes off on the back of her turtle Genjii to seek out the source of the invasion.

Title: Sakura Wars: The Gorgeous Blooming Cherry Blossoms Act 6: The Time Will Come
Dramatic Memory Honoo no Alpenrose: Sepia-iro no Meiro
Summary: Summary of first half of Honoo no Alpenrose featuring a new dubbing and reworked scenes.

Title: Dir En Grey: Contours
Summary: A music video for Dir en Grey's song "Rinkaku (Contours)".

Title: Soreike! Anpanman: Yuuki no Hana ga Hiraku Toki
Sukkavartaankatu 8
Summary: She keeps finding small socks. Now, whose feet are feeling cold?

Title: Fûsen inu Tinny: Nandaka fushigi-na kyôryû no kuni
Yamasuki Yamazaki
Summary: When you're insanely happy, you're so happy to be happy, that you forget what made you happy. Shishi Yamazaki's film for her graduation show on January, 2013.

Title: By Your Side
Summary: A little girl is playing piano with her bunnies when an earthquake shakes the house.

Title: My Hero Academia: Battle of All
Youko Takahashi: Zankoku na tenshi no te-ze
The Mechanism of Spring
Summary: Everybody is excited to see the arrival of spring. This film tries to depict the excitement spring brings.

Title: Idolish7: Wish Voyage
Summary: Official music video for IDOLiSH7's song WiSH VOYAGE also released on the album of the same name.

Title: Kidô senshi Gandamu Yunikôn: Yunikôn no Hi
Summary: A Neo-Zeon remnant group called the "Sleeves" travels to Side 4's Industrial 7 colony, so that its captain, Zinnerman, can receive a "key" to something known as "Laplace's Box" from Vist Foundation leader Cardeas Vist. The item is said to be capable of either restoring the future or destroying the world. Audrey Burne seeks to meet Vist first and convince him not to turn over Laplace's Box, believing the Sleeves will use it to start another war. Along the way, she is rescued by 16-year-old student Banagher Links, who agrees to take her to Vist. Meanwhile, a battle breaks out between the Federation's Londo Bell taskforce and the Sleeves. As the collateral damage rises, the colony is evacuated. Amidst the chaos, Banagher discovers the fatally wounded Cardeas Vist in the cockpit of the Unicorn Gundam. Before his death, Vist entrusts the Gundam to Banagher, who realizes that Vist is his father. Banagher then launches in the Unicorn and confronts the Sleeves' elite pilot, Marida Cruz, who is piloting the Kshatriya.

Title: Touhou 5 Kaikidan: Mystic Square
Summary: Mima and Yuka, final bosses of The Story of Eastern Wonderland and Lotus Land Story respectively, return as playable characters in this game. As so often is the case in Touhou games, something is amiss within the Eastern Country. A massive quantity of demons are pouring from a cave high within the mountains. Seeking the source of this invasion, Reimu Hakurei and others must travel through Makai to the one behind the problem.

Title: Someday's Dreamers II: Sora
Summary: Get ready for a second magical journey to the world of Someday's Dreamers, where spell-casting is a profession that requires both the proper training AND a license. It's to get that license and fulfill a promise made to her late father that young Sora Suzuki has made the long journey from her distant home in the countryside town of Biei to the big city of Tokyo. It's a daunting challenge, but she's got a little bit of talent, a charming personality and, most important of all, the promise of an internship. What she ISN'T expecting, though, is how different life in the city will be, especially the people themselves. While she gets along with the confident Asagi, Kuroda and the gentle Hiyori, she's completely confused with the mysterious boy Gouta. And yet, as a result of their internships they keep ending up in the same situations and slowly learning to understand more about each other than they ever imagined possible.

Title: Galactic Gale Baxinger
Summary: 600 years after the previous TV series Jupiter has been demolished and a lot of planets have come from it. Don Diego gets his friends to combine into the powerful robot Baxinger.

Title: Kid's Castle
Summary: Koji Yamamura's active animation plunges into a child's playtime explorations. Fluid shifts in scale and a bubbling vocal soundtrack both channel a fresh imagination at work. Even a spilt glass of water holds the promise of adventure.

Title: Awaiting
Summary: A very lonely man sits in a boat and waits for someone. For whom or why he is waiting is not really important. He wishes to hold on to the imaginary 'happiness' as long as possible because it can vanish in the blink of an eye.

Title: Tim Pepperoni feat. Moon Jam: God Slime
Rykey & Montana Joe Carter: Ur Choise Freestyle
Bad Hop feat. Yzerr & Tiji Jojo: Kore igai

Summary: A Pokemon rap music video with 150 new Pokemon.

Hololive Alternative 2
Summary: Short Hololive animation featuring additional members from HololiveEN and HololiveID.

Title: Motor Toon Grand Prix
Summary: If you've ever wanted to burn some cartoon rubber, now's your chance in MOTOR TOON GRAN PRIX.

Title: Boku-ra ga koko ni iru fushigi
Touhou 4 Gensoukyou: Lotus Land Story
Summary: Following the events of the previous games, the Eastern Country is once again at peace until youkai (demons) begin to swarm the Hakurei Shrine and a tremendous power surges from beneath a lake high in the mountains. The shrine maiden Reimu Hakurei once again seeks out and eliminates the source of the disturbance - only, on this occasion, she is unwittingly joined by an old rival.

Title: Black Shout
Summary: Music video of Roselia's song Black Shout.

Title: Idolish7: Monster Generation
Summary: MONSTER GENERATiON is the first song you hear within game after completing the game tutorial it is available within the normal live as the first song.

Title: Re:vale: No Doubt
Summary: Official music video for Re:vale's song NO DOUBT from the IDOLiSH7 game franchise. Re:vale is a duo boy idol group introduced in the 2nd half of the main story of IDOLiSH7.

Summary: Official music video for IDOLiSH7's song Nanatsuiro REALiZE also released on the album of the same name.

Summary: Music video for Daft Punk's song 'One More Time'.

Title: Gucci Prince feat. Shakabouzu & Spada: Jigoku
Toei Robot Girls
Summary: A trio of cute, anthropomorphic versions of the mecha from 70s anime series battle against other giant robots.

Title: Usagi
Summary: Usagi is a two-and-a-half minute short-film produced by Team Silent. It features many Robbie the Rabbits of varying colors in a hospital-like setting as they walk around, wheel gurneys, and ride elevators.

Title: Weird Volunteers
Summary: A film produced and paid for by Kitakyushu City's Board of Education and Council for the Promotion of Outcast Issue Awareness. The story follows two second-year junior high girls who discover an old lady collapsed outside her home in rural Japan. After assisting her back inside, the two hear the old lady's harrowing life story and discover that she is illiterate. Shocked by this, the girls vow to volunteer their time to teach the old woman to read and write each day.

Title: Trigger: Daybreak Interlude
Summary: Official music video for TRIGGER's song DAYBREAK INTERLUDE also released on their "REGALITY" album. The male idol group is primarily a rival to IDOLiSH7, the latter of which is also the name of the overall game franchise being adapted.

Title: Idolish7: Restart Pointer
Summary: Official music video for IDOLiSH7's song "RESTART POiNTER."

Title: The Gift
Summary: Sarah is a sprightly little girl. She likes to do crafts a lot. Her best friend is Porter, the staffed toy of a strange animal. Sarah thinks up a good idea of giving her dad and mom a handcrafted gift on their anniversary. She makes dolls of whole family out of clay. She decides to bring the gift to her parents in the living room. As she steps out into the hallway, she is shocked by the big voice from her parents. Dad and Mom are fighting. In this special day. Sarah feels sad so much, but after a short time, she comes up with an idea. "If Dad and Mom see my beautiful gift, they will make up." "I have to give this gift." At that moment, Sarah feels a warm light on her cheek. As if in answer to her strong wish, the space around her becomes full of light. She finds herself in the mysterious imaginary world. Now the adventure of Sara delivering the gift to her dear parents is about to begin.

Title: Great Conquest: Romance of Three Kingdoms
